192a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la lha dong mi mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gang yang phyag 'tshal
192a4(mdo sde): ba dang /bsnyen bkur ba dang /'du 'ji spang ba'i phyir sems can de dag gi drung du nye bar phyin nas chos ston te/bag la nyal ba spang ba'i phyir 'gro ba lnga la mngon par chags
192a5(mdo sde): pa rjes su smon pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la sbyor bar byed do//nyes pa mang po'i lta ba dang /nga yir bya ba dang /bdag gir bya ba dang /rtag pa dang chad pa yongasu spang ba'i phyir
192a6(mdo sde): dgon pa'i gnas dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la rab tu gnas par byed pa de dag gi gan du gus pa skyes par 'gyuraro//de dag la'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
192a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims ston par byed po de ni sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba 'jig rten las 'odas pa'i tshul khrims 'di'o//gang dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i 'dod
192b1(mdo sde): chags 'jig par byed do//gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad 'jig par byed do//bag la nyal ba dang /nga yir bya ba dang /bdag gir bya ba thams cad 'jig
192b2(mdo sde): par byed do//myur du chos zab mo gting dpag dka' ba'i bzod pa thob bo//myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//sems can 'jig rten
192b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims can yang dang yang du sdug bsngal gyi zil gyi non cing 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas pa nga yir bya ba dang /bdag gir bya ba la rton pa dag byang chub kyi lam
192b4(mdo sde): rab tu mi shes so//de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems can rnams dgos pa med pa ni gang na bdag gi gnas med cing sems can dang /srog
192b5(mdo sde): dang /gsob dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes pa dang /shed can gyi gnas med pa dang /gzugs kyi gnas med pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang
192b6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang /sa'i khams kyi gnas med pa dang /chu dang me dang /rlung dang mig dang /gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas shing rna ba dang /sgra'i mtshan ma
192b7(mdo sde): la me gnas/skye dang /ro'i mtshan ma la mi gnas/lus dang /reg bya'i mtshan ma la mi gnas/yid dang chos kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi mtshan ma la
193a1(mdo sde): mi gnas/nga yir bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan ma la mi gnas/rtag pa dang /chang ba'i mtshan ma la mi gnas/'jig tshogs kyi lta ba dang /mthar 'dzin par
193a2(mdo sde): lta ba la mi gnas rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang /kun tu rtog pa dang /rab tu rtog pa dang /nye bar rtog pa la mi gnas/mya ngan da tib+himya ngan dang rjesu mya ngan dang zad pa'i mya ngan dang gnyis
193a3(mdo sde): pa'i mya ngan la mi gnas/stong pa nyid dang /smon pa med pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /khams gsum gyi rgyud la mi gnas//mngon par 'du mi byed/ma skyes/ma byung //
193a4(mdo sde): ma byas/mngon par ma byas pa la mi gnas/dus gsum la mi gnas/sems dang yid kyi mtshan nyid la mi gnas/nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /tshig pa dang
193a5(mdo sde): rjes su tshig pa dang /skad cig du 'jig pa'i mtha'i rdul la mi gnas/mngon par mi shes pa dang /mthun pa la mi gnas/nyan thos kyi theg pa sdom pa la mi gnas/rang sangs
193a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa la mi gnas/mtshan ma la mi gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la snyems par mi gnas kyi sems dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par spyod pa na mkha' bzhin/
193a7(mdo sde): du gnas shing yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mtshungs par gnas so//zhen pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /chags po gnyis su med pa
193b1(mdo sde): rnam par spyod pa dang /ye shes gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /rnal 'byor gnyis su myed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa na rtog
193b2(mdo sde): ba gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa gnyis su med po rnam par dpyod pa dang /la mo gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa'i
193b3(mdo sde): 'dren pa gnyisu med pa rnam par dpyod pa ste/rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas rigs kyi bu chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob bo//thog ma med pa'i stong pa nyid rab tu
193b4(mdo sde): 'byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyuraro//shes rab snang bas byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong bar byed do//'jig rten gyi chos kyis gos pa'ang med do//bdud kyi las kyis gos pa'ang
193b5(mdo sde): med do//bag chags kyi rjes su 'brel ba'i nyon mongs pa gos pa'ang medo//phyogs bcur shes rab kyi snang bas ldan par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi stobs skyes pas yul thams cad yongasu
193b6(mdo sde): shes par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro//'dod chags kyi 'khor bas ldan pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa thams cad kyi
193b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang /rnam pa byang ba yongs su shes pa dang /tshigs pa thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa dang /mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i spyod yul du 'gyur zhing 'khor
194a1(mdo sde): ba'i yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //dben pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing 'dra 'dzi thams cad la mngon par chags par yang yang dag par mthong ngo //
194a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du'ang yang dgo bar mthong ngo //mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i spyod yul du'adu 'gyur zhing 'du byed thams cad kyi yul
194a3(mdo sde): du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //ma skyes pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing bdud bzhi'i yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong //'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing /'phags
194a4(mdo sde): ba'i skye bor spyod yul ma yin par yang yang dge bar mthong ngo //'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag pa re shin tu 'das par yang 'gyur zhing 'jig rten thams cad kyi tshul gyi spyod
194a5(mdo sde): yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //ye shes kyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing byis pa'i yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //yang dag pa'i mtha'i yul mngon du'ang 'gyur
194a6(mdo sde): zhing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi spyod pa la yang dag par dga' bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yul la spyad pa spyod do//yul thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i spyod yul
194a7(mdo sde): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed/spyod par byed/mtshan dang /dpe byad dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par gzhol ba'i rnam par shes pa la brtson pas bdud bzhi'i
194b1(mdo sde): yul la dbye bar 'jug pa shes par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la brtson par 'gyur zhing de bzhin
194b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'ang byed do//sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la'ang 'jug par byed do//
194b3(mdo sde): dmigs pa thams cad kyi dge ba spyod pa la sems can yongs su smin par byed do//nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par bye mar byed do//spros pa thams cad rab tu ded par byed do//lta ba
194b4(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'ang 'god par byed do//rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog pa'i lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sergyas
194b5(mdo sde): can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa de lta bu'i don bya ba bsdu
194b6(mdo sde): ba'i dngos pos sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed 'god par byed do//yon tan gyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan don bya ba las sems can rnams
194b7(mdo sde): 'god par byed pa 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu chen po'i khur to//sems can gyi bsdu ba'o//sems can gyi tshog so//sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o//
195a1(mdo sde): gang sems can shin tu dbul po las yongs su thar bar byed pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'god par byed pa'o//ji lta bur sangs rgyas
195a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing rnam par ma dag par byang chub sems dpa' la la rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi don bya bas sems can
195a3(mdo sde): yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i don mthun pa sems can yongs su smin pa'i rtsal chen po gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu nyon mongs
195a4(mdo sde): pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyod pa na/gang gi tshe bdag brtson par 'gyur ba/yang na ni sbyin pha rol tu
195a5(mdo sde): phyin pa dang /yang na ni tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par 'gyur ba de dang dor sems can
195a6(mdo sde): rnams sbyor bar byed do//gang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pas zas sam sgom nas/yan lag gi dang po mgo'i bar du gtong bar 'gyur ba de ltar sems can rnams
195a7(mdo sde): la sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ston pa de la sbyor bar byed do//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srog gcod pa spangs shing sems can rnams la snying rje ba de de ltar
195b1(mdo sde): srog gcod pa zlog par byed/sems can thams cad la snying rje bar sbyor bar byed do//'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la 'god par byed pa nas yang dag par lta ba'i bar du smra bar
195b2(mdo sde): bya'o//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdag bzod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /bag la nyal ba spangs pa'i phyir bzod pa sgom par byed pa nas/mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa
195b3(mdo sde): thob pa'i bar du de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed cing mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i bar du 'god par byed do//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdag brtson 'grus brtsams nas sems can
195b4(mdo sde): yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i lus kyi las byin gyis brlabs pa dang /dge ba'i ngag gi las dang /yid kyi las byin gyis brlabs pa nas dge ba'i rgyur 'du shes pa dang /zhi ba dang /
195b5(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i rgyur 'dus byas rnams rnam par mi spong ba de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed/'god par byed do//ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /rang rgyal ba 'dul ba'i
195b6(mdo sde): phyir nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas te/bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongasasu rdzogs par bya'i phyir nyan thos dang /rang
195b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang bral ba'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do/byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed pa nas 'khyil pa dang /ldog pa'i bsam gtan
196a1(mdo sde): thob pa'i bar du de la sems can rnams de dang de dag gi yon tan la sbyor bar byed/'god par byed do//ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes rab
196a2(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bcom pa na thabs sna tshogs kyis shes rab kun 'byung bar byed do//ji ltar bdag mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sems can rnams sbyor bar
196a3(mdo sde): byed do//ji lta bur chos thams cad la ye shes thod cing pha rol ma yin pa'i rkyen mngon par shes pa de ltar sems can gyi rgyu'i phyir chos 'di dag 'byung ba 'di ni sems can
196a4(mdo sde): yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes te/gang gi las kyis sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par nus pa de'i bar du sbyor ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir
196a5(mdo sde): chags pa med do//sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed do//sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la
196a6(mdo sde): sbyor bar byed do//sems can rnams ji lta bur phra ba'i chos las ye shes mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub kyi spyod pa zab mo la sbyor bar byed do//las kyi rnam par
196a7(mdo sde): smon pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i dran pa rnam par mi spong ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhos pas rab tu 'byod pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//gang
196b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos dang sems la dbang byed par rab tu shes shing skad cig mar 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la'ang rtog pa dang /sems can la snying rje chen po rnam par spong ba 'di'ang byang
196b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//gang byang chub sems dpa' sems can stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la
196b3(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid du dmigs pa'ang med cing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i rgyun ma srid pa 'di'
196b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//nga byang chub sems dpa' lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed bdag med
196b5(mdo sde): bopo dang ldan pas chos ston pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /nyan pa dang /sgra dang dbyangs la dmigs pa med pa dang /las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /
196b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams snying rje ba'i phyir yang sems can phyin ci log la yang dag par 'du ba med pa rnams la sems can gyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brel pa ston pa 'di'ang byang chub sems
196b7(mdo sde): dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongasu sbyang ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis 'du byed par mi dmigs shing gtong bar mi dmigs pa
197a1(mdo sde): dang len pa dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'ang ma yin la/sems can la snying rje ba'i phyir yang sbyin pa byin par 'gyur la sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i
197a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa bston par byed pa dang /sbyin pa po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sbyor bar byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can
197a3(mdo sde): yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can gyi lus spyod pa med pa dang /'gyur ba med pa dang /mi gtsang ba'i gzugs brnyan
197a4(mdo sde): lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /sems brag cha lta bur brtag pa dang /'du byed sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lto bur rab tu shes pa dang /sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rab tu
197a5(mdo sde): sbyor ba rnam par mi spong ba dang /sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi 'du byed la sbyor bar byed pa dang /rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par ston par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub
197a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongasu smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur bdag med cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshul
197a7(mdo sde): khrims la rtog par byed pa dang /spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes pa dang /'di la sems can gyi btang snyoms su rab tu sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams yA
197b1(mdo sde): phung po gsum la sbyor bar byed pa 'di ni lhag pa'i tshul khrimasu slob pa dang lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas
197b2(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin pa bsgrubs pa'o//yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed skad cig tu 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid du shes te/'du ma byas kyi gnas
197b3(mdo sde): dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing sems can rnams la ting nge 'dzin dang /bzod pa'i rgyu dang /'bras bu mtshungs par ston pa de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa
197b4(mdo sde): 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yang blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'i 'du
197b5(mdo sde): byed thams cad shes shing rgyu dang 'bras bur yang rtog pa dang /chos thams cad skye ba dang /'gog par dmigs pa med pa dang /rgyu dang rkyen gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang bral bar
197b6(mdo sde): rangab tu mi shes pa dang /sems can rnams yongasu smin pa med pa dang /snying rje chen po'i rgyun mi bcod pa dang /yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa dang /phung
197b7(mdo sde): po yongs su shes pa dang /ye shes mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang /rgyu'i 'bras bu ston par byed pa dang /sems can le lo can rnams brtson 'grus
198a1(mdo sde): la dmig pa'i sdug bsngal 'dzin pa la sbyor ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o///
198a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yang bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed cing 'du byed thad mi rtag yang dag par rjesu mthong ba dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /
198a3(mdo sde): myong ba med pa dang /byas pa med pa dang /bya ba med pa dang /kun nos ldang ba med pa dang /skad cig tu zad pa med pa ses la mkhas pa'i 'du byed rnams yang dag par rjesu
198a4(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /sems can rnams la'ang phung po la rten pa'i bsam gtan la tshangs par spyod pa mngon par shes pa thob pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu ston pa dang /bsam gtan
198a5(mdo sde): gyis nyon mongs pa spang bar byas shig ces de ltar las gzhan ma yin pas sems can rnams bsam gtan la sbyor bar byed pa dang /thob pa chen po thob par byos shig ces
198a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan la sems sbyor bar byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa'i mngon par sgrubs pa'o//yang byang chub
198a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' ji ltar blang ngo med cing dor ba med pa dang /chags pa dang /khong khro ba gnyis ka dang bral bas thams cad btang snyoms thob pa dang /nan tan dang /
198b1(mdo sde): bdag shes pa dang /mi smra ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /bsdum gtan gyi dbang po lha yid kyi 'du byed rnams rtog par mi byed//rnam par rtog par mi da pa dang /sems can rnams
198b2(mdo sde): la snying rje chen po rab tu sbyor ba yongasu 'grub pa rab tu ma spong ba dang /shes rab sgom pa la brtson pas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i brtson ra las rab tu thar par ston pa dang
198b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams thos po dang bsam gtan la brtson zhing tshol ba sgom pa la sbyor bar byed pa dang /yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji lta bur dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par khong du chud pas
198b4(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams chos de dang de dog la yang dag par gzhog par byed sbyor bar byed/'god par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems
198b5(mdo sde): dpa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir don mthun pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
198b6(mdo sde): ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can yongs su smin pa don mthun pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po'o//gzhan yang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa ldi'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song gsum dang /ngan//
198b7(mdo sde): song du spyod pa'i nyes pa dang /sems can nyon mongs pa dang /tshe dang lta ba dang /bskal pa'i rnyog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las smon lam gyi rgyun mi/
199a1(mdo sde): gcod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs la mngon par mi 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon lam mi byed do//yang
199a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
199a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa la skur pa 'deb pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag gis sems can rnams yongasu smin pa skyed par
199a4(mdo sde): byed do//theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed do//pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par byed do//de'ang 'dir de tsam gyis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing sems can yongasu smin par
199a5(mdo sde): byed do//'dir yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o//byang chub thob pa na'ang sems can mtshams med
199a6(mdo sde): pa byed pa nas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i bar du yongs su smin par 'gro zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa nyon mongs
199a7(mdo sde): pa'i lta ba thams cad las yongs su thar par byed pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rtsal chen pos yongs su
199b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa'ago chu'o//gang byang chub sems dpa' la las sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sems can gyi glo cha rnam pa de lta dus sems can yongasu sbyin par bya bar mi nus pa 'di/
199b2(mdo sde): 'ang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin pa'o//yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na ma khA'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i
199b3(mdo sde): bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//le'u gsum pa'o///rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs gang
199b4(mdo sde): zhe na/rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bar 'ga' ji zhig tu skyes pa na sems
199b5(mdo sde): can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos spongs pa dang /'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa rnams yongs su smin
199b6(mdo sde): par byed/dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor bar byed/nyon mongs pa dang /lte ba'i bag chags thams cad las sems can yongs su smon par byed cing /sems can re re'i dzin
199b7(mdo sde): gyi phyir bskal pa'i sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa nas/sems can de 'khor ba'i 'dam las sgrol pa dang /sangs rgyas gcig gi thad du phul ba nas/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
200a1(mdo sde): baN+Da ts+tshang de blad kyi myur dra ngus la//dang pa rgya sems can dag khal ston par 'gyur ba du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la byu ba byas pa dang /rnam
200a2(mdo sde): par rol pa mngon par shes pa ting nge 'dzin gyi stongs kyi rol tu phyin pa thob pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gad+hA'i bye ma snod du rdzu 'phrul gyi skabs kyis nyo bar 'gro bar nus
200a3(mdo sde): byar 'gyur ro//de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen dgur to//de nasangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs nye bar rtogs so//do na yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
200a4(mdo sde): gi sngon tan gyi tshogs chen po'ong ci 'dra ba yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //de na'ang rigs kyi bu de'i shin tu spong ba dang ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu des yang de bzhin
200a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dag la yongs su zhus pa/las ces na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/sa myal blta ba dang /chos nyan pa dang /
200a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bas bral ba med par 'gyur ro//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bas 'dres pa med pag/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi 'dres pa med pas
200a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang gzung sa thams cad kyis 'bral ba med par 'gyur ro//yang nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi skye ba ci tsam 'abla na med pa yang dag par
200b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'chang ma rgya'o//byang chub zab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgya che zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis yon tan gyi tshogs kyis rgyas par 'gyur ro//byang chub su rgyas dang /
200b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ro//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bral
200b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus de dag gos rigs kyi bu de la ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa/las gang dang gang+gA spyod pa dang nan tan gang gis yon tan de dag ba
200b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de'ang rigs kyi bu tshe rabs su yon tan dang spyod pa'i nan tan la brtson par 'gyur ba nas/der skye bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o//yon tan ji tsam pa thams cad yongs
200b5(mdo sde): su rdzogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab par 'gyur ro//gang na rigs kyi bu bla na med pa yang dag par
200b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de nyar thos da rangs rgyas kyi theg pa bAdz+nyA par spangs pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa rnams la theg pa chen po dag
200b7(mdo sde): ba'i gtam smra bar byed kyi nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ni ma yin no//sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang /yongs su spyod pa byas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
201a1(mdo sde): yon tan mang po dang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chad med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la chos ston par byed do//gang dag la chos
201a2(mdo sde): ston pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ston gyi yongs su ma dag par ma yin no//pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
201a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byang chub kyi spyod pa bsngags par byed kyi yongs su ma dag pa ni bsngags par mi byed do//sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas dge ba'i bshes
201a4(mdo sde): gnyen de dag dang 'grogs shing ston pa dang /sdom pa la dgod pa dang /yon sbyong ba bsngags par byed kyi yongasu ma dag pa ni ma yin no//rigs kyi bu gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs/
201a5(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis sngon rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu ma dog par thog
201a6(mdo sde): mar sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med grangs med par da
201a7(mdo sde): ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba byang chub sems dnga' theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtam sgra
201b1(mdo sde): 'i de bzhin gshegs pad+mo dag thams cad kyis sngon nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thag masas don bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du
201b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//'dir yang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la bstan par gyur to//mngon par shes pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro ba'i
201b3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to//gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs tshang bzung ba dang brtags pa der phyin chad kyang skye bar smon lam byas pas/dar bla na med
201b4(mdo sde): bayang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
201b5(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de dag thams cad kyis rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par thams cad kyi thog mar dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par
201b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par byang chub bo//gang gi tshe sems bskyed pas mngon par shes pa thob pa ni sa rab nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
201b7(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o//gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byang chub sems dpa' dag de ltar chos kyi sgra sna tshogs kyi nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dang
202a1(mdo sde): bral zhing chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa dang /gang yang chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob pas dga' ba dang
202a2(mdo sde): bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro//gang yang da ltar khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi rnyog pa lnga'i
202a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lkugs pa khyed cag thams cad kyi sngon thams cad kyi thog mar nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon
202a4(mdo sde): bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//thams cad kyi thog mar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par byas pa de la'ang mngon par shes
202a5(mdo sde): pa gang gis phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to//gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi
202a6(mdo sde): tshogs kun tu shes shing rtog pa der phyis skye ba mngon par shes pa'i smon lam byas pas de dag nyid kyi nan tan gyis zhugs pas bsam pa ji snyed pa yongs su rdzogs so//sangs
202a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa der skyes pa rnams sangs rgyas gzhan 'phel ba'i phyir yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa 'di ni mi 'dod do//nyon mongs pas
202b1(mdo sde): tshamanyan/thamathathamams ma mnyamacas mtha.a a mnyamaHthas mthathaHsa na thathatham mtham tham ma' bsaHtham mtshacan tan aya 'amal khamam/gabs mamamam/mabamam kha mam ya
202b2(mdo sde): bsgribs pa dang /lta ba dog pa thob pa 'di dag dmod cing 'di la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'i/sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta
202b3(mdo sde): sto dper na gtar mkhan mkhas pa la la mchog tu dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i sman gyi yo byad kyis mi zhar ba dang long ba rnams kyi mig gi nang cung zad tsam rab tu zhi bar byed do//zhi
202b4(mdo sde): bar shes nas de dag gcig la gcig smras la/bdag cag gis gzugs kyi snang ba la lta bar brtsam te/bdag cag sgron mar gyur pa'i sman pa'i khyim 'di nas byung la 'gro bar
202b5(mdo sde): bya'o snyam nas phyir 'ong ba'ang med pa mang po de dag kyang gang sman bI khyim de las 'byung bar 'gyuraro//ji lta bur nad 'di rab tu zhi ba med pa de dag mig gi nad yun ring por gnas pa
202b6(mdo sde): bltas nas yang 'ong ngo /de dag kyang sman pa'i khyim der gnas par 'gyur ro//de dag yun mi ring bas kyang nad thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang
202b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gang la 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /lta ba ngan+da pas
202b8(mdo sde): rtag tu gtse ba'i sems can rnams de la/la la dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ji ltar yon tan khong du chud pa de ltar rtog pa lnga'i sangs
203a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de lngas 'byol byar 'dod do//gang yang de las 'das shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rnam par spyod pa de nyon mongs pa dang /
203a2(mdo sde): rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gdon mi za bar 'gro bar 'dod do//de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las shin tu 'das pas
203a3(mdo sde): yun ring por sdug bsngal 'dod par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu ma dag pa der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
203a4(mdo sde): mi rgyu ba 'di 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs mongs su dag pa'i//rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog
203a5(mdo sde): pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snga dro'i dus gcig gis kyang tshul khrims bsrungs so//tshul khrims sgoms so//sbyin pa byin no//bsam gtan la bsam gtan bye dang/
203a6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams so//bzod pa bsgoms so//shes rab kyi yon tan brtsams so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bskal pa brgya stong du'ang pha rol tu phyin
203a7(mdo sde): pa drug la brtson pas spyad pa spyod pa'ang ma yin no//rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang yang nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du thams cad kyi thog
203b1(mdo sde): mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa bon bskyed do//yang rnyog pa snga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'gro zhing 'dzing tsam gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus
203b2(mdo sde): kyis dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas so//gang de lta bu'i ye shes snang ba thob pa de thams cad yul smra ba rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes g.yo ba
203b3(mdo sde): med par 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi chos rnams las 'phags par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing lta bsnang bar 'gyur ro//sems can gyi spyod pa brjod du
203b4(mdo sde): du med pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro//sems can lus ma rungs pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang lhan cig tu 'grogs po rnams la
203b5(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba'ang myed/sems can lus nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams ci 'dra bar mthong ba la sems kyi nad ci phan du rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir de 'dra ba'i sems kyi
203b6(mdo sde): sman gyi yo byad rab tu ston par byed do//gang gi nyon mongs pas sems can ngan du spyod pa dang ldan par mthong ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag bdag gis spangs te/sems can de
203b7(mdo sde): la snying rje chen po bskyed do//nyon mongs pa de dag spangs pa'i phyir brtson pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do//ji ltar nyon mongs pa las yongs su thar par bya zhes 'dod
204a1(mdo sde): chags spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa la rab tu sbyor bas rab tu zhi bar byed do//zhe sdang spyod pa rnams byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang /gti mug spyod pa
204a2(mdo sde): rnams rten cing 'brel par sbyor ba dang /skal ba dang bcas par spyod pa rnams dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran pa ro rab tu sbyor ba dang /'dod chags snrel zhing spyod pa rnams
204a3(mdo sde): byams pa dang /mi dge bo rab tu sbyor ba dang /zhe sdang snrel zhir spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa dang /byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang /gti mug sbrel zhir spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa
204a4(mdo sde): dang /rten cing 'brel par rab tu sbyor ba dang /lta ba ngan pa thob pa rnams stong pa nyid rab tu thob pa dang /rkyen stobs can rnams la rjes su srung ba dang ldan pa rab tu sbyor ba dang /
204a5(mdo sde): rab tu gzung du med cing dngos po med pa dang /sgrog pa med par shes pa rnams zab mo rnam par zhi ba rab tu sbyor ba dang /spros par shes pa rnams lhag mthong spros pa'i gtam rab
204a6(mdo sde): tu sbyor bas zhi bar byed do//nges par 'dod pa rnams rim gyi smra ba dang /tshig zad pa rnams bsdu ba rab tu sbyor zhing zhi gnas dang lhag mthong du rab tu sbyor ba dang /lhag
204a7(mdo sde): mthong la gus pa can rnams na mkha' yus skye mched la rab tu sbyor ba dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gus pa can rnams rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched la rab
204b1(mdo sde): tu sbyor ba dang /rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched la gus pa can rnams cung zad med pa'i skye mched du sbyor ba dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la gus pa can rnams mtshan ma
204b2(mdo sde): memodo par rab tu sbyar ba dang /smon lam lo gus pa rnams smon pa med par smra bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /tshul khrims la gus pa can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su thar par
204b3(mdo sde): rab tu sbyor ba dang /thos pa la nga rgyal can rnams sred pa thams cad 'byung ba meng bla rab tu sbyor ba dang /dgon pa bal nga rgyal mngon par brtson pa rnams dang //sbyangs pa'i yon tan can
204b4(mdo sde): la nga rgyal mngon par brtson pa rnams tshad med par rab tu sbyor ba dang /phung po la rtag par 'du shes pa rnams 'byung ba dang zad par rab tu sbyor ba dang /khams lo bdag gir bya ba
204b5(mdo sde): yongs su spangs pa rnams smig rgyu bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /skye mched yongs su spangs pa rnams lbu ba'i phung po rab tu sbyor ba dang /'dod pa'i khams yongasu spangs pa rnams chu shing
204b6(mdo sde): gi snying po med par rab tu sbyor ba dang /gzugs kyi khams yongs su spangs pa rnams 'du byed mi rtag par rab tu sbyor ba dang /gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su spangs pa rnams 'du byed
204b7(mdo sde): thams cad sdug bsngal bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /bsam gtan la dga' ba dang bde ba yongasu spangs pa rnams chos thams cad la bdag med par rab tu sbyor ba dang /'khor ba'i sdug
205a1(mdo sde): bsngal 'dod pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba zhi pa rab tu sbyor ba dang /gzhan yang lam ngan pa yongs su spangs pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rab tu sbyor/
205a2(mdo sde): bas lta ba de dag rab tu zhi bar bya'o//yid du 'ong ba'i skye bo yongs su spangs pa rnams mi mdzes par rab tu sbyor ba dang /gzugs la chags pa yongasu spangs pa rnams ro sngon por rab tu
205a3(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang /sgra la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams drag cha 'byung ba zad par rab tu sbyor ba dang /dri la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnam rlung du rtog par rab tu sbyor ba dang /ro la
205a4(mdo sde): chog pa yongs su spangs pa rnams mi mdzes pa sna tshogs rab tu sbyor ba dang /reg pa la tshogs pa yongs su spong ba rnams mi gtsang ba'i yan lag sum cu rtsa drug rab tu sbyor ba dang /
205a5(mdo sde): snying rje med pa rnams byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang /gtong ba med pa rnams sbyin pa chen po lnga rab tu sbyor ba dang /gti mug gis sgribs pa rnam kha ton rab tu sbyor ba dang /'dul ba
205a6(mdo sde): rnam 'phags pa'i rig la dga' bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /sdug bsngal 'dul ba rnams rim gyis sems rtse gcig tu 'dus par rab tu sbyor ba dang /'du byed thams cad kyis
205a7(mdo sde): mngon par spros pa rnams sgyu ma lta bur rab tu sbyor bas nyon mongs pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro////bam po lnga po//gzhan yang sems can lha dang mir
205b1(mdo sde): skye bar bsam pa rnams la dge ba bcu'i las yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed do//nyan thos kyi theg par bsam pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan par yid la byed pa sbyor
205b2(mdo sde): bor byed do//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par bsam pa rnams la rton cing 'brel par smra ba yid la byed pa sbyor bar byed do//sems can theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams
205b3(mdo sde): la pha rol tu phyin pa drug sbyor bar byed do//thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sems sbyor bar byed do//sems can pha rol tu phyin pa drug
205b4(mdo sde): spyod pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams snying rje chen po la yongs su mi skyo bas sems yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la
205b5(mdo sde): de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed do//ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi nong yongs su dag pa gzhan du rnam par spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
205b6(mdo sde): gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed pa de dag de'i 'og tu mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse'o//ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bzhin du rnam par
205b7(mdo sde): spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshogs mngon par 'dod pa de dag de'i 'og tu mngon par shes pa rnam par rtse ba de la skye bar 'dod pa ji snyed pa der skye'o//yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon
206a1(mdo sde): /mongs par rnam par myi spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag pa 'dod da'ang med pader skye bar 'dod pa de tshonam pA der sgyu/
206a2(mdo sde): yang nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bI mo 'dod pa de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o//rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi
206a3(mdo sde): zhing du/sems can lta ba dog pa rnyed pa dang /mtshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
206a4(mdo sde): lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams rgyan gcod do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed cing /byang chub
206a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med grangs med pa rnams la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la ches ston par byed do//yang byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas
206a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'dir rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed kyang gang byang chub sems dpa' la la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dge bar rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed mi nus so//yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs
206a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi spyad pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de ltar thabs rang tu sbyor ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa
206b1(mdo sde): gcig gis 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /gal te sems can gcig gi zhe sdang spyod pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de ltar thabs la mangs pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig/
206b2(mdo sde): gis zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa dang /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi skal po dang bcas par spyod pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa
206b3(mdo sde): stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis zhi bar byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can gcig gi skol ba dang bcas par spyod pa nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba rab tu zhi bar nus
206b4(mdo sde): pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rtsal chen po byed do//gang sems can gcig gi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'ang sems
206b5(mdo sde): can gcig gi dgos pas brtson 'grus brtan pa la mos shing pha rol gnon pa na thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu sbyor ba dang pha rol gnon pas gzir ba rnams byang
206b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rtsal chen po 'di la ltos shig/ji ltar sems can gcig gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar gnyis dang /gsum dang /gzhi nas gling gcig gi
206b7(mdo sde): sems can yongs su tshang ba re re'i dgos pas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i mtshan nyid stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bani rab tu zhi bar byed cing gling gnyis pa dang gling bzhi pa nas phyogs bcu'i
207a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par byed pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnyog
207a2(mdo sde): pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'i//ji ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can re re'i nyon mongs pa'i dbang po spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis 'jug
207a3(mdo sde): ba de ltar sems can gcig gi mos pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu shes shing bri ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /'phel ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /gnas pa'i
207a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ring du shes pa dang /mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid rang du shes pa dang /bdag
207a5(mdo sde): med pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /sems can gyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /stong pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /dben pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa nas
207a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du 'du shes pa dang /mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /sems can re re'i chags bya'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs brgyad cu rtsa
207a7(mdo sde): bzhi rab tu shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par shes par 'gyur ro//bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems can nyon mongs pa de ma
207b1(mdo sde): pos bcings pa las yongs su thar par nus so//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang /rnyog pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can yongs su smin par byed du/
207b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams la snying rje chen po rgyun mi gcod cing yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dug po 'di'ang byang chub
207b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rtsal chen po'o//yang byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas 'di bstan pa ston pa na/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par byang chub sems dpa'
207b4(mdo sde): yang dag par lhags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gad+hA'i sum cu'i bye ma snyed mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzad pa thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gad+hA'i bye ma snyed kyis dag
207b5(mdo sde): ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gang no ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas mgrin gcig tu 'di ched du brjod pa che yod//chus
207b6(mdo sde): grong rnams blta dka' chu bos khyer//nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal yul las shes//nyon mongs rgya mtsho las ni mthar phyin med//lam gyis bdag cag kyang ni rnam par gnas/
207b7(mdo sde): sems can gang rnams nyin mongs gdung bas gdungs//nyon mongs sangs rgyas zhing du rtag rnam myos//ngan song 'gro bar rtag tu sdug bsngal bsags//'chad mkhani dam pa
208a1(mdo sde): don gyi theg pa ston//bdag cag nyon mongs sems can kyang dgongs pas//sangs rgyas zhing de smon la byed 'gyur ba//nyon mongs zhing du bdag cag
208a2(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod//sems can nyon mongs dam bcings grol bar byed//gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dregs//gti mug lom ster sdig pa rab byed pa//sdig pa thams
208a3(mdo sde): cad las ni bdag cag bzlog/'khor ba'i dgon pa 'jigs las rab tu sgrol//gang dmyal byol song yi dgas 'jig rten du//rtag tu 'dod med sdug bsrel myong ba dag/
208a4(mdo sde): bdag cag sdug bsngal thams cad las grol byed//nyon mongs sangs rgyas zhong du byang chub spyod//yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par khyab pa'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa
208a5(mdo sde): des kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa legs par spobs shing mchog tu rgya che bo'i brtson 'grus brtan pa la brtson pa pha rol gnon pa sems can yongs su smin pa'i
208a6(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo bstan pa legs logs so//gang chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skyes bu dam pa 'ongs sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byang chub kyi spyod pa bor te rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi
208a7(mdo sde): zhing du spyod pa la brtson no//sems can mtshams med par byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs po dang /lus tshig pa dang /mi dge
208b1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po bskyed do//nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ston to//
208b2(mdo sde): lus med pa phung po spang ba'i mtha' ston to//tshig tsam gyis skyes bu de dag rtson par 'gyur ba de dag la gang lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas mchod pa mchog tu rgya chen po byeng na
208b3(mdo sde): de dag gi brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol gnon pa 'di la brtson pa lta ci smos te/ji ltar tshig gis dam bcas pa de ltar dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
208b4(mdo sde): de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas legs so zhes bya ba byin te skyes bu dam pa legs so legaso//rigs kyi bu ji ltar smra ba'i tshig tsam gyis rtsom par 'gyur
208b5(mdo sde): bde de bzhin te/de dag la gang lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas mchod pa mchog tu rgya chen po byed na de'i shes pas nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam pa
208b6(mdo sde): lta bu'i de dag gi rtsal chen po bya bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/mtshams med par byed pa nas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i bar du rnam pa de lta bu'i brten pa'i brjon
208b7(mdo sde): 'grus pha rol gnon pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas de ltar sems can yongs su smin pa shes
209a1(mdo sde): /rab kyi bas la mkhas pa'i rgyus kyi blobastan nas/com ldan 'das kyis chog 'di brjod ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi chen stod gsum gyi snong chen thon
209a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa chen po 'di lan drug du g.yos so// rdzas kyi me tog gi cher yang rab tu phab bo//lce rdzas kyi rol mo'ang rab tu dkrol to//lha dang /dri za dang /
209a3(mdo sde): mi'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed po de dag la mchog tu rgya che ba'i
209a4(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson no//ji snyed yau shrIs mdzod 'di bstan du gsol/ye shes phyir yang ston pa 'di nyid ston//mkhyen pa khyod kyi gang gi slob ston pa//thub
209a5(mdo sde): pa shes pa'i smra ba 'di la 'jug/mkhyen pa can gyi zhing mngabye ba la//thog pa'i ye shes stonu pa 'di la 'jug/bdag ni ye shes 'brogs myur gnas shing //tshul 'di
209a6(mdo sde): la'ang ye shes lam rab ston//ji ltar byang chub spyod phyir ye shes 'gyur ba//rgyal ba ye shes rgyal mtshan 'di la 'jug/ji ltar na mkha' dri med stong pa'i chos
209a7(mdo sde): bdag dang mthun pa'i gtama~M dge bsta du gsol//ston mkhan mi yo gtso bo 'di la mchog/mchog tu yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa ston//stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs
209b1(mdo sde): dgra zil gnon/rtag pa dang ni chad par thal bar byas/dpal dang rtul pod gang zag dam pa mchog/sred pa zhi ba gang zag dam pa mchog/sred pa zhi zhing zhi gnas rab tu ston//
209b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba rab tu zhi ba 'di la 'jug/rgyal ba stong pa nyid zhi rab bstan gsol//rgyal ba stong pa nyid 'di la'ang 'jug/kha dog dung dang kha ba 'dra ba yi//zhi ba mdzes pa'i stong pa nyid
209b3(mdo sde): bstan gsol//nyan thos kyi ni 'di la tshogs rnams spangs//ston gyi nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar//gtso bo dag gis shin tu gsal shing mdzes//'dir na lam zhi stong pa nyid
209b4(mdo sde): bstan gsol//brgya byin tshangs pa'i skad ltar sgra dbyangs snyan//sems can dma' la thugs brtse chen po yis//thub pa 'di ni stong pa nyid la 'jug/mya ngan dang bral 'gro ba 'di
209b5(mdo sde): la tshim//dma' ba spyod pa rtag tu byin brlabs paso//shes rab mang gzugs stong pa nyid zhi gsungs//sdig pa ba com zhing nyes tshogs dri ma med//'di ni 'gro la theg pa ngan
209b6(mdo sde): pa spangs//dge ba'i mtshan nyid spyod yul rab nyams pas//kye ma'o da ltar stong pa nyid zhi gsungs//rma bya ngang pa ni tso ske ka dbyangs//nyams pa'i phyogs cha can gyi sgra rnams 'jig/
209b7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang pad+mo dang /ku mu da dang /puN+Da ri kas mngon par gtor to//'phags pa yang dag par spyod pa'i/
210a1(mdo sde): tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo le'u bzhi pa'o///de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mtha' yas//
210a2(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa ni mi bzhugs pa de tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi slad du lho rdzas kyi gser dang /lha rdzas kyi
210a3(mdo sde): baiDUr+ya sngon po'i skas mngon par sprul de skas de dag gi ngos gnyis la bram ze'i byis pa tshe lo sum cu pa lta bu tshangs dbyangs dang ldan pa gser gyi dbyig pa dang gdugs 'dzin pa/
210a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul to//de nas bram ze'i byis pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal
210a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//khyod ni rab nyon mongs la sngon thugs bskyed//nyon mongs theg la byang chub phan pa'i rgyu//nyon
210a6(mdo sde): mongs zhi phyir rgyal ba bsnyen kyang bkur//nyon mongs thabs mdzad rgyal ba 'dir gshegs gsol/nyon mongs spyod po thams cad khyod kyis spungs//sems can nyon mongs la ni/
210a7(mdo sde): rtag tu gnyen//khyod ni nyon mongs las las 'gro ba bzlog/nyon mongs rgal ba'i rgyus ni rtag tu myos//nyon mongs ma lus khyod kyis rab tu zhi//bdag gi blos ni nyon mongs dra
210b1(mdo sde): babacad/'gro ba rtag tu nyon mongs chu la sgrol//nyon mongs sun 'byin rgyal ba 'dir gshegs gsol//nyon mongs zhing du byang chub dam par reg/ye shes sgron 'chang
210b2(mdo sde): 'gro shes nyams pa yi//sems can thams cad la ni thar ston pa//nyon mongs nyon mongs zhi phyir 'dir gshegs gsol//ye shes 'od zer gyis ni rnam thar ston//
210b3(mdo sde): khyod thugs brtse bas 'gro bas shes nyams khyab//ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba mig ldan pas//rgyal ba ye shes nyi ma 'dir gshegs gsol//mkhyen pas lha dang mi mang thar
210b4(mdo sde): bar mdzad//khyod kyi ye shes sgrog dang gang zag med//thub pa ye shes dpa' ba 'di la 'jug/nyon mongs pa la sbyin mdzod dran pa gsungs//nyi ma zla ba mchog tu mdzes pa'i/
210b5(mdo sde): spyan/rgyal ba sems can thal mo sbyar la gsungs//thub pa byang chub mchog phyir bstan du gsol//'phags pa thob pa 'di la 'jug pa gsungs//rgyal ba byang chub rgyu can
210b6(mdo sde): mdzes gzigs pa/phyogs bzhi 'dir ni yang dag lhags mngal/stong pa nyid dang bzod spyod shes gyur gsungs//rgyal ba dpa' gtong 'di lo shin tu 'dug/bram
210b7(mdo sde): ze'i byis pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan 'di smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin to/de nas drang srong thub pa gang na de las bzhengs pa
211a1(mdo sde): dang de nyid kyi cha na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos so//lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /
211a2(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po du mas kyang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhingo ma lus par lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char mngon par phab bo//lha rdzas kyi oM ga ru dang /ta ka ra dang /dus
211a3(mdo sde): dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan gyi tshor mngon par phab bo lha rdzas kyi gos dang /rgyan dang yid bzhin gyi gos dang /nor bu dang /mu tig gi se mo do dang rin po che'i char mngon par
211a4(mdo sde): phab bo/lha rdzas kyi rol mo rdung ba mngon par dkrol to//dbyangs kyi lhung lhung ljags kyi sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag sngon ma bstan pa'i chos mnyan par bgyi'o//
211a5(mdo sde): bdud kyi yul las yang dag par shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o//nyon mongs pa'i yul gzhom par bgyi'o//ye shes kyi yul khong du chud par bgyi'o//zab mo'i stong pa nyid
211a6(mdo sde): kyi lam khong du chud par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa brtsegs pa de dag la 'dzegs te seng ge'i khri bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs nas mi mjed
211a7(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa sa dang na mkha' khyab pa'i 'khor kun cang mi smra bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te sems rtse gcig tu drang srong thub pa la lta bar gyur to//
211b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa ma lus par sa dang na mkha' khyab pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
211b2(mdo sde): gsungs so/6/sems can ji snyed 'dir ni kun lhags pa//byang chub 'dod rnams yongs su tshos tshol na//byang chub mchog gi spyod pa rab bstan gyis//de dag thams
211b3(mdo sde): cad rtse gcig sems su nyon//sems can la la gti mug srid pas bsgribs//phung po dag la'ang lta ba rnam mi sring //gang dgo da dung byang chub mchog spyod brtson//
211b4(mdo sde): yang yang 'di la ston cung zad spyod//dbang po drug la stong pa mi lta ste//mtshan ma med pa'i 'dzin pa bdag la zung //byang chub phyir ni cung zad brtson spyod kyi//shes rab
211b5(mdo sde): yon tAn thams cad spyod pa med//ji ltar me 'dod khyim gyi nang du ni//btsal bas kyang ni me dag rnyed ma gyur//de ltar sems can la la byang chub 'dod//stong pa bsgoms
211b6(mdo sde): par shes rab thob pa med//de bas gang dag byang chub sdog 'dod pa//phung po khams dang skye mched mtshan ma dag/rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur thams cad ltos//'di ni byang
211b7(mdo sde): chub dam pa mchog gi lam//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ying dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis
212a1(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das te nga yir bya ba dang /bdag
212a2(mdo sde): bir bya ba thams cad kyi srid pa'i ngag la nyal ba dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /ma rig par lta ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
212a3(mdo sde): 'dres pa med pa dang /sems can gyi go cha dang /sems sgyu ma lta bu dang /tshor ba du ba dang /rdul dang /nam mkha' dang /sprin lta bur rab tu shes so/mtshan ma
212a4(mdo sde): dang mtshan nyid thams cad na mkha' spros pa lta bur rab tu she sa so//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las 'dus par 'gyur ro//las yongs su zad cing sems can nye bar
212a5(mdo sde): 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro//dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ma bskyed pa'i gnyen lta bur 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa ston par 'gyur ro//pha rol
212a6(mdo sde): gyi rgol ba thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs par thul ba med par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rgyas pa seng ge lta bu dang /rgya mtsho chen po
212a7(mdo sde): lta bu'i chen po'i char gyi chu bo rab tu gtong ba dang /'khrul pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /chags pa med pa'i slob pa dang ldan pa dang /bstod pa dang rab tu bsngags
212b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu bzod pa 'di sgoms pa nas lus dbang du btsugs pa'i bar du 'di las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de
212b2(mdo sde): la bzod pa 'di rnam pa gnyis te/yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa dang /nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de la yang dag par
212b3(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa gang zhe na/rnam pa lnga ste/rigs kyi bu yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /
212b4(mdo sde): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de la gzugs kyi phung po gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu rnam pa brgyad de/byang chub sems dpa' tshul
212b5(mdo sde): bzhin yid la byed pa brtags pa'i bzod pa sgom par bya'o//rigs kyi bu brgyad gang zhe na/gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o//gzugs zhes bya ba ni nang ngo //'dod
212b6(mdo sde): chags zhes bya ba ni rnam pan 'jig pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid do//gang rnam par 'jig pa'i rang bzhin de ni mi rtog pa'o//de rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su chud
212b7(mdo sde): pa'o//phyi bo nang gi rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyun bcad do//nam mkha' ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med
213a1(mdo sde): dang /stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i brjod pa sgom par byed do//'don byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su sbyin pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod
213a2(mdo sde): par blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gzugs de'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi ste/rigs kyi bu 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag nang gi 'am phyi rol gyi 'am/che ba'am phra
213a3(mdo sde): ba'am dmo' ba 'am/bde ba 'am/gal te rang ba'am/gal tA nye ba de dag thams cad mi 'gro//rnam par mi 'gro//mi skye/mi 'byung bdag med/bdag gi
213a4(mdo sde): med par brtag par bya'o//zad pa'i tshul dang /zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang /rtog pa med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i tshu la dang /'byung ba med cing mtshan ma med
213a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis brtag par bya'o//ji ltar rdul shin tu phra ba kun 'byung ba dang /lus kun 'byung ba'i phyir nang gi sa'i khams sra bar brtag par bya'o//shin tu phra ba'i rdul
213a6(mdo sde): bcig po de la ji ltar lhag mthong phra mos brtag/rdul phra mo gcig pa de la ji ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i nyon mod pa thams cad kyi spyod lam du gyur par rab tu shes pa dag med
213a7(mdo sde): pa dang /rnam pa dang bral bar rab tu shes/dngos po med pa dang /tshig gi lam dang bral ba dang /dmigs pa med pa dang sgra dbyangs thams cang dang dral bar rab tu shes///
213b1(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang bral ba dang /bdud kyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes/yi ge med pa dang /rgyu dang rkyen dang bral bar rab tu shed/dngos po med pa dang /rgyu dang rgyan dang bral bar rab tu shes//
213b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa las rdul shin tu phra ba rab tu shes/ji ltar 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi ba la rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis rdul shin tu phra mo gcig tu brtag go/de bzhin du
213b3(mdo sde): gnyis pa dang /de bzhin du gsum pa nas nang gi lus thams cad kyi bar du gcig la'ang so sor rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis rdul shin tu phra mo gcig tu brtag go//nang gi lus
213b4(mdo sde): jilta ba de bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus kyi sku'i khams kyang rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis so sor rdul shin tu phra bar brtag go//mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med par bar dus
213b5(mdo sde): khams thams cad nang gi 'am/phyi rol gyi 'am/che ba'am phra ba 'am/dma' ba'am/bde ba 'am/gang ring ba'am/gang nye ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su
213b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //gang zad pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'o//gang mi rtag pa 'di'ang sdug bsngal ba'o//gang mi 'byung ba de bdag med pa'o//gang 'du byed thams cad skye
213b7(mdo sde): tshig gi lam dang bral ba de rang stong pa ste/ji ltar phyi dang nang gi sa'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar
214a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//nam mkha' ji ltar 'du shes med cing tshor ba med pa de bzhin du sa'i khams kyang 'du shes med cing tshor ba med pa dang /mi rtag pa dang /
214a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa nye
214a3(mdo sde): bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yo lus 'di la gA sher bI mtshan nyid ni chu ste/chu'i mtshan nyid phran tshegs su na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam du nad
214a4(mdo sde): gi lus chu'i khams thams cad so sor thigs bu tsam du lhag mthong gi tshul gyi brtag go che ba'am phra ba 'am/dmara' ba'am/bde ba'i mtshan nyid med pa nyon mongs pa thams
214a5(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa na so mtshan mi myed pa'i bar du de dag thigs pa tsam du 'du byed thams cad nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes pa ji lta bur thigs pa gcig
214a6(mdo sde): la rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzi/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /de bzhin du gsum po nas nang gi lus kyi chu'i khams thams cad rnam pa brkyang po de dag
214a7(mdo sde): gris so so re ra la thigs pa phra ba ji lta ba bzhin du brtag go/ rkyen nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du nang gi chu'i khams ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi rol gyi chu'i khams
214b1(mdo sde): /ams samamasamama.amathas mthaHthas mam ma ma/mas lams
214b2(mdo sde): rgyo ba'am/phra ba 'am/dmar ba'am/bde ba 'am/gang ring ba 'am/gang nye ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //gang zad pa'i chos de 'dra
214b3(mdo sde): mi rtag pa'o//de'ang rtog pa med pa'o//gang rtog pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o//gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o//gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi
214b4(mdo sde): lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste/ji ltar nang dang phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang tha ma'i nyon mongs po zhi bar 'gyur ro//nam
214b5(mdo sde): mkha' ji ltar gnas med cing spros pa med pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chu'i khams kyang spros pa med cing gnas med pa dang /mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang //
214b6(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba ste/sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams
214b7(mdo sde): ji lta ba de bzhin du me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams rgya chen pos bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gzugs ni the tshom gyi rgyu lta bu ste/nang gi 'am/
214b8(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi 'am/tsha ba 'am/phra ba'am/dmar ba 'am/bde ba'am/gang ring ba'am/gang nye ba de dag thams cad dngos po med cing gzugs brnyan ljang dang /drug gyi
215a1(mdo sde): /skye mched dbang du gyur pa/sa'i khams nas rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i bar du'o//gang skad ts+tshag smad cig tu 'byung ba zad pa 'chos nyid byung za
215a2(mdo sde): bzad pa dang /'gog pa de ni 'byung ba zang pa nyid du brtag go//dngos po med pa dang bdag med par dmigs pa/tshig gi lam med pa dang /rnam par mi 'gro ba dang /
215a3(mdo sde): mu skyes pa dang /ma byung ba dang /bdag med pa dang /bdag gi med pa dang /zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang /rtog pa med cing smod pa med kyi tshul dang /mtshan ma
215a4(mdo sde): med po'i tshul dang /lhag mthong gi tshul gyis brtag par bya'o//mtshan nyid med pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /rnam pa dang bral ba dang /bdag
215a5(mdo sde): med pa dang /yid kyi 'du byed dang bral ba dang /yi ge mod pa dang /rgyu dang rkyen dang bral bar rab tu shes so//dngos po med pa shin tu skad cig ma dang bral bar rab tu
215a6(mdo sde): shes so//'dra byed thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /yul rgyun chad po med par ra' tu shes so//'du byed thams cad gnas med cing nye bar ni byar rab tu shes so//
215a7(mdo sde): rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs dngos po med pa dbye ba'i phung po ltar brtag go//mtshan nyid med pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i bar du de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag pa
215b1(mdo sde): sa su da //gang byung ba'i rgyas de d+hag ra//gang ma rtag padun rtog pa med //klung rtog pa med pa de 'du sdug bsngal byan//glang 'byung ba med pa de 'ang
215b2(mdo sde): bdag myed pa'o//gang 'du byed thams cad kyi rlo ma dang la bye 'i stong ba'o//gang nang de phyi rol gyi gzugs de dge skye ba'i slong po ste bu dngas pa med cing gzigs brnyan ltabu
215b3(mdo sde): stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rang 'bring dang tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//namakha' ji ltar dmigs pa med cing 'dus byas pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs
215b4(mdo sde): kyang sgrub stu bur 'du shes pa med cing 'gyur ba med pa dang /tshor ba med pa dang /mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba
215b5(mdo sde): babyed pa snyam par byeng 'di dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sems can mongs su smin pa ni par 'tsho ba'i bzod pa blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi gzhan yang gzugs ni phyi rol dang
215b6(mdo sde): gyi gnas gang nye bo'i bar du rung bzhin gyi sag su ldan lta bu'i rgyu 'dra ba mngon par mi 'gyur ba dang /su ma lte bu dang /lus mngon pa'i mtshan nyid du brtag go/gzugs ni
215b7(mdo sde): cila'ang chags pa med/snyems pa'ang med/tha~Mng ba dir ni nga med par shes te/gzugs kyi gnyis su med do//chos tham mas kyi dbyings la yang dag par gan
216a1(mdo sde): par shes pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs thams cad cung zad kyang dbyer med do//tshig gi lam thams cad gnas med par yang dag par shes sa//
216a2(mdo sde): gzugs ni gzhan du song ba'ang med cing yul med pa dang /blo bur gyi sdug bsngal ba dang /rgyun bcad pa dang rgyun ma bcad pa'i mdud pa gnyis dang bral ba dang /gzugs brnyan
216a3(mdo sde): lta bu dang /gnas med par brtag go/gzugs thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni lbu ba'i phung po lta bur dmigs pa med pa dang /kun 'byung ba med pa dang /shin tu rang bzhin med
216a4(mdo sde): par brtag go/'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni rnam par dag pa/rnam par mi rtog pa/mi 'byung ba/mngon par mi sgrub pa/chos thams cad spros pa'i rgyun bcad pa thams cad
216a5(mdo sde): du zhugs pa med par brtag go//'byung ba chen po bzhi gzun kyi bung blo mtshan nyid ni snyems pa med pa dang /gtong ba med pa dang /mun pa med pa dang /snang ba med pa dang /yid
216a6(mdo sde): la mi byed pa dang /gnyis su med pa dang /sogs pa med pa dang /spros pa med pa dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dbyer med pa dang /dngos po med par brtag go//gzugs 'byung
216a7(mdo sde): ba chen po bzhi ni shin tu rnam par mi rtog pa dang /zad pa dang /lbu ba lta bur blta'o//rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs la dngos po med pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rtog go//mtshon
216b1(mdo sde): nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du 'du byed thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //gang zad pa'i chos nga mi rtag pa'o//gang mi rtag pa de rtog pa med pa'o//
216b2(mdo sde): gang rtog pa med pa de sdug bsngal ba'o//gong 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o//gang 'du/byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste/ji ltar phyi dang nang gi gzug
216b3(mdo sde): lbu ba 'dra ba stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'ang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//nam mkha' ji ltar zad pa med cing gzugs med pa dang bstan
216b4(mdo sde): du med pa de bzhin du zad pa med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang /gzugs med pa dang /bstan du med pa dang /lbu ba lta bur mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /
216b5(mdo sde): stong pa'i mtshan nyid la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'i nga byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho bar blta'o//rigs kyi bu
216b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i mtshan nyid nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gang smras pa de'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni mig yor lta bu dang /grib ma lta bu dang /lbu ba lta bu
216b7(mdo sde): gnas med pa dang /nam mkha' lta bu chags pa med pa dang /brjod du med pa dang /sogs pa med pa nas khams gsum gyi 'khro ba bdag med pa lta bu dang /dus gsum gyi mtshan
217a1(mdo sde): nyid thob pa dang /dmigs pa med pa dang /yi ge med pa dang /gnyis su med pa'i mthara' dang /rtag pa'i mtha' dang /kun tu gzung bar mtha' dang /zang
217a2(mdo sde): pa med par spyod pa'i mtha' dang /nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtha' dang /yul med pa'i mtha' dang /rab tu rgyu ba med pa'i mtha' dang /smra ba med pa'i mtha' dang /gzugs brnyan lta
217a3(mdo sde): bur gzugaso de'i mtshan nyid du rab du shes so//'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang de gnyis kyi gzugs kyi snang ba nam mkha' lta bur brtag go/mig yor gyi mtshan
217a4(mdo sde): nyid nam mkha' lta bur dngos por dmigs pa med pa ste/nam mkha' ji lta bur bzung du med cing kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /dngos po med pa de ltar de bzhin du gzugs kyi
217a5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyang mig yor lta bu dang /tshu rol dang pha rol bral ba'i gnas med pa'o//gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /lbu ba'i phung po
217a6(mdo sde): lta bu dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs kyi sgra brnyan ni khams med pa dang /tha dad pa med pa dang /mtshungs pa med pa dang /'khrug pa med pa'o//
217a7(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang nam mkhar lta dug//gzugs kyi snang ba de'ang gzung du med pa dang /bsags pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'byung ba meng pa dang /nam/
217b1(mdo sde): nga med pa dang /'gyur ba med pa dang /'chi 'pho ba med pa dang /mi gnas pa dang /bdag dang gzhan gyi la mi len pa dang /yongs su mi rtog pa dang /chags pa med pa dang /byas
217b2(mdo sde): pa med pa thams cad gzugs kyi snang ba'o//da ltar de bzhin du 'du byed thams cad kyi lam las shin tu 'das shing mig gi rnam par shes pa'i lam kun nas ldang ba/lbu ba'i phung
217b3(mdo sde): bo lta bu'i gzugs kyi snang ba mig gi rnam par shes pas snang ba de'ang mig 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyu'o//bdag med pa'i phyir 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang stong pa ste/ji ltar gong
217b4(mdo sde): du bshad pa bzhin du bdag tu dmigs pa'ang med do//mig gnyis ni dgun 'brum tsam ste/mig re re la'ang tshad med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'o//rdul shin tu phra ba la'ang 'byung ba
217b5(mdo sde): chen po bzhi po sogs so//'byung ba chen po bzhi po re la'ang bdag tu mi dmigs shing sems can du mi dmigs na/de la rnam par shes pa'i gnas sam/kun nas ldang ba'ang
217b6(mdo sde): lam du shes par lta ci smos/rdul shin tu phra ba de dang de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du mig 'byung ba chen po bsags pa dang /dgun 'brum tsam du yongs su brtag go//yongasu brtags
217b7(mdo sde): pa des de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa dang lam yang med do//des yang dag par yongs su brtags pas sems can mig yongs su brtags par 'gyur ro//gang mig
218a1(mdo sde): gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa de dag 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gro'o//ji ltar yang mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin
218a2(mdo sde): du rab tu shes pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi/mig mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o//ji ltar yang mig gis gzugs kyi snang ba lbu ba'i
218a3(mdo sde): phung po lta bu phyi dang nang gi gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba nas nye ba'i bar du de dag thams cad lbu ba'i phung po gzugs kyi snang ba 'byung ba chen po na mkha' la mi rten par 'gyur ro//
218a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' ji ltar dngos po med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang /mtshan nyid kyi stong pa ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba lbu ba'i phung po lta bu de dag thams cad kyang snang ba'o//ji ltar
218a5(mdo sde): gzugs gzhan gyi nam mkha' stong pa ltar nang dang phyi'i lus kyi mtshan nyid lbu ba lta bur snang ba nas nye ba'i byadu de dag thams cad gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'ang stong pa'o//ji ltar
218a6(mdo sde): mig mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams
218a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mig kyang mig dang mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /lus kyang
218b1(mdo sde): lus dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'byung ba chen po lta bu mi rtog rna bar mi rtog cing dmi Da pA yang dag par rjes mu mi mthong ngo //
218b2(mdo sde): sems can dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes pa dang /shed can dang /byed pa po dang /byed du 'jug pa dang /tshor ba po dang /tshor bar
218b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang /skye ba dang /kun tu skye ba dang /kun nas ldang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang bI mtshan ma la mtshan mas mtshan ma las dmigs pa'ang
218b4(mdo sde): med do//sems kyi gzung ba dang /gtang ba dang /mngon sum du bya ba dang /khong du chud pa dang /gnas dang /kun nas ldang ba'i gnas dang /yid la byed pa'i gzugs kyi
218b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid snang ba dmigs pa med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso//gzugs kyi phung po dang /na mkha' dang /sems kyi rnam par shes pa tha dad par rab tu
218b6(mdo sde): mi shes so//khams gsum thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong par rab tu shes so//gang phyi rol dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba thams cad lbu ba'i
218b7(mdo sde): phung po lta bur stong pa nyid dang /zad pa'i tshul dang /zhi gnas la 'tshe ba med pa'i tshul dang //rtog pa med pa'i tshul dang /mi skye ba dang /mi 'gog pa dang /'byung ba
219a1(mdo sde): med pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rtog go//nam mkha' dang bral zhing gnas med pa dang /tshig lam la bal bar rab tu shes so//nang dang phyi rol
219a2(mdo sde): gyi 'du byed nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad 'jig pa'i chos dang /zad pa'i chos dang /dngos pa'i rgyun chad pa stong pa dang /'khrug pa rgyun chad pa ji lta ba
219a3(mdo sde): bzhin du rab du shes so//gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad zad pa'i chos de'ang mi rtag pa'o//gang brtag pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o//gang 'byung ba med pa
219a4(mdo sde): de'ang bdag med pa'o//gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi mtshan nyid kyi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste/gang phyi dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid stong pa
219a5(mdo sde): thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro//'di ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun gcod pa med pa'i bzod pa'o//
219a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' ji ltar rlung med pa de bzhin du bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o//nam mkha' ji ltar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba med pa'i bzod pa'o//
219a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' ji ltar brtsegs pa med cing gnod pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pas gtses pa med cing gnod pa med pa'i bzod pa'o//nam mkha'
219b1(mdo sde): ji ltar bag la nyal ba thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin du tshig gi lam thams cad bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o//nam mkha' ji ltar ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du mtshan
219b2(mdo sde): nyid thams cad sngar ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa bsgrubs pa'o//nam mkha' ji ltar spros pa med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi bag la nyal ba thams cad spros pa med pa'i bzod
219b3(mdo sde): pa'o//nam mkha' ji ltar khams gsum par gtogs pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba khams gsum par gtogs pa'ang mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /
219b4(mdo sde): stong pa dang /bdag med pa mtshan nyid dmigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par
219b5(mdo sde): blta bar bya'o//yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////rigs kyi bu
219b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas tshor ba'i phung po'ang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o//de la tshor ba'i phung po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshor ba'i tshogs rnam pa drug ste/mig
219b7(mdo sde): gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba ste/'di dag ni tshor
220a1(mdo sde): ba'i phung po zhes bya'o//tshor ba'i phung po de la tshor ba rnam pa gsum du shes par 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/bde bar tshor ba dang /sdug bsngal bar
220a2(mdo sde): tshor ba dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal du'ong mi shes par tshor bya ste/'di dge rnam gsum ni tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa brgyad
220a3(mdo sde): po 'di dag gis tshor ba'i phung po tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o//de la brgyad gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum ste/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /ga
220a4(mdo sde): mug ces bya'o//nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag gis sems can nyon mongs pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba zag pa zad pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro//nyon mongs pa'i
220a5(mdo sde): rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag tshor ba rnam pa gsum la zhugs pa de la nyon mongs pa rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ro//de la tsher ba'i tshogs drug gis tshor ba rnam gsum tshul bzhin du brtag
220a6(mdo sde): par bya'o//tshor ba rnam gsum gyis nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba dang /las kyi rtsa ba dang /zad pa'i rtsa ba nub pa tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o//de mig gis gzugs kyi
220a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid snang ba dma' ba'am bde ba 'am/che ba 'am/phra ba 'am/gang nye ba 'am/gang ring bar mthong ba de la tshor ba 'byung ngo //gang gzugs bde ba 'am/che ba 'am
220b1(mdo sde): b+hA ba'am/gang+gA rlung ba'am/nye bar mthong ba de la tshor ba skyed pa'i gnas chu'i chu bur lta bu dang /mngon par dga' bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba do la'ang tshul bzhon du brtag par bya/
220b2(mdo sde): ji ltar yang mig mig gi spyong pa nas ji ltar gang du bshad pa'i bar du de glo bur dang /lus ma yin pa dang /gnas med pa dang /gzugs med pa dang /bstan du med pa dang /
220b3(mdo sde): dngos po med pa dang /yi ge med pa tshor ba chu'i chu bur lta bur 'byung ngo //'dod chags kyi kun tu bsgribs pa 'byung ngo //slong ba po'am/dgod pa po 'am/kun tu rgyu ba po 'am/
220b4(mdo sde): so ra yang mi shes so//'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bdag po med pa dang /'gog pa la'ang bdag po med pa dang /mtshan nyid tshor ba la'ang bdag po med pa ste/mtshan nyid med
220b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'di dag thams cad la'ang srog med pa dang /srog dang bral ba dang /sems can med pa dang /sems can dang bral ba dang /gso ba med pa dang /gso ba dang bral ba dang /
220b6(mdo sde): gang zag med pa dang /gang zag dang bral ba dang /'dod pa med pa dang /dngos po med pa dang /mtshan nyid med pa dang /bdag po med pa dang /mtshan nyid 'jigs pa dang /zad pa'i
220b7(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dngos po med pa dang /dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' la des de dag stod do//brjod du med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
221a1(mdo sde): pa 'ad nags ni mthu 'dus dngag myung //rgyund myeng rgyas rna ma dus da / //ga pa yo 'a rgyu dang/
221a2(mdo sde): kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //mtshan ma med pa 'ded chags kyi mtha' la ngas de dag byung ngo //skyon pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la dus de dag stong ngo //tshor ba med pa 'dod
221a3(mdo sde): chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //byed pa pa'i rnam pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag sto //shes med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la ngas de dag stong ngo //len pa med pa
221a4(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //grol ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //dngos po med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //mun pa med pa
221a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //snang ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dmigs pa rnam par sogs so//gnas sam byed du
221a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa'am/sogs par bye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sems sgyu ma lta bu dang //dus gsum kyi dod chags dngos po dang dngos pomed pa yongs su na bar yang rnam
221a7(mdo sde): ba ston go//ji lta ba banon du shes pa cil 'ang chags pa med do//thams cad la mi rten pa dang mi gnas pa dang /len pa cad pa dang /'bros pa med pa la gnyis su mi byed do//rjes
221b1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyes su yang dag par gnol bar shes pas cung zad kyang dbye bar mibyed do//de chags pa'i gzugs la skyems rtogs pa dang /gzugs da tshor ba gnyis bram la//dang
221b2(mdo sde): chags pa'i gzugs la tshor ba gang chu'i chu bur lta bu dang /gang 'byung bzod pa 'jog pa gag pa nid ni du byed nyigang med 'o//tsan bu ma nga da nga sbyin pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o//byung
221b3(mdo sde): 'dod chags de la brjod du med pa'i tshor ba dang /dus gsum gyi bsgom pa thob pa 'di'ang 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu byed pa'i sgo'o//khams gsum gyi 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba po med
221b4(mdo sde): pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa 'di'ang mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o//gang 'dod chags kyi kun gni tshor bablang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang /tshig gi lam bdag med pa dang /
221b5(mdo sde): yi ger dmigs pa med pa dang //mas pas kyi tshor ba yul med cing mig mir med pa 'di'ang 'du byed rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro//bdag med pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o//gang khams
221b6(mdo sde): gsum rnams cad la tshor ba dngos po myed pa dang /snang ba med pa dang /yi ga med pa dang /brjod du med pa dang /zad pa med pa dang ci la' chags pa med pa de/de ltar rab 'bring dang
