321b7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa/khro ba mi snyan pa/brnyas me shin byed pa/bkres pa/skom pa/dbyug pas 'tsheg pa/grang ba dang /che ba dang /rlung gis gdungs kyang dam pa'i
322a1(mdo sde): chos kyi mig gnas kyi bar du yul dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /'or gyi grong dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chos rgyu
322a2(mdo sde): mig 'di la brtson par bya ba dang /zab mo chos thams cad kyi sgo'i gzhi dang /bzod pa 'di rab tu bstan pa dang /bzod pa 'di la sems can yang rab tu sbyor
322a3(mdo sde): ba drang /gang bzod pa 'di bsgom pa dang /klog pa dang /gzhan la'ang lung 'bog pa dang /klog tu 'jug pa dang /gang yang nyan pa dang /'bri ba dang /
322a4(mdo sde): 'drir 'jug pa de dag la spro bar bya ba dang /chos dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /byed pa sgrub par khyed las su dag spro bar 'gyur/de'i
322a5(mdo sde): tshe byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar te phyag bcol nas 'di skad
322a6(mdo sde): ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams sbyar bar
322a7(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i bar dang /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam la 'brir stsal pa de dag bdag cag chos dang ljon pa la sbyor bar bgyi bar spro'o//bcom ldan 'das
322b1(mdo sde): kyis da//'astsal pa/rigs kyi bu dgra skyes bu chen po'i byed pa bya ba dang /ji ltar rigs kyi bu khyed yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa
322b2(mdo sde): 'di thob pa ni leg so legs so//rigs kyi bu ji tsam du bzod pa 'di'i stobs dang /brtson pa yang dag par 'dzin cing brtson pa la dmigs pa de tsam du stobs
322b3(mdo sde): dang brtson pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la brtson par dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /gling bzhi thams cad dang /yul dang /grong dang /grong khyer
322b4(mdo sde): dradrung /grong rdal dang /ljongs thams cad du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byos shig/rgyal po la ma glayo bar byos shig/blon po dang /zhabs
322b5(mdo sde): ring ba rnams kyang yal bar ma btang zhig/rigs kyi bu gang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du da ltar nas chos kyi rgyal mtshon 'phel bar 'gyur gyis bar du
322b6(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skye bar spro zhing sdig pa 'dod pa log par lta ba'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'jug pa dang /rab tu
322b7(mdo sde): dgod pa dang /nyes pa mang po'i shas che ba'o sems can rnams khyim gyis gnas nas byung ste/zhi ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing sbyor ba dang /bslab pa'i
323a1(mdo sde): gnas la rab tu 'god pa dang /nyes pa mang pos nyen la/lus dang /ngag dang yid sdom pa'i tshul can gyi sems can rnams bsam gtan
323a2(mdo sde): dang /rnam par thar pa dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa la sbyor zhing so sor 'god pa dang dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan la mngon par dga' la/sems can
323a3(mdo sde): yang de la sbyor zhing de dag phan pa la sbyor ba dang /ser sna tson rnams sbyin pa la sbyor ba nas/'chal pa'i shes rab can sdig pa'i bas mtha'i spyod yul dang
323a4(mdo sde): ldan pa/lto ba'i thobs po la gnas pa rnams 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi stobs la sbyor zhing so sor 'god de//sems can sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis non
323a5(mdo sde): pab rnams yongs su thar par byed pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang bar 'phel lo//'di la gang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dam pa'i
323a6(mdo sde): chos 'jig pa'i dus nyin mtshon bdun du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skyo ba bzod cing bzod pa'i stobs kyi mthu 'dis sems can yongs su smin
323a7(mdo sde): par byed cing chung ngu na bzod pa 'di yang dag par len du 'dzud do//sems can rnams la ston cing tshig tu 'don pa dang /glegs bam la 'drir 'jug pa ni
323b1(mdo sde): bsod nams rab tu mang du 'byol te/yongs su dag pa'i spangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu byang chub sems dra ba' grangs med pa chu klung gang+gA'i bcu'i bye ma skyed kyis pha rol
323b2(mdo sde): tu phyin pa drug spyad pa ni bsod nams kyi phung pa de snyed du mi 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rango bzhin gyis snying rje
323b3(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa'o//sems can chen po de dag ni dgos pa chen po la brtson pa dang ldan pa'o//sems can chen po de dag ni brtson 'grus che ba
323b4(mdo sde): shes rab kyis brgyan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni rab tu myur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang tu mngon par 'tshang
323b5(mdo sde): rgya ba'o//gang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa 'dis
323b6(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas/glegs bam la 'brir 'jug pa'i bar du sbyor zhing dam pa'i chos 'jig pa na chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar byed pas na
323b7(mdo sde): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/myur du bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya'o//bcom ldan 'das
324a1(mdo sde): kyis nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bsngags pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu klung
324a2(mdo sde): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom
324a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa grangs ma mchis po dag tu mchis te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par brtsams te/da ltar
324a4(mdo sde): nas ma mchis pa'i dus kyi bar du nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba thams cad btong ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
324a5(mdo sde): yongs su dag par mchi bar sdom pa blangs pa las da ni bdag cog rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sdom pa blangs te ma mchis pa'i dus na/slar zhing sangs rgyas kyi
324a6(mdo sde): zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par mi bgyid do//smon lam gyi dbang gis bdog cig rnams yongs su ma dag pa nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas
324a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod par brgya ni//dge ba'i rtsa ba ma mchis pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes
324b1(mdo sde): du dam pa dag brtson 'grus chen po la dmigs te byang chub sems dpa' gang de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa legaso legs so//
324b2(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing pha rol tu phyin pa chen po spyad de mngon par shes pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po la gzhan la rag ma lus shing ye shes chen po'i 'byung gnas dang
324b3(mdo sde): ldan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yongasu ma dag cing nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu pha rol tu phyinang drug spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
324b4(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su nyams pa'i sems can rnams dang /sdug bsngal thams cad kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
324b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na ci nas kyang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'dis sems can yongs su smin
324b6(mdo sde): par gyis shig/rigs kyi bu yul gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad pa'i yul der yon tan gyi khyad par dang
324b7(mdo sde): dpal phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i rgyal po yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste/bzhi gang zhe na/rgyal po nad med par 'gyur ba dang /gnod
325a1(mdo sde): pa nyung zhing tshe ring bar 'byung ba dang /rdul dang bral zhing rgol ba dang dgra med par 'gyur ba dang //stobs dang rtsal thags thogs med cing dga'
325a2(mdo sde): bA mang la chos 'dod par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar klu dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnams
325a3(mdo sde): kyis rab tu srung bar 'gyur te/bzhin bzangs dag dang de la de ltar mnyam pa med do//brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /gnod sbyin gyi
325a4(mdo sde): bdag po rnams kyis tshig mthun par gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags te/yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i rgyal por 'gyur ba
325a5(mdo sde): de'i slad bzhin du bdag cag 'brang zhing gnod pa las bskyab par bgyi'o//bro nad zhi bar bgyi'o//de'i tshe bskyang bar bgyi'o//de dgra las bskyab par bgyi'o//
325a6(mdo sde): dpal dang skal pa bzang po dang chos la dga' ba nye bar bston par bgyi'o//stobs dang rtsal thags thogs ma mchis pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o//bcom
325a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzangs dag legs so leg so//khyod ji skad smras pa bzhin du nyams su long zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'os
325b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yul gang du chos dang ldan par 'gyur bar bdang /cag mdangs dang /stobs dang /gzi brjid dang /'khor 'phel bar 'gyur ro//de dag gis
325b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/yul gang du bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul deng rgyal po'i zhabs ring ba deng /blon po rnams kyi yon
325b3(mdo sde): tan dang /legs pa bzhi 'byung ste/bzhi gang zhe na/yul der rgyal po'i zhabs ring ba dang /blon po rnams phan tshun bzod pa dang /nges pa dang /dga' ba dang /
325b4(mdo sde): gus pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang /rgyal po'ang byams par 'gyur ba dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /grong rdal gyi mi dang /ljongs kyi mi skyes pa dang /bud med dang /
325b5(mdo sde): khye'u dang /bu mo rnams kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /chos 'dod par 'gyur gyi rnyed pa mi 'dod do/phyogs bcur grags pa'i sgra dang /tshigs su bcad pa rgya
325b6(mdo sde): cher grags shing tshe ring ba dang /bde ba dang /yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba ste/yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de ni rgyal po'i zhabs ring ba dang /blon pa
325b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags par 'gyur ba ni de dag go/gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der dge sbyong dang /bram ze rnams kyi yon tan
326a1(mdo sde): dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste/ban dang nan/yul dor dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /na dang
326a2(mdo sde): bsos sman dang /yo byad dag rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /bsam gtan byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba dang /ri la mngon par dga' zhing rab tu dben par 'gyur ba dang /
326a3(mdo sde): sems las byung ba'i bde ba bzhi la gnas brnyed par 'gyur ro//yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i yul de'i grong rdal dang ljongs kyi mi rnams kyi legs pa
326a4(mdo sde): bkri 'byung bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na//dran pa dang /chu mig dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /gnod pa med par 'gyur ba dang /las kyi ma'i grub par 'gyur ba dang /
326a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i gnas snod du gyur pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o//gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i yul der bud med rnams kyi legs pa
326a6(mdo sde): bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur to/bzhi gang zhe na/yul de'i bud med drag dag dang khro ba rnam par spong bar 'gyur ba dang /skye bo thams cad la bzod par 'gyur ba dang /
326a7(mdo sde): burnyed par 'gyur ba dang /nad nyung bar 'gyur ba'o//gzhan yang bud med gang bzang ba 'di nyan pa de la dang ba rnyed cing chos sgrub la phan pa zer ba de ni bud med du gyur
326b1(mdo sde): ba'i tha ma yin te//snying po byang chub kyi bar du bud mod thob par mi 'gyur te/gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis 'dod pa ni mA gtogaso//gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di
326b2(mdo sde): 'chad par 'gyur ba dag ni gzhan gyi 'khor dang /nang gi 'khor gyis yul la gnod par mi 'gyur ro//char mi 'bab pa dang /mu ge 'byung ba dang /dus ma yin pa'i
326b3(mdo sde): rlung dang /char dang /grang dro dang /shA sbrang dang /sbrang bu mchu spyang dang /sbrang ma dang /byi ba dang /'gro ba khro bo dang /sbrul khra bo dang /gcan zan khro bo dang /ro bro ba

327a3(mdo sde): de mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//gang gis bzod pa bsgom pa 'di thog thag nyan pa ni sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs te bla na med pa yang dag par
327a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/de ltar mthu che bgo//rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems drang ba rnams kyi dga' bar byed pa/rgyun du byed
327a5(mdo sde): pa/phyir mi ldog par byed pa/rnam par rtsen par byed pa/'jug par byed pa/gzugs zhi bar byed po/mongs su smin par byed pa/bral bar byed pa/byang chub

327a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par spyod
327b1(mdo sde): po'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di sems can rnams la bshad de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par dgod pa

328a2(mdo sde): pa dang /phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'khor gyi 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

328a4(mdo sde): bod skad du/'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs

328b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba/yod pa dang med pa shes pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas chos kyi rnam grangs la mkhas pa/mngon par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te spyan
328b7(mdo sde): lngas sems can rnams kyi dbang po rtogs pa/gzi brjid dang dpal dpag tu med pa skye ba mang po nas kyi bsam gtan dang shes rab kyis sems su sbyangs te mtshan dang dpe byad
329a1(mdo sde): bzang pos brgyan cing mchog dang ldan par byed pa/sems na mkha' dang 'dra ba 'jig rten gyi gzugs dang kha dog yongs su btang ste/

329a3(mdo sde): bas mnyam pa med pa la bsnyen pa//dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring po nas bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi dbang phyug theb pa/ye shes dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa

329a6(mdo sde): te/nad gso ba'i cho ga la mkhas pas nad kyi rkyen bzhin du sman byin nas 'khor ba las yongasu thar par rnyed pa/gong gis thos kyang ma grol ba med pa de lta bu'i yin
329a7(mdo sde): tan chad med pa dang ldan pa/sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa la mchod pa myong ba/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la shin tu rig pa/de bzhin gshegs pa yun du
329b1(mdo sde): gnas par shes pa/rtag par yang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod par bshad pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam
329b2(mdo sde): dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'od mi g.yo dang /byang chub sems dpa' klu shing ljon pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /byang chub

329b5(mdo sde): tshon mdzod dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'grus dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong dang /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid la dad pa dod byang chub sed 'thub med dang /byang
329b6(mdo sde): chub seMs dpa' byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri drug stong dang /mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dang /
329b7(mdo sde): dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /doge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa la thogs pa dang /tshangs
330a1(mdo sde): pa dang /brgya byin la sogs te grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lha dang lhan cig tu na mkha' la 'khod te/lha'i rin po che'i me tog gi chur pad nas
330a2(mdo sde): rol mo sil snyan yang grangs med dpag tu med pa sgra rang 'byin pa byas te/lha tshangs pas sam pa ra'i spos kyi bdug pa dri zhim pos bdugs te/de bzhin gshegs
330a3(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa'i sprin phung phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams kun khyab par gyur te/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /phyogs bcu'i chos thams
330a4(mdo sde): cad dang /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la kun tu mchod yon gsol bar gyur to//de ltar lha rnams kyis mchod pa phul nas theg pa
330a5(mdo sde): chen po bla na med pa'i lam tshol ba'i phyir ro//de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas bkor ba de dag dang thabs gcig/
330a6(mdo sde): NA shing se la chen po ga la ba de logs su gshegs nas dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshe sa bco lnga la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i khur/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs
330a7(mdo sde): kyis byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad sdud cing skyob par dgongs te/gsung dbyangs chen po phyung nas sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par so so'i skad bzhin
330b1(mdo sde): du sems can thams cad la bka' stsal pa/dreng ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can la thugs brtse bar dgongs so//
330b2(mdo sde): sems can la srung zhing skyob par dgongs so//sems can bsdud cing bzhes par dgongs so//sems can la snyoms par gzigs pa ni dper na bu gcig la lta ba
330b3(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar rten med pa la brten bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid ma mthong ba ni mthong bar bya'o//nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni bral ba bya'o//bde ba med pa ni bde
330b4(mdo sde): bar bya'o//ma grol ba ni rnam por grol bar bya'o//longs spyod med pa ni longs spyod dang ldan par bya'o//the tshom dang ma bral ba nr-i the tshom dang bral bar bya'o//'gyod
330b5(mdo sde): tshangs ma byas pa ni 'gyod pa tshangs par bya'o//mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni mya ngan los bzla bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /de'i tshe de'i dus na lam gyi g.yas
330b6(mdo sde): g.yon du so gzhi mnyam pa thang bzang po yongs su dag pa/bkra shis kyis chu zheng du mnyam por dpag tshang stong phrag bcu bcu yod par bcom ldan 'das kyis
330b7(mdo sde): gzigs nas mod la der gzhes te/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gnas 'dir ni chos bshad pa'i sar 'os so zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
331a1(mdo sde): dge slong kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon rtag tu ri dang /tshal dang /
331a2(mdo sde): chab gcing ma 'bab pa dang /bza' shing gi ra ba dang /me tog dag mchis pa la dgyes na deng 'dir ni char 'bab pa'ang ma mchis/shing dang tshal yang ma mchis/grong
331a3(mdo sde): khyim dang /bza' shing gi ra ba dang /mi phal yang ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das 'dir ci la dgyes te bzhugs shing chos bshad des gsungs/phal shul ring po nas
331a4(mdo sde): mchi ba/bkres skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams srog kyang mi 'tsho ste/zas mchis na ni srog mchis/srog mchis na ni lus mchis/lus
331a5(mdo sde): mchis na ni chos lam yang mchis so//zas ma mchis na srog ma mchis/srog ma mchis na lus ma mchis/lus ma mchis na chos lam yang ma mchis lags
331a6(mdo sde): nad 'di'i nang du 'di lta bu yid la bab pa gang yang ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'dir chos bshad ces gsungs/de nas shes rab chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bus
331a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis bdud kyis kun dga' bo la smras pa/sngar chos kyi phyir zhu ba'i rigs kyi gzhan bsam mi dgos so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni stobs bcu dang /mi 'jin
331b1(mdo sde): banor ma zas kyad btsun gshegs pa la stobs dpag tu med pa dang /ces kyang mo bsgrengs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dpag tu med pa dang /gzi brjid dang /rdzu 'phrul
331b2(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa mnga' ste/gang brten med pa ni rten du mdzad/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ma mthong ba ni mthong bar mdzad/nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni bral bar mdzad/bde ba
331b3(mdo sde): med pa ni bde ba la reg par mdzad/ma grol ba ni rnam par grol bar mdzad/longs spyod dang mi ldan pa ni longs spyod dang ldan par mdzad/mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni yongs su mya
331b4(mdo sde): ngan las bzla bar mdzad de/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa la rang 'byung med pa'i mya ngan bya
331b5(mdo sde): dgos/bdag dran pa sngon dra ma chen po dri ma med par grags pas phal mang po 'i chos bstan pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
331b6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i lha dang /klu la sogs po'i phal mang ba khang pa'i nang du 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshon zas dag mi snang nas
331b7(mdo sde): bdag gi de'i tshe phal mang po 'di rnams kyi zas ji ltar 'byor snyam bsams pa las dri ma med par grags pas bdag la smras pa/nyan thos shes rab dman pa yang dag pa'i
332a1(mdo sde): chos bsam pa'i rigs kyi thog ma nas zas dang /gos dang /khri stan la sogs pa sgyu ma'i rdzas la ci'i phyir rnam par rtog ces dri ma chen po dri ma med
332a2(mdo sde): par grags pas de skad smras pa'i tshe lha dang /mi rnams ni chos lam thob bdag ni skyengs te khyod da ltar smras pa 'ang de dang 'dra'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun
332a3(mdo sde): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/dga' bo blo gros kyi mchog shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa bden te/theg pa chen po bsam pa'i rigs kyi lus bde ba'i phyir bsem pa me yin no//
332a4(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas byin gyis brlabs kyi mod las der gser gyi me tog gcig dbus nas byung ste/de'i 'phang du dpag tshad khri phrag
332a5(mdo sde): bzhi bcu yod la/stong khams kun kyang chub par g.yogs nas bai DUr+ya'i dra bas kyang gser gyi me tog khyab par g.yogs te/me tog de'i 'og tu rin po che'i khrus kyi rdzing
332a6(mdo sde): bu yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu zhes bya bas yongs su gang ba/de'i ngos bzhir me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po la 'di lta ste/me tog ut+pa la dang /ku mu dA dang /
332a7(mdo sde): pad+ma dang /puN+Da ri ka la sogs pa rnam pa mang po dpag tu med pas rin po che'i rdzing rnam par brgyan pa byung nas/gang la la zhig gis gser gyi me tog dang /rin po
332b1(mdo sde): tshetsho rjong zla mthong ba tsam gyis chos kyi rnam par dag pa thab na nung du zhugs te khrus byas pastu tsa smos/gal te zhugs te khyus byas pa ni rnam par dag pa dang /mi skye ba'i chos pa
332b2(mdo sde): bzod pa thob bo//gser gyi me tog de'i 'og tu seng ge'i khro rin po che las byas pa/'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa byung ste/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che'i khri de la
332b3(mdo sde): bzhugs nas sku'i ba spu'i bu ga dang /yan lag kun nas 'od zer chen po btang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer yang gser gyi me tog dag gi kha dog dang mthun
332b4(mdo sde): par phyogs bzhir byung bas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par snang bar byas pa'i gnas thams cad du ri lung dang /yul sa kun kyang mnyam par gyur
332b5(mdo sde): nas thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/sgo gtsigs pa'ang med la sems can de myal ba'ang zhi gnas yi dgas kyang rnam par grol te/log spyod dang dam pa'i chos
332b6(mdo sde): la dpyod pa ni ma gtogs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang /dbus kyi khams 'di dang 'dra bar gyur nas tha dad pa
332b7(mdo sde): med do//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'od zer de gzigs nas so so nas tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la leg so zhes pas bstod nas leg so lags /
333a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen pos 'od zer btang ba 'dir ni sngon gyi 'od zer dang mi 'dra ste/sngon chad kyi 'od ni shar phyogs su sngar shar na//
333a2(mdo sde): deng gi 'od ni phyogs bzhi nas dus gcig tu phyogs bcur khyab par shar ba las bltas na 'od des ni sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad khams gsum nas bton te/
333a3(mdo sde): mya ngan las bzla bar mngon no zhes gsungs so//de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams so so'i 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bka'
333a4(mdo sde): stsol pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas
333a5(mdo sde): 'od zer chen po gtong ba ni gdon mi za bar dam pa'i chos bstan cing sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba las bsgral gyi cha na/khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der
333a6(mdo sde): song la/sangs rgyas de la mchod pa phul nas the tshom rnams zhu zhing chos kyi rnam grangs nyan cing gsol ba'i rigs so//'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can
333a7(mdo sde): yongs kyis ngan cing khro la rdzun sgyu can te/theg pa gcig la ma dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byams pa chen po thab sna tshogs kyis theg pa gsum du
333b1(mdo sde): byo ste/srod pa gsum las rnam par grol bar byed do//theg pa gsum du bstan gyis kyang thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po//tshig 'bru
333b2(mdo sde): bzang po//ma 'dres pa/yongs su dag pa/yongs su dkar ba ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong du'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur/chos kyi
333b3(mdo sde): rnam grangs bshad do cog kyang thos par mi 'gyur/'khor de dag kyang tshogs 'dus pa mi 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gdan khri dang /gser gyi me tog khyad par
333b4(mdo sde): can la bzhugs pa'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//de bas na khyed rnams 'jig rten der song la/sangs rgyas de mthong zhing the tshom dag zhu na khyed rnams kyang bsod nams
333b5(mdo sde): thob la/skye bo kun la phan pa dang /bde bar yang 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu
333b6(mdo sde): bcu rang rang gi gnas nas langs te/so so'i sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas thabs gcig tu dong ste/byang chub sems dpa' re re yong rol mo rnam pa brgya stong thogs te/
333b7(mdo sde): me tog rin po che mchog tu bzang po'i char phab nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der phyin te/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas nas
334a1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas so so nas tshig gcig dang /ngag cig dang /sgra gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol lo//bcom
334a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag gsol zhing zhu ba zhig mchis na skye bo rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to//de nas bcom ldan
334a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis phas byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lo bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag the tshom yod na de kun dris shig dang /ngas khyed rnams la bye brag phyed par bshad
334a4(mdo sde): do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pas ni theg pa
334a5(mdo sde): gcig las mi bshad na/'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du theg pa gsum du bshad ces gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thogs pa med pa'i
334a6(mdo sde): ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyis bu khyed rnams sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don 'di lta bu 'dri ba legs kyis nyon cig
334a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu rnams dper na mi gcig la ming gsum yod pa lta bu ste/chung ngu'i tshe na ni byis pa zhes bya/lo nyi shu yan chod la skyes bu zhes bya/lo brgyad cu yan chad
334b1(mdo sde): 'das pa ni rgan po zhes bya'o//nga'i theg pa gsum yang de dang 'dra ste/sems rgya chung ngu nyan thos la ni theg pa chung ngu bstun/sems rgya 'bring po rang sangs rgyas la ni thog pa 'bring
334b2(mdo sde): po bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam chen po la zhugs pa mni theg pa chen po bstan te//rigs kyi bu khyed rnams yang nyon cig/mdor mtha' gnyis
334b3(mdo sde): med pa dang phyogs gcig tu mthun te/shes pa'i sgo tha dad kyang mtha' gcig tu 'du'o//mdo ni theg pa gcig ste/thabs dpyod pas gsum du dgos so//nyan thos dang /
334b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang theg pa chen po'i nang du 'dul theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//de bas na theg pa gsum yang theg pa gcig go zhes chos 'di bstan pa'i
334b5(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//dge slong brgyad brgya ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob/lha nyi khris ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob/
334b6(mdo sde): mi las khri phrag brgya stong ni med la bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod do//de nas phyogs bcu nas phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom
334b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de lo gsu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /byin
335a1(mdo sde): gyi brlabs kyis khams 'dir phyin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ba'i steng du theg pa chen po'i chos kyang thos nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag
335a2(mdo sde): gis blangs te gzungs su 'dzin par gnang bar mdzad du gsol//de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /'jig rten gyi
335a3(mdo sde): khams gzhan du ri dang /nags dang /tshal dang /shing drung dang /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /dgon pa dang /dur khrod dang //
335a4(mdo sde): mchod rten dang /gtsug lag khang dang /dge 'dun gyi gnas khang dang /chos ston pa'i sa mang po 'du ba dang /khyim pa'i gnas so so'i khyim khyim du rgya cher spel zhing
335a5(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas na ngan 'gro kun bkag par 'gyur ro//sngon de bzhin gshegs pas btud pas
335a6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad ces thos te/gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig bton na lha rnams kyang rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes te/rtag tu bsnyen bkur bgyid
335a7(mdo sde): cing rang bzhin gyis dge ba spyod do//gang la las thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo 'di thos te/dga' ba skyes nas dad pa dang gus ba'i sems kyis yi ger 'dri 'am
335b1(mdo sde): yi gor 'brir 'jug gam/klog gam/kha ton du byas sam/blangs sam/'chang ngam/phyag 'tshal zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang gi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig gam/byang chub
335b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ming gcig brjod na gang zag de ni tshe 'di nyid la bde ba thob ste/sdig pa rnams mi mthong zhing tshe zad de 'chi 'phos na'ang byang chub sems dpa' bdag cag rnams kyis
335b3(mdo sde): sngon du lam drangs te/bdag cag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par gnas gcig tu skye bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/mdo sde 'di blangs pa dang /gzungs su
335b4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i slad du'o//mdo sde 'di blangs te/gzungs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' lags par mngon te/
335b5(mdo sde): de bas na de dag ni bdag cag dang bslab pa gcig go/rgyu dang rkyen des ni mdo sde 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa rnams gnas gcig tu skye zhing mi 'bral bar smon to//de nas tshangs
335b6(mdo sde): pa chen po dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ni rdo rje dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
335b7(mdo sde): yang dag shes la sogs pa dang /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' bo dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /dbyangs can dang /'phrog ma mo dang /ri'i lha
336a1(mdo sde): /dang /shing gi b+ha dang /klung gik+ta dang /mtsho'i m+b+ha dang /saril+yA dang /nu'i lha dang /me'i sku dang /rlung gi wA la sogs pa grangs med dpag tu med
336a2(mdo sde): pa dag rang rang gi stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de loms su thal mo sbyar cing gus par phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
336a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas po 'di la rtag tu bsrung zhing 'dzin par bgyi'o//mdo sde 'di gang
336a4(mdo sde): du gnas pa der bdag cag gis rtag tu medun du bdar te yongs su dag par bgyi'o//ma sde 'ad mchod rten du'am gnas khang du'am/khyim pa'i khyim du 'am
336a5(mdo sde): dgon pa na gnas kyang rung ste/gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis su ga ba mi gtsang bas mdo sde 'di bzung ngam/ma gus par blugs sam+b+ha/kha ton du bgyis ni bdag
336a6(mdo sde): cag gis gang zag de 'gro snod 'dug tsal spyod lam rnam bzhir lus dang sems mi bde bar bgyi'o//gang du gnas pa der 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /blo bur du gnod
336a7(mdo sde): pa 'byung bar bgyi'o//tshe 'di la mi bde ba sna tshogs dang /tshe 'phos nA'ang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar bgyi'o//gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la gus par
336b1(mdo sde): bgyis te/sdug pa gtsang mas blangs shing 'chang ngam/khrus pa m+his te bdug spos kyis bdug cing blugs sam/kha ton du bgyis sam/'chang ngam 'dzin tam/yo gar
336b2(mdo sde): 'bri 'am/yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/rjes su dran nam sdig pa'i chos rnams ma spyad na bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gang zag de'i rim gro bgyi'o//bsrung /
336b3(mdo sde): bgyi'o//gang zag de nyal na'ang de'i mdun du mchis te/ltas ngan pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o//yang gcig tu ni dgra ma rungs pa dang /gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi
336b4(mdo sde): gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o//de gang du gnas pa'i khang khyim yang bsrung bar bgyi'o//de ste 'gron du 'chi na bdag cag rnams kyis rtag tu 'brang zhing ci 'tshal ba
336b5(mdo sde): sbyar bar bgyi'o//phyogs bzhir gang du mchi na'ang bgegs ma mchis par rgyun bu dge ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe 'phos na'ang lhar skye bar bgyi'o//rgyu de dang rkyen des ni
336b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong zhing theg pa chen po mi stor bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /lha dang /lha
336b7(mdo sde): ma yin gyi bdag po la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/khyed rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin te/mdo sde 'di thos par yang mi 'gyur na mthong
337a1(mdo sde): bar ltag la 'gyur/gal te mdo sde 'di blangs te bzung ngam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kha don du byed par 'dod na khrus dag par byas la gos
337a2(mdo sde): gtsang ma bgros te/khang pa dben pa gtsang ma'i nang du be dan dang /rgyal mtshan dang /gdugs kyis brgyan nas bdug pa sna tshogs dang /tsan+dan dang /phye ma dang /byug
337a3(mdo sde): bas mchod cing phyag btsal nas de ltar nyin mtshan dus drug tu thog mar mgo btsukas nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re re zhing mdo sde 'di bklags te/sems mi
337a4(mdo sde): g.yeng ba dang /dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang /rtog pa mi g.yong ba dang /bsam pa mi g.yeng ba dang /gzungs su 'dzin pa mi g.yeng ba dang /spyod pa mi g.yeng ba dang //
337a5(mdo sde): bstan cing bslab pa mi g.yeng bar nyin mtshan dus drug tu mdo sde 'di'i nang nas byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /mdo sngo bcu gnyis rnams la
337a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing klog pa 'am/kha ton du 'don cing mos pa dang gus par byed nus na mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba'i sdig lci ba kun byang bar 'gyur gyis/de la the tshom
337a7(mdo sde): 'o ma yid gnyis su ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa spyod pa'o//'di ni bsrung zhing
337b1(mdo sde): skyob pa ste/sang+yas rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo//'di ni mdo sde kun gyi rgyal ba'o//'di ni don dam pa'i snying pa'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mo//thar pa chen du
337b2(mdo sde): phyogasu rgyas pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di ni 'jig rten na chen po drug dang 'dra ste/bsam gyis mi khyab bo//drug gang zhe na/sa chen po dang /chu chen po dang /me chen po dang /rlung chen po
337b3(mdo sde): dang /nyi ma chen po dang /na mkha' chen po dang /mdo sde 'di ni sa chen po dang 'dra ste/gtsang sme dang /bzang ngan thams cad theg par byed do//mdo sde 'di chu chen po dang 'dra ste/
337b4(mdo sde): smre gcog thams cad 'khru bar byed do//mdo sde 'di me chen po dang 'dra ste/nyon mongs pa dang /btsog pa dang /ljan ljin dang thams cad tshig par byed do//mdo sde 'di rlung chen
337b5(mdo sde): pa dang 'dra ste/skye bcog thams cad 'bud par byed do//mdo sde 'di nyi ma chen po dang 'dra ste/mun nag yod do cig snang bar byed do//mdo sde 'di na mkha' dang 'dra ste/bzang
337b6(mdo sde): ngan yod de cog thams cad shong bar byed do//de lta bu'i theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di rgya che ba ni dpe zla med de/yar byang chub sems
337b7(mdo sde): dpa' dang /bar du nyan thos dang /mar 'jigs tshogs kyi gzugs can no cog mi shing ba med do//de bas na khyod rnams kyis mdo sde 'di gzung su bzung ste/tshangs shig
338a1(mdo sde): /kun tu sbrel bar gyis shog/dad cing gus par byos shig dang /khyed byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mi shes
338a2(mdo sde): zug su chud pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon du mthong bar bya'o//khyed lha rnams kyang mdo sde 'di blangs te/'chang na rgyun du da'ang mthong la/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas
338a3(mdo sde): thams cad mthong ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /dkyil 'khor chen po la zhugs par bya'o zhes bka' stsal po dang /de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub
338a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad pa zhes bya ba de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
338a5(mdo sde): btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams gsol ni zhu ba mchis na dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang /
338a6(mdo sde): bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad pa la bka' stsal pa/shin
338a7(mdo sde): tu leg so legaso//rigs kyi bu dri ba yod na ci 'dod pa bzhin dris shig dang /ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do//khyod kyis dris pade'ang sems can dpag tu
338b1(mdo sde): med pa la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag dran pa sngon yun ring por 'das pa na//
338b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin chen gtsug bud ces bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan cig thos na lhar skye ba thob bo//zhes thos te/de las yun mo ring ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang
338b3(mdo sde): phyug 'od kyi yul khams na dgon pa'i nang zhig la rdzing chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab skams nas de na nya chen po stong phrag bcu zhig mchis pa gdugs kyis gdungs te gum du nye
338b4(mdo sde): ba las/dra ma chu 'bebs zhes bgyi bas nya de dag mthong nas sems can la shin tu byams pa dang /snying rje skyes te/chab dang kha zas stsal kyang dgung 'ga' tsam zhig ni
338b5(mdo sde): gson 'brang na/tshe ring por mi thogs par 'tshal bas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug pud kyi mtshon lano gsum brjod nas nya de dag gis thos ma thag tu dus las 'das
338b6(mdo sde): te/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi sar skyes so zhes gda' na deng bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dri dag dang /dus slad ma'i sems can rnams kyi slad du sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bstan
338b7(mdo sde): cing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubo pa'i mtshan thos na tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang /bde ba dang /dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nams dang //
339a1(mdo sde): rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/
339a2(mdo sde): sdom pa'i rtsa ba nyams pa dang /nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad par smon to//de nas bcom ldan
339a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu gal te nges phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
339a4(mdo sde): mtshan rgya tshor bshad na bskul pa brgya stong khri'i bar du bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/'di ltar chu thams cad kyi thigs pa ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gis sangs
339a5(mdo sde): rgyus thams cad kyi mtshan ni grangs su shes pa med do//ri rab thams cad ni srang grangs su bgrang du rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni grangasu shes pa
339a6(mdo sde): med do//na mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' thug par shes par rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni grangs su shes pa med do//ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi
339a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan gyis gang gis rna bar lan cig thos na gang zag de tshe 'phos ma thag tu lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyuraro//thos nas kyang
339b1(mdo sde): mos pa dang gus pa byas te/yi ger bris la mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa kun 'byung bar 'gyur/bsod nams dpag
339b2(mdo sde): tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//gang zag de dus zad na'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur/nga yang mthong la dus ma
339b3(mdo sde): 'ongs pa na bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po la bka' stsal pa/khyed rnams tshul bzhin
339b4(mdo sde): du gros chags bcos la/lus mi g.yeng ba dang /sems mi g.yeng ba dang /dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang //rtog pa mi g.yeng bar byos la chos thos par 'dod na sems te
339b5(mdo sde): gcig tu bsdus shig/bcom ldan 'das mar me ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das rin chen
339b6(mdo sde): gtsug pud la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das rin chen
339b7(mdo sde): mang la phyag 'tshe lo//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sdud cing 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshalo//brjod dpag 'das
340a1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo//dpe zla med la phyag 'tshalo//mu med chos la phyag 'tshalo//bsam khyab dka' la phyag 'tshalo//stobs la gnas
340a2(mdo sde): ba'i stobs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshalo//'jig pa med pa'i stobs bcu la phyag 'tsha lo//'jig rten gsum gyi gtso la phyag 'tshalo//thams cad 'dren pa'i ston pa
340a3(mdo sde): chen po la phyag 'tshalo//'ching ba kun gcod la phyag 'tshalo//pha rol gyi mthar phyin la phyag 'tsha lo//'jig rten kun las 'das zin pa la phyag 'tshal/
340a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i rgyud dang yongs su bral ba la phyag 'tshalo//ting nge 'dzin rnam par grol ba la phyag 'tshalo//nam mkha' ltar dmigasu med pa la phyag 'tshalo//mang po'i
340a5(mdo sde): nang na chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//bdud bzhi tshogs 'joms la phyag 'tshalo//bu gcig gi pha ltar byams pa chen po la phyag 'tsholo//tshe rabs 'chi/
340a6(mdo sde): 'pho gar byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhal rtag tu mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon par rtogs la mya ngan las 'das pa chen por phyin par gyur cig
340a7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig tshogs can kun la sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir ro//kye 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyor la yang dag par mnyan
340b1(mdo sde): ci sems thag pa nas mchod pa phul cig/ngas ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mtshan rnams bshad kyis nyon//sdig pa mtshams med lnga po yang //rnam
340b2(mdo sde): grol mtshan nyid bskyed par byas//dge rtsa med pa'i gang zag la//ngas ni dgrol zhing bshad kyis kyang //des kyang chud par mi nus te//sa bon tshig rnams ring
340b3(mdo sde): bzhin dong //grung brtan 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur//theg pa chung ngu gsol nas su//theg chen nyi tshe yod par 'gyur//theg pa gnyis po gsal nas smra/
340b4(mdo sde): theb pa gcig pu yod par 'gyur//dge rtsa med pa'i gang zag gis//sgra 'di thos par mi 'gyur te//sangs rgyas grangs med mchod myong bas//gdod des
340b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mtshan thos so//len cing 'dzin par byed pa ni/phyogs tsam rnam par grol ba ste//rnam dag sa la bde bar gnas//da yang nga yi chos 'di la/
340b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyad pa kun skad de//sangs rgyus ma tshan la byug 'chol zhing //mdo 'di blang zhing klog 'chang ni//bdud kyi las dang bral bar 'gyur//rtsa ba bzhi dang
340b7(mdo sde): mtshams mdo dang //log spyong rnams kyi sdig kyang 'byung //ma 'ongs dus na gang zag de//'phags pa'i lam yang nges par 'grub//gang zhig dad pa ma skyes na//
341a1(mdo sde): mamamamasasan mthasamamama.amathathas mnyamatha.a na thamamam as ma yam/a am ya mams mtshan mkhamamamamathamamam
341a2(mdo sde): ngan song gsum du ltung yang dag/dang skyes brtson 'grus phyag btsal na//tshad med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur//de bas rtse gcig
341a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing //sdig pa dpag med byang bar smon/de phyir gus par phyag 'tshal lo//de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te/yang dag par mnyan nas
341a4(mdo sde): lus dang sems rtse gcig tu bsdus te/g.yel zhing 'gyur ba med par yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te sems thag pa nas nyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs
341a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsgrags pa las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi zla mar me gsal nyi khri la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas mar me
341a6(mdo sde): mdzad sum khri la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas thogs med ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas rgyal bu bcu drug la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas na mkha'i rgyal po la
341a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas rin chen mang la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sprin dbang mar me rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas byin sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//
341a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dge bar bsams la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sku sbrul la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi zla gsal gyi dpal
341b1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas budra dag pa rgyu skar rgyal po ye shes la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rnam dag brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas klu btsun rgyal po la
341b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sprin 'brug sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sprin 'brug sgra rgyu skar rgyal po ye shes pad+ma la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po la
341b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas shing sa la rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma dpal gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag
341b4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//sang+yas 'od mi g.yo 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas 'od rgyad ring la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas zla 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas spos
341b5(mdo sde): tsan+dan la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas ri legs rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas ri rab lha'i thur tshugs can la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od snyoms ri rab la phyag 'tshalo//
341b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zla gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas yang dog pa'i dran pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dri ma bral lo phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas chags med la phyag 'tshalo//
341b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas klu'i lha la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sa mi g.yo ba'i sa la phyag 'tsho lo//sangs rgyas me tog mchog la phyog 'tshalo//sangs rgyas bai DUr+ya'i me tog mchog la phyag
342a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ban+d+har+ya dang gser gyi kha dog la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gser mdzad la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sa'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo//sangs/
342a2(mdo sde): rgyas zla ba'i gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas pad+ma rna pa grol la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par brgyan
342a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas blo rgya mtsho mngon par shes la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas chu 'od la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas dbyangs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs
342a4(mdo sde): rgyus dri ma sgyu ma dang bral ba la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas yid skyo sbyangs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin po che 'bar ba la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas gtsug dam pa
342a5(mdo sde): lo phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dpang bar 'dzugs lo phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas shes rab yon tan 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od sgrib la phyag
342a6(mdo sde): 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi zla'i baiDUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas bla med po na mya'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rab mchog gtso la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
342a7(mdo sde): byang chub me tog la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas zla gsal la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas nyi 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas me tog mdog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal//
342b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chu zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas the tshom mun sel la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sdug bsngal bsgral la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas mos pa dang ba la phyag 'tsham
342b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sngon legs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gzi brjid la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas chos kyi shes rab la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas bzhid sprul
342b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas seng ge sbrul phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas klu'i sbru la phyog 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'jig rten gnas la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dbang phyug la phyag
342b4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas tshe dpag med l-i phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas 'od
342b5(mdo sde): thogs med la phyag 'tsholo//sangs rgyas 'od zla med la phyag 'tsholo//sangs rgyas 'od 'bar rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//
342b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byor ba'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas shes rab 'od
342b7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od rgyun mi 'chad pa la phyag 'tshalo///sangs rgyas 'od bsam dka' la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'on brjod med la phyag 'tsha'o//
343a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyisgra'i 'od 'phags la phyag 'argya'o//sangs rgyas mtshan bzangs gser btso ma'i mdog la phyag 'jam//sangs rgyas ring du brtag pa la phyag
343a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i mdzod la phyag/'tsha'o//sangs rgyas dbyangs dpag med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas zil mngar gyi rol phyag 'tshalo//sangs
343a3(mdo sde): rgyurgyas klu'i rgyal ba la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i stobs la phyag 'chi'o//sangs rgyas seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'i
343a4(mdo sde): 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dpal mchog la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'jam dpal ri la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas rdo rje rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo//sang+yas
343a5(mdo sde): me tog bla ma la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'jigs med stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas klu rje dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas seng+ge'i gzi brjid/
343a6(mdo sde): rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tsho'o//sangs rgyas 'od khyab la phyud 'i tshi//sangs rgyas kun tu snang la phyag 'tshalo//sangs
343a7(mdo sde): rgyas kun tu gtsang la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas spos ta ma ra pa ra tse n+dan la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas spos tsan+dan la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan la
343b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas dkon mchog brtsegs rab tu dga' ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas brtson 'grus chen po bla na med pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nor bu'i
343b2(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas shes rab sgron ma snang la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas rdo rje
343b3(mdo sde): sro brtan la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gser 'od kun tu dgram la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas brtson 'grus che ba can la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas dpa' btul la
343b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas thugs rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas thugs rje stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas byams pa'i snying po'i rgyal po
343b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi phug rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas bzung legs gtso la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas legs par
343b6(mdo sde): sad la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas gsor gyi ri bo rin po che'i gdugs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
343b7(mdo sde): gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sgron chen 'od snang la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i bla bre stong pa nyid du brtan po'i
344a1(mdo sde): stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas na mkha'i rin chen me tog gi 'od
344a2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas baiDUR+Ya rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyog 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sku kun tu mngon par ston pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
344a3(mdo sde): ye shes 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tsham//sang+yas bdud kyi rgyal po rnams tshar bcod la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od snang stong la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
344a4(mdo sde): byams pa'i shes rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'od gsal la phyug 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
344a5(mdo sde): dge dben zla bIng bya la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas mchog btsun ye shes kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sang+yas padu rin po che'i rgyal por gnas pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
344a6(mdo sde): klu'i rigs bla na med pa ye shes gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi zla nor bu'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
344a7(mdo sde): ye shes kyi ba dan mchog tu brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dri med mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od snang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal//
344b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gsar 'bar ba'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gser 'od snang ba'i mdzod la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas seng+ge'i sgra'i stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//
344b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mchog dbyangs dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas ba dan 'od rtag lo phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa'i mar me'i rgyal po la
344b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas shes rab kyi ni bza'i rgyal po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas chos kyi mtshan nyid dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas ri ba 'od la phyag 'tshal
344b4(mdo sde): lo//sangs rgyas me tog su ma na'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas me tog ut+pa la'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas stobs btsan dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
344b5(mdo sde): shes rab kyi stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba'i 'khrug med kyi 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs bdag med rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs
344b6(mdo sde): rgyas blo gros 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas shes rab kyi ri dang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas thar pa chen
344b7(mdo sde): po'i 'od la phyag 'tsho'o//sangs rgyas chos thams cad rtag tu gang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas blun mi ston la phyag 'tshal lo//'das pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku thams cad la
345a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tsha'o//'das pa'i sangs rgyas gcig/sangs rgyas bcu/sangs rgyas brgya/sangs rgyas stong /sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med
345a2(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas sdig bgyis pa'i mi bzad pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig/'bum phrag bcu/'bum phrag brgya/'bum phrag stong //
345a3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag khri/bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tsha lo//gal te gang zag la las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med
345a4(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ste/de bas na gus par phyag 'tshalo//gang gis sangs
345a5(mdo sde): rgyas 'das pa'i mtshan//de la gus par phyag 'tshal na//sems nyid thob cing sdig kyang 'byung //mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga/phyin chod mi byed sdom par nus//dam
345a6(mdo sde): ba'i chos ni rtag tu thos//theg chen tshul khrims ldan pa ste//de phyir da ltar phyag kyang 'tshalo//rnam pa gnyis shig ma gtogs te//theg chen chos la dmod pa dang //log
345a7(mdo sde): spyod rnam su lta'o//gang zhig sems nyid rnam dag na//log spyod cesu mi bya ste//sangs rgyas dpag med rtag tu mthong //sdig pa'i rtsa ba bzhi po dang //mtshams med sngar bcas
345b1(mdo sde): tham masas mnyamacasamatha.a mnyamatha thas natha Sha.a na thamamam am nyam mam a ma mtham yamamatham tshan ma masamamam
345b2(mdo sde): gang byas pa//rnam dag sems kyis 'gyod nus na//de ni tshul bzhin gnas pa yin//de yang gus par phyug 'tshal phyir//mi dge bcu'i las 'byang zhing //theg chen tshul khrims thob
345b3(mdo sde): bas na//de bas gus par phyag 'tshalo//'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan de dag bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i tshes la bzod pa thob bo//nyan
345b4(mdo sde): thos brgyad brgyas ni theg po chen po'i sems shas tsam skyeso//dge slong lnga stong ni dgra bcom par grub bo//lha dang mi khri phrag bcu zhig chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo//
345b5(mdo sde): da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gsal rgyal 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gser gtso ma'i mdog dang
345b6(mdo sde): bral ba la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas snang ba dpag med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khon snang rgyal po lo phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas spros brtsegs la phyag
345b7(mdo sde): 'tshalo//sangs rgyas seng+ge 'bum gzugs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas seng ge rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas yon tan kun tu 'od kyi ra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//
345b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan bde gnas rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dka' thub la
346a1(mdo sde): phyug 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan phyug 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas ra ba rgyal po thobal byag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin chen dpal 'a byug
346a2(mdo sde): 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas rin tshon 'bar ba la phyag 'tsho lo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dka' thub
346a3(mdo sde): seng ge'i nga rol phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
346a4(mdo sde): rnam par brgyan lo phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas lding khang phyin la phyog 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas zla ba'i gdugs la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas 'od khyab lo phyag 'tshal//sangaso
346a5(mdo sde): rgyas rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag
346a6(mdo sde): 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyog 'tshalo//sangs rgyas goser thub la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'brug sgo rgyal po la
346a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas chos chen snying po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas tsan+dan mo tog la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas tsan+dan 'dab me la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas
346b1(mdo sde): yid mchog la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas thub zla med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas zil mngar rnga la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la
346b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas thub med 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyus rnam par brgyan dang ldan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//
346b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu khyab pa'i yon tan g+h+r-i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas bdud bzhi mjoms pa'i seng ge'i sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas rdo rje
346b4(mdo sde): 'jigs med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas bai DUr+ya'i 'od lo phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sa d+yos 'od zer gtsang ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//
346b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dag dpal la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od zer dpag med la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas gzungs rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dpo' bar
346b6(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dge mthong ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas yon tan bla med la phyag
346b7(mdo sde): 'chi lo//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas mtshan ma'i gzugs med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gzugs thor la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs
347a1(mdo sde): sas mamasamama.a mthas mthas nathams a ma ma mamatsham mamamathamam
347a2(mdo sde): rgyas dri mtshan med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas bro mtshan med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas reg mtshan med la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas ting
347a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas shes rab ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i gzugs kyi dbang phyug lo phyag
347a4(mdo sde): 'tshalo//sangs rgyas kun tu sdud la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas drin dpal kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
347a5(mdo sde): thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo//sad+yas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo//
347a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yod sgra ston srid la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma
347a7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas song gi dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas seng ge'i mtshan ma la phyog 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//
347a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rtag tu zhi la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas dbang po'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i
347b1(mdo sde): mtshan ma la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las 'das pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyuswA ta mA ra ba ra tsan+dan gyi spos la phyag 'tshalo//sangs
347b2(mdo sde): rgyas ri rab kyi gzugs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshalo//
347b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo//da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig/sangs rgyas bcu/sangs rgyas brgya/sangs rgyas stong /sangs rgyas khri la
347b4(mdo sde): gus par phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig/'bum phrag bcu/'bum phrag
347b5(mdo sde): brgya/'bum phrag stong /'bum phrag khri/bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo//gang la las da ltar bzhugs
347b6(mdo sde): ngo'i sangs rgyas grang sra med dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na de ni bskal pa khri/drag drub cu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/de bas gus par phyag 'tshalo//da ltar phyogs
347b7(mdo sde): bcur bzhugs pa yi//sangs rgyas rnams la phyag btsal na//las ngan kun las rnam par grol//mtshams med lnga po'i sdig kyang 'byang //rnam dag sa la rtag tu gnas//
348a1(mdo sde): shAkya chos la'ang bde gnas shing //de rnams ngan song gsum dang bral//sangs rgyas byams pa'ang mthong ba dang /sangs rgyas stong yang mthong
348a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//de bas da ltar phyag kyang 'tshal//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang mthong ste//rnam dag zhing du rtag par skye//dam pa'i chos kyang thos gyur cing //sangs
348a3(mdo sde): rgyas rtag pa'ang mngon par rtogs//da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe chu bo gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas gzungs kyi
348a4(mdo sde): sgor chud par 'gyur//lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas ma byon pa dpag tu med pa la phyag
348a5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas byams pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas me tog 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas me tog rdzogs la phyag
348a6(mdo sde): 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od snang la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas ming dang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dzam+bu na nga'i gser 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas chos snang la
348a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas khyab snod la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas kun tu mtshan ma la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas kun tu 'di la phyag
348b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas shes rab ri dang rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i rnam par bkod pa la phyag
348b2(mdo sde): 'tshalo//sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas dbang phyug thob pa'i rgyal po'i bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal//
348b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong dga'o la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od kyi mtshan mas rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po nyi khri la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas mtshan mthun pa kun tu dpal sum khril
348b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba'i bzhi khri brgyad stong la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas zla ba rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag
348b5(mdo sde): 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
348b6(mdo sde): bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas dri'i tshogs la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas sgra'i tshigs la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par
348b7(mdo sde): bkod pa stong phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan
349a1(mdo sde): ba la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas gser gtso ma'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas lung
349a2(mdo sde): bstan pa pad+ma'i 'od lnga rgyu la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas me tog bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshalo//sangs
349a3(mdo sde): rgyas rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig/sangs rgyas bcu/sangs rgyas brgya/sangs rgyas stong /sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal
349a4(mdo sde): no//bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas sdig lci ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig/'bum phrag bun/'bri brag brgya/'bum
349a5(mdo sde): phrag stong 'bum phrag khri bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dpag tu med/grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gang zag gang la las thos par gyur na bskal pa khri phrag bzhi
349a6(mdo sde): bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/de bas da ltar phyag 'tsha'o//gang zhig sangs rgyas ma byon rnams//de la gus par phyag 'tshal na//log spyod rnams ni ma
349a7(mdo sde): gtogs te//sgrib pa gsum dang mtshams med lnga//sdig pa de rnams 'byang bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas chos la bde gnas shing //dpag med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur//
349b1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyang rtag tu thos//de bas da ltar gus phyag 'tshal//gang zhig phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis//sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal na//kha na ma tho 'das pa dang //ma 'ongs
349b2(mdo sde): pa dang da ltar gyi//las ngan bcu po byas pa yang //de ltar mngon du byang bar 'gyur//phyi ma'i dus la sangs rgyas kyi//ngo bo nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur//de bas de la mos par byos/
349b3(mdo sde): kha ton 'dra klog phyag 'tshal na//tsho rabs gar byung gar skyes kyang //lta ba log par mi skye'o//rnam par grol ba rgyun tu thob//mtha' 'khob sa ru yong mi skye//ngan pa'i yul du'ang
349b4(mdo sde): mi skye zhing //rgyal po ma rungs mthong mi 'gyur//bskal pa 'o bum phrag bzhi khri'i bar//sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o//de bas gus par phyag 'tshal na//mi dge bcu'i las 'byang
349b5(mdo sde): zhing //gzungs chen rab tu thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas ma byon pa rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lnga khris phyir mi ldog pa'i
349b6(mdo sde): sar gnas so//dge slong ma bdun brgyas ni dgra bcom par grub bo//lha dang mi 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo//gzungs chen po dang //
349b7(mdo sde): mdo sde bcu gnyis la phye ba 'tshalo//mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshalo//lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshalo//tshig su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshalo//dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i
350a1(mdo sde): thamacan masa.a mnyam thas mtha a naHtha thas naHma tha.a na thamamatham yas ma mam tham mam mam mtham tham mnyan amam thamamamam
350a2(mdo sde): sde la phyag 'tshalo//ched du brjod pa'i sdel phyag 'tsha'o//gleng bzhi'i sde la phyag 'tsha'o//rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshalo//'das pa brjod
350a3(mdo sde): ba'i sde la phyag 'tsha'o//skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshalo//shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshalo//rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshalo//gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sdel
350a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo//theg pa chen po'i sde snod thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//gang gis mdo sde bcu gnyis dang //pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan thos na bstod pa byas sam//
350a5(mdo sde): phyog 'tshal lam/brjod dam/mis pa bskyed dam/blangs sam/'chang bar byed na de gang zag de bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/tshe
350a6(mdo sde): snga phyi dran pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de'i phyir gus pas phyag 'tshol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe byang chub
350a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo//nyan thos 'bum phrag bcu theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do//dge slong dang /dge slong ma stong phrag bcus dgra
350a8(mdo sde): bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//lha dang mi dpag tu med pa zhig gis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo//phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen po thams cad
350b1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal//byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems
350b2(mdo sde): dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtag la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems
350b3(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen lag la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po la phyog 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar rgyan pa la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems
350b4(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpar zla gang la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa'i stobs po che
350b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' stobs dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tsha lo//byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags la phyag 'tshe lo//byang chub sems
350b6(mdo sde): dpa' bzang skyong la phyag 'tsha lo//byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs la phyag 'tsha lo//byang chub sems dpa'

357b2(mdo sde): dang /khri la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpo' khri phrag brgya/khri phrag nyis brgya/khri phrag sum brgya/khri phrag bzhi brgya/khri phrag lnga brgya//khri phrag drug bad+mo/khyi drug
357b3(mdo sde): bdun brgya/khri phrag 'argyad brgya/khyi phrag dgu brgya/khri phrag stong rnams la phyag 'tshal ni bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun tshod kyi 'khor ba'i srog lcib 'byung bar 'gyuraro//
357b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig/'bum phrag bcu/'bum phrag brgya/'bum phrag stong /'bum phrag khri/'bum phrag khri phrag khri la phyag 'tshal na/
357b5(mdo sde): bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi zad pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA gcigi bye ma snyed la phyag
357b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tsha lo//gang+gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tsha lo//gang+gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo//pad+me lnga'i bye ma snyed la phyag
357b7(mdo sde): 'tshalo//gang+gA drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tsha lo//gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo//gang+gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo//gang+gA dgu'i bye ma snyed l-i phyag
358a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//grang+gA bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tsha lo//gang+gA brgya'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo//ga stong gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tsha'o//gang+gA bI'i byi ma snyad la phyag 'tsha'o//gang+gA bye
358a2(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshalo//de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med po tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad
358a3(mdo sde): yongasu 'byang bar 'gyur ro//gang la lnga zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan 'di dag thos na bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du
358a4(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing srid pa gsum gyi kham su mi gtogs te/rtag tu rnam par grol ba'i kham su gtogs par 'gyur/mtha' 'khob
358a5(mdo sde): tu mi skye/yul dran par mi skye/lus ngan par mi len/log par mi lta/rigs ngan du mi skye/mu stegs can du mi skye/dbang po yan lag tshang bar 'gyur/dam
358a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos rtag tu thos par 'gyur/sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma mnos kyang khrims dang rtag tu ldan par 'gyur/theg pa chen po spyod lam mdzes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi
358a7(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur//de bas gus par phyag 'tshal te/sangs rgyas kyi chos la bden par gnas shing phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas grub pa thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub
358b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//lha 'bum phrag
358b2(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa bzhi ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//dge slong sems stor ba 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad ni sems kyi bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//byang chu
358b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcus ni gzungs chen po thob ste/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
358b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba de'i mtshan sems can sdug bsngal gyi gagazir ba can rnams kyis
358b5(mdo sde): lan cig zos na 'chi 'phos pa'i tshe ltar skye'o zhes khyod kyis bshad pa dang /da yang nga la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan bshad par gsol zhing sems can kun sdug bsngal dang bral zhing
358b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten las bzla bar 'dod pa de'i phyir ngas kyang khyod dang skye bo kun la dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan rdzogs par bshad kyis/don dam pA na dkon mchog gcig la bkri ba'i dbang
358b7(mdo sde): gis gsum du bshad pa gang la la de'i mtshan thos na sems thag pa nas dran par byas pa/'chi kar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan lan
359a1(mdo sde): gsum du/na mo bud+d+hA ya/na mo d+harmA ya//na maHsa~Mg+hA ya zhes de skad ched du brjod du bcug na mi 'di 'chi 'phos nas ngan song gsum du mi 'gro ste/phyogs
359a2(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas thams cada' mthar gyis rim gro byed par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
359a3(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur/'jam dpal dang kun tu bzang pos theg pa chen po'i phyogasu rgyas pa bshad pa'ang thos par 'gyur/thos nas kyang de ma thag tu skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa
359a4(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur//rigs kyi bu gang zag de'ang bskal pa grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pas gdod dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshon thos pa yin no//de nas
359a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi/dngos po gcig gam/
359a6(mdo sde): dngos po gnyis sam/dngos po gsum du bgyi/ci ste dngos po gcig na ni skyabs gcig tu song bas dngos po gsum lags na ni skyabs gsum du gyur pas skyabs gsum du gyur
359a7(mdo sde): na ni sangs rgyas dang chos kyang dbyings tha dad par 'gyur te/dge 'dun yang de bzhi no//gal te skyabs gsum zhig lags na ni skye bo rnams rnam pa gsum du mthong bas bskal pa/
359b1(mdo sde): gsum gyi bar chos spyod kyang theg pa gcig tu brda mi mjal bar mchi na/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bdag lnga bshad du gsol//bdag 'di thos nas/
359b2(mdo sde): kyang skye bo kun la bye brag phyed par bshad par gsol//bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na gang la las mtshan thos na/bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas thob par yang
359b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//zhes gsol ba dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/rigs kyi bu legaso legs so//don chen po 'di lta/
359b4(mdo sde): bu nga la zhu bar nus pa ni shin tu legaso legaso//rigs kyi bu khyed 'di lta bu'i don chen po 'dri ba'ang sa dang po dang /sau gnyis pa dang /sa gsum pa dang /sa bzhi pa dang /sa lnga pa
359b5(mdo sde): dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa dang /sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin te/sa bcu chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa la don chen po 'di lta bu 'dri ba
359b6(mdo sde): yin no//khyed legs par nyon cig/ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do//rigs kyi bu skye bo thams cad ni thog ma med pa nas ma rig pas bsgribs te/khams gsum gyi btson ra na 'khor
359b7(mdo sde): zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gzir te/lam rgyud drug tu phan tshun rnam par rgyu ba la skyabs dang rten pa'i gnas med nas lha ma srin la phyogs te skyabs tshol ba/mu stegs rnams
360a1(mdo sde): rang gi rkang lag bcings shing srog btang ste/skyabs tshol na'ang sdug bsngal las thar pa med do//me dang mtsho'i nang du mchongs te srog btang yang 'khor
360a2(mdo sde): ba las thar pa'i dus med do//de'i phyir mgon po chen po de bzhin gshegs pas byams pa'i ting 'dzin gyis skye bo rgyun du 'khrul pa rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/
360a3(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan bstan cing yang dag pa'i rten gnas su bya ba'i phyir bslab pa dang po nyan thos dang /rang byang chub pa rnams la them skas dang 'dra bar dkon
360a4(mdo sde): mchog gsum yang dngos po tha dad par bshadado//de'i 'og tu rgyun ring du tshangs par spyad pa'i skyes bu dam pa la yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum dngos
360a5(mdo sde): po gcig par yang bshad//sangs rgyas dkon mchog gcig nang na chos dang dge 'dun gyi dkon mchog kyang yod par bshad//rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir dkon mchog ces bya zhe na/
360a6(mdo sde): dper na 'jig rten gyi rin po che sna bdun po phongs pa rnams la 'tsho ba bstangs po dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten na skye bo rnams kyi chos kyi sku bskyed pa dang //
360a7(mdo sde): ye shes spel bar byed pas dkon mchog ces bya'o//dkon mchog gsum dngos po tha dad pa ni sangs rgyas rgyal po'i khab tu sku sprul cing byang chub sems dpa' yin pa
360b1(mdo sde): skad du sems can bsgral ba'i phyir brtul zhug dang dka' thub spyad do/byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par byang chub nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzod ces bya ba ni sangs
360b2(mdo sde): rgyas zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa'i ge nyid las sad po'o//dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i gnas so//ston pa las slob mas don rnyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun zhes bya'o///
360b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun la rnam pa gnyis te/mthun pa dang /'dus ma byas pa'o//'dus ma byas thob pa ni yang dag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sprul ba ni 'dus
360b4(mdo sde): byas pa'o//'khrul pa bar mi chad par 'byung ba'i zag pa zad ba'ang 'dus sa byas zhes bya'o//zag pa thams cad 'gags nas 'phags pa rnams dang gnas gcig tu mthun
360b5(mdo sde): te/rtsod bu med bri ni mthun pa ste/don de gnyis dang ldan pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu chos ni dge sdig gi chos thams cad dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas
360b6(mdo sde): pa rnams so//sdig pa'i chos ni spang bar bya//dge ba'i chos ni daphel bar bya'o//de'ang sems kyis dmigs so cog chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o//de'i phyir sangs rgyas
360b7(mdo sde): dang /dge 'dun gnyis dngos po'ang mi gcig la/ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad do//chos ni dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas su dbyings mthun te so sar dbye bar dka'o//ji ltar
361a1(mdo sde): so sor dbye bar dka' zhe na/gal te sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun gnyis kyi mtshan bla dag su btags te/rnam par dpyod pa bas rnam par grol ba'i
361a2(mdo sde): phung po lnga thob pa dang /dge ba'i yon tan thams cad chos kyi dkon mchog go zhes bya bar don de lta bu'ang ma yin te//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge ba'i yon tan dang bsod
361a3(mdo sde): nams kyi dbang gis mi lus thob pa yin no//chos dang bral na mi byed/mi lus gus na'ang chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya ba g.yo yod/deng 'dir gleng ba ni mi dang chos
361a4(mdo sde): su gcig tu mthun la tha dad pa'ang yod de/chos kyi dbang gis mir grub/mi'i dbang du chos 'gro bas de'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jin
361a5(mdo sde): ba bzhi dang /mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa'ang sa ng+yas dkon mchog tu bshadado//
361a6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni dge 'dun dkon mchog tu bshad do//yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang /gtan tshigs
361a7(mdo sde): su dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o//ye ni dbyings gcig ste/don gnyis su bshad kyis kyang chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun tha dad
361b1(mdo sde): pa'ang yod de/de'ang chos kyi dkon mchog tu bsdu'o//de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad nas/sems can gyi skyabs dang rten du bya na/khams gsum na 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las
361b2(mdo sde): thar 'gyuraro//spyod pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal sbom po las thar gyis kyang sdug bsngal phra mo ma zad do/de'i phyir yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad
