361b3(mdo sde): par bya'o//sngon bshad pa la sangs rgyas la sdug bsngal mnga'o//chos ni mi rtog go/dge 'dun yang mi rtag ste/sdug bsngal yin pas yang dag pa'i rten gnas ma yin
361b4(mdo sde): zhes zer na de de 'dir bshad pa ni rtag tu gnas pa ni rnal 'byo spyod pa na rnaMs kyis chos nyid stong pa nyid du mngon par chud cing /phyin ci log brgyad dang bral ba/skye 'gag
361b5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag pa'i rten gnas su gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o//rtag pa'i chos rnyed do cog dmigs pa'i mthar phyin par spyad pa ni yang dag pa'i chos dkon
361b6(mdo sde): mchog ces bya'o//spong ba pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i chos kyi chos nyid khong du chud cing rtag tu 'dus ma byas pa'i gnas su grub pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o//yang phyin ci log brgyad
361b7(mdo sde): gtan du bral bas 'phags pa dang skye bo thams cad mthun zhing nam du'ang rtsod pa med pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya'o//sngon dkon mchog gsum ming dang chos su tha dad par
362a1(mdo sde): bshad/deng 'dir sangs rgyas dngos po gcig la chos dang dge 'dun yang der byung bas don de'i phyir ngas khyod la dngos po gcig pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad/
362a2(mdo sde): skye bo kun theg pa gcig tu phyogs par blta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs gang
362a3(mdo sde): lo rnam par rtog ste theg pa chen po bsgrub par ba/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khams gsum mi rtag par bsams te theg pa chen por ba sgrub /
362a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis gsol ba//ji ltar nA mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par 'gyi/bka' stsal pa/mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bya na nyon mongs pa rnam
362a5(mdo sde): por spangs te yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du bzhagu la byams pa dang snying rje thog mar 'gro bar bya ste//skye bo rnams la chos bshad cing bsgral na'ang lan mi re ba ni byang chub sems dpa'
362a6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//de la sems can yongasu mi gtong ste theg pa chen po bsgrub par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dper na nga khyer chen po gcig 'khor rgyar dpag tshad gcig po/sgo mang po
362a7(mdo sde): zhig yod pa der 'gror ni lam na g.yengs dang /mun nag pa dang /shin tu 'jigs pa'i sa tshere yod kyis kyang //grong khyer der phyin na shin tu bde skyid par 'gyur bas skyes
362b1(mdo sde): bu mi gcig la bu gcig pa zhig yod pa shin tu'ang sdug mod kyi/grong khyer de na bde skyed pa'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa yod do zhes thos pas bu sdug pa der bor nas grong khyer der
362b2(mdo sde): 'gro 'dod pa'i phyir thabs sna tshogs kyi lam 'jigs sa rgal nas gong khyer de'i sgor phyin pa dang /rkang pa ya gcig nang du bcug ste/rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa'i bar du bu de dran
362b3(mdo sde): nas 'di ltar bsams so//bdag la bu gcig pu lto pa bdag chas pa'i khar ci ste ma khrid/da su zhig slang na gso zhig gu zhes bsams nas grong khyer de btang ste slar bu'i thad du cheso//
362b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang snying rje'ang de dang 'dra ste byams shing snying brtse ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom par bya'o//bsgoms te zag pa zad nas yang
362b5(mdo sde): mi shes grub pa mi len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zag pa zad pa dang /mngon par shes pa spong ste/so so'i skye bo'i ser bgrod par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dper
362b6(mdo sde): grong khyer bde skyid pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa chen po la bya'o//dper sgo mang po zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong la bya'o//dper lam 'jigs sa chen po zhes bya
362b7(mdo sde): ba ni bdud dang bgegs lta bu la bya'o//dper grong khyer gyi sgor phyin zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa la bya'o//dper rkang pa ya gcig bteg ste them pa'i nang du 'jug
363a1(mdo sde): pa ni ye shes la bya'o//dper rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnam par ma grol ba la bya'o//dper bu gcig pu lus zhes smra ba ni
363a2(mdo sde): lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la bya'o//dper bu la dran pa ni snying rje chen po la bya'o//dper bu'i thad du log pa ni sems can 'dul zhing rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa la bya'o//dper
363a3(mdo sde): lan dang 'grub pa mi re ba ni thabs mkhas pa la bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos bsdus te/mi gtong ba ni bsam
363a4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab bo//rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa dang po sems bskyed pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du sems can la rtag tu dge ba bcu
363a5(mdo sde): dpog par bya'o//bcu po gang zhe na/srog mi gcod pa dang /ma byin par mi len pa dang /'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa dang /brdzun du mi smra ba dang /phra ma dang dbyen mi byed pa
363a6(mdo sde): dang /ngag rtsub po mi smra ba dang /don med pa'i gtam tshig khyal po mi smra ba dang bsnang sos mi byed pa dag gnod des mi byed pa dang log par mi lta ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du byams pa dang /
363a7(mdo sde): snying rje phun sum tshogs par spyad na byams pa ni dge ba ston cing bde ba la 'god par byed/snying rjes ni sdug bsngal las thar pa dang /dmyal ba las sgrol bar byed do//skye bo rnams mya
363b1(mdo sde): mnyam mam sa samathamasamams mams thas mamam thas namamamams yas thas bams al bcas yang mthabs mtshan mamamam mamamatshamamams
363b2(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' bar bsgrub 'dod pa'i sgom shes pa mthong na byang chub sems dpa' skye bo de dag la snying rje ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o//snying rje ba'i dbang gis sems can thams cad
363b3(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo 'byed pas bde ba'i gnas mngon par ston te/theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa
363b4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bgyi ba gang /bka'
363b5(mdo sde): stsal po/mi skye mi 'gag pa ni chos spyod pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos mi skye ba ni gang /mi 'gag pa ni gang /bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sdig pa'i chos ni mi skye
363b6(mdo sde): bar bya/dge ba'i chos ni mi 'gag par bya'o//de lta bu spyod pa khams gsum du spyad pa ni 'dod pa rnam lnga'i bag chags kyi dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khams
363b7(mdo sde): gsum na bgrod cing sems can bsgral bar 'dod ni chos rnams pa bcu po 'dis khams gsum du 'grod par bya ste/kun rdzob kyi tshig dang /yi ge'i rjes su khams gsum yod
363b8(mdo sde): par bshad mod kyi/bla na med pa'i byang chub ni dus gsum du mi gnas la/mthar phyin pa'i byang chub rnam grangs su mi ltung ni dus gsum dang khams gsum lta ci smos/chos bcu
364a1(mdo sde): bo gang zhe na/stod pa dang smad pa la sems skye bri med pa dang /snyan pa dang mi snyan par thos pa la sems rnam par mi rtog pa dang /shes rab can dang /gang
364a2(mdo sde): mug can la 'dra bar snying rje bskyed pa dang /sems can bla 'og gang yang rung ste/snyoms par lci ba dang mchod pa gus ma gus la sems rnam pa gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang /
364a3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi nyes skyon la 'phyas mi 'dogs pa dang /theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong na'ang theg pa gcig tu lta ba dang /ngan song gsum gyi sgra thos na'ang 'jigs po dang skrag
364a4(mdo sde): ba mi skyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta ba dang /bskal pa snyigs ma can gyi dus su sangs rgyas 'byung ba la ngo mtshar rmed du
364a5(mdo sde): byung ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang bcu ste/chos bcu po de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems
364a6(mdo sde): dpa' skyes bu dam pa khas gsum bgrod pa'i tshe snying rje chen pos gzhi byas na mnol ba'i zhing der 'od 'dres kyang rdul mi gcig ste/de bas na bsam gyis khyab po zhes bya'o//gang
364a7(mdo sde): zhig 'jig rten rnam dag na//bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu//tshul khrims dam du bsrung ba ni//skyes bu de ni skad cig tsam//byams pa spyad pa dam pa mchog/gang zhig
364b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten sa 'di ru//lus dang ngag yid sdig spyad de//ngan song gsum du ltung nges dang //byams sems de yid 'phral du 'byung //byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig gis//
364b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten dran par skyes na yang //'jigs dang dogs pa ma skyes cig/ngan song ltung ba'i sdig yod kyang //mgo bo na ba tsam gyis 'byung //gang zhig 'ching ba gcod 'dod dam///
364b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs sgrib pa spong 'dod pa//'jig rten ngan 'dir skyes na yang //dam chos bsrung bas shes rab 'phel//rnam dgu zhing du bskal pa 'bum//tshul khrims rnam dag spyad
364b4(mdo sde): ba bas//deng nas sang gi bar dag tu//'jig rten 'di na gnos kyang smra//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ngas ni mi 'khrul 'jig rten dang //bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gnyis//shin tu
364b5(mdo sde): rnam dag mthong ban sdug bsngal bya ba'i ming yang med//khams der bsod nams bya ba ni//dka' ba snyam du mi mdzad de//gang zhig 'jig rten 'dri drug tu//rang gis mi bzod
364b6(mdo sde): bzod bya ste//pha rol po yang bzod bcug na//de ni bsod nams dam pa mchog/de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams//'jig rten ngan 'di bgrod pa'i tshe//nyon mongs mya ngan ma
364b7(mdo sde): byed par//sems can thams cad 'dren bya ste//brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems bskyed na//bla med byang chub myur du thob//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
365a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi deng 'dir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi rgyu dang
365a2(mdo sde): rkyen zhig zhu zhing mchis na/de bzhin gshegs pas skabs dbye bar gnang na spobs pa bskyed de zhu bar bgyi'o zhes gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po
365a3(mdo sde): legs so//rigs kyi bu khyod sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed po/byang chub sems dpa'i thabs spyad pa la mkhas pa/byang chub sems dpa' thams
365a4(mdo sde): cad kyi phyir byang chub spyod pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa dri ba legs kyis 'dod pa bzhin dris shig/ngas khyod la bye phrag phyed por bshad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye
365a5(mdo sde): bar gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems
365a6(mdo sde): la gdung ba ma mchis par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na nges pa'i tshig la 'gyod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dge ba'i rtsa ba
365a7(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na 'jigs pa ma mchis shing tshul mi g.yo bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dam pa'i chos yongs su
365b1(mdo sde): 'grub par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/thabs shin tu mkhas par
365b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sems can gyi ston pa bgyid par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshe tshe rabs rab su byang chub kyi sems chud mi bzon par
365b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sems spyod pa rnams gcig las rnam pa sna tshogasu spyod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na chos rin po ches
365b4(mdo sde): legs par sgrub par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshul khrims dang 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na
365b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshogs mang po kun dang mthun par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpra ci bgyis na chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed
365b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi stor bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na gzhan gyis bstangs pa la rag mi lus
365b7(mdo sde): par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste/'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur/byang
366a1(mdo sde): chub sems dngas ci bsgos na sangs rgyas kyu chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bya byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang /khams
366a2(mdo sde): gsum du bstod cing skyem sa can la ston pa gyid de/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid par mi 'chad par 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung chub sems
366a3(mdo sde): dpa na ma pa'i snying byo la legs so zhes bya b+ha b+hin te//khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byung chub sems dpa'i byab rnams bu nus pa 'du shin tu legs legs so//myong legs
366a4(mdo sde): par nyon la dran pa mngon du 'og shig/gos la ba/bcoM ma ldan 'das bka' bzhin du thos par ston te/mnyan cing mnos par 'tsham nas gas dang /bcom ldan 'das
366a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni maM pa'i snang ba la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ches bon dang wAnu na brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems mi gdung bar bstsum
366a6(mdo sde): chos bzhi gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la skyong rje cher bskyed pa dang /brtson 'grus bskyed cing la lo mi byed pa dang /spyi shi'i 'khor po rmi lam tsam dang 'dra bar shAs
366a7(mdo sde): dang /yang dag pa'i mad kyis sangs rgyas kyi ma shes bsam pa dang ben ste/byang chub sa mas dpa' chomangon po dag dang ldan na dka' thub dang brgyal thugs kyi
366b1(mdo sde): gdung ba med par 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na nges pa'i tshig la bar ma dor 'gyod par mi 'gyur//bzhi gang zhe na/ngas pa'i chag chos la bdag med par
366b2(mdo sde): mngon par chud ces brjod pa dang /nges pa'i tshig skye gnas so cag la dad pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa mi rigs pa zhes brjed pa dang /nges pa'i tshig gis theg pa chen po la rgyun du bsnga
366b3(mdo sde): pababarjod pa dang /nges pa'i tshig gis las dge sdig gi 'bras bu mi rlag ces brjod pa dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang tshus bzhi dang ldan na dge ba'i rtsangarda bar 'phel byar
366b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /mang du thos pa dang /sbyin pa byin pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang
366b5(mdo sde): ldan na 'jigs pa med cing tshul lngas mi g.yo bar 'gyur//bzhi gang zhe na/khe stor ba dang mi snyan par grags pa dang /smad cing dma' dbab pa dang /sdug bsngal gyis non kyang
366b6(mdo sde): minigaso ba dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na chos dkar po yongasu 'grub par 'gyu ro//bzhi gang zhe na/pha rol po las dge sdig yid ches par smon
366b7(mdo sde): ba dang /sbyin pa la lan mai re ba dang /dam pa'i chos bsrur zhing skyong ba dang /shes rab chen pos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstod par byed pa dang bzhi'o//rigs
367a1(mdo sde): bya byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan nas gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par 'gyur ro//chos bzhi gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba yun du
367a2(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang /nyes skyon thams cad sel ba dang /thabs la shin tu mkhas pa dang /dge ba'i brtson 'grus ci spyad pa byang chub tu bsngo ba dang bzhi'o//byang chub seMda' yang chos
367a3(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na thabs la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/sems can gyi yid dang mthun par byed pa dang /gzhan gyi bsod nams dang yon tan la rjes su yi
367a4(mdo sde): rang ba'i sems skyed pa dang /sdig yod na 'gyod tshangs byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs pa dang bzhi'o//byang
367a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can gyi ston pa byed par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/rtag tu sems can la phan pa dang bde ba bsgrub par byed pa dang /rang gi
367a6(mdo sde): dga' ba yongasu 'dor ba dang /mnyen des byas te bzod pa bsgom pa dang le lo spong ba dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' tshes bzhi dang ldan na tshe tshe rabs rab su byang chub kyi
367a7(mdo sde): sems chud mi zos par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la rtag tu dran par byed pa dang /bsod nams byas cog sems can gyi phyir bla na
367b1(mdo sde): med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang /theg pa chen po yongs su sgrog par byed pa dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan
367b2(mdo sde): na sems spyod pa rnam pa gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su mi spyod par 'gyuraro//bzhi gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi sems spang ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems spang ba dang /ches
367b3(mdo sde): sgrub pas skyo mi nges pa dang /chos ci thos pa gzhan la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na chos rin po che legs par bsgrub par
367b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/theg pa chen po chos dkon pa'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang theg pa chen po'i chos sems kyi nad thams cad sel ba'i phyir
367b5(mdo sde): smyen dang 'dra bar lta ba dang /theg pa chen po'i chos nam yang mi rlag pa'i phyir nor gyi dbyig dang 'dra bar lta ba dang /theg po chen po'i chos mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa'o
367b6(mdo sde): phyir sdug bsngal 'gog par lta ba dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul khrims nyams pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byung bar
367b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/chos rnams 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang /chos rnams song ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi 'gog pa'i bzod po thob pa
368a1(mdo sde): dang /chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba shes pa'i phyir chos la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang /tha dad pa'i sems rgyud med
368a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyuraro//bzhi gang zhe na/yang dag
368a3(mdo sde): pa'i dran pa mngon par bzhag pa dang /dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdam pa dang /dge ba'i chos kyi stobs bskyed nus pa dang /dben pa'i gnas su dad cing 'du 'ji spang bar bya ba
368a4(mdo sde): dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan ni tshogs mang po kun dang mthun par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/bdag chos sgrub na'ang khyad par thob par mi
368a5(mdo sde): sgrub pa dang /la lo med par rtag tu bkur sti dang gus pa'i sems skyed pa dang /chos kyi phan pa 'ba' zhig tshal gyi bdag mi spyom pa dang /gzhan la dge ba'i chos bstan
368a6(mdo sde): kyang rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /grags pa mi tshil ba dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyuraro//
368a7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/dam pa'i chos yongasu bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang /rang gi shes rab la phan par byed cing gzhan la ston par byed pa dang /rtag tu ya rabs kyi chos spyod pa
368b1(mdo sde): dang /rnam par dag pa dang ma dag pa'i chos la mi rtog pa dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi rlag par 'gyuraro//
368b2(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/pha rol po'i nyes skyon la dbang mi bza' ba dang /zhe sdang can la rtag tu byams sems bsgom pa dang /rtag tu chos thams cad rten 'brel du bshad pa dang /bla na med pa'i byang chub
368b3(mdo sde): la rtag tu dran par bya ba dang bzhi'o//byang chub songa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan gyis bstan pa la rag ma lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang
368b4(mdo sde): zhe na/rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa gzhan la byin pa dang /gzhan gyi kha na ma tho ba mi brjod pa dang /chos kyis bsdus te sems can gyi ston pa la mkhas pa dang /chos zab mo la chub par
368b5(mdo sde): shes pa dang bzhi'o//byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste 'dod pa'i khamasu mngon du skye bar 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/sems mnyen
368b6(mdo sde): des su bya ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu rnyed par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad mi gtong ba dang /shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i mthu stobs rgyun du bsgom nus pa dang bzhi'o//
368b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/skye shi'i 'khor ba grangs med par myong na'ang skyo ba'i sems
369a1(mdo sde): mi skyed pa dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod pa bya ba dang /byams sems tshad med par bsgom par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med
369a2(mdo sde): pa la mos pa bskyed pa dang bzhi'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi chod par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/sems
369a3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi phyir smon lam mi gtong ba dang /sbyin pa'i spyod lam la dad pa dang /brtson 'grus chen po la 'dun pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems zab mos rgyun du
369a4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang bzhi ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum du bgrod cing spyod pa rnam pa bzhi po'i rnam grangs spyad de/sems can la phan pa dang bde bar
369a5(mdo sde): byobyas shing 'jig rten las bzla bar bsgoms na sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyuraro//de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i chos rnam pa bzhi bzhir bshad pa'i tshe na lha bzhi khri ni bla na
369a6(mdo sde): med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed//mi las nyi khri lnga stong ni chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo//byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri brgyad stong ni chos kyi khams kyi bzod
369a7(mdo sde): bapa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par chud do//de'i tshe de'i dus na'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i
369b1(mdo sde): snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di legs par gzung zhig/chongs shig ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di
369b2(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mdo sde 'di'i ming ni thar pa chen po
369b3(mdo sde): phyogs su rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'joms pa/mu stegs kyi dpung dang bcas par gzhig pa/nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/leg par lta ba dang /'dod pa rnam pa
369b4(mdo sde): lnga'i 'ching ba 'grol ba/khams gsum gyi badz+ro nar 'dral ba 'khor ba las thar cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogasu bsgrol ba/sa bon dam pa'i rgyu skams pa la rlan par byed pa/
369b5(mdo sde): rgyu rkyen chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi char 'bebs pa/sems can theg pa gsum gyi myu gu dang me tog rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa/byang chub kyi 'bras bu mchog
369b6(mdo sde): thog pa gcig tu 'grub par byed pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
369b7(mdo sde): 'das bdag sngon 'das pa'i sadra rgyas grangs ma mchis pa'i spyan snga dang /'dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang /tshogs dpag tu ma mchis pa'i nang du chos rnam pa sna
370a1(mdo sde): tshogs dang /don rnam pa sna tshogs dang /mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang /theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thos na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos de
370a2(mdo sde): lta bu dang /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don de lta bu dang /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dang /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i theg pa chen po de lta bu ni thos ma myong ste/
370a3(mdo sde): deng thos pa 'di dag rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag la chos dang dge 'dun ni 'gag par mi 'gyur te/khams gsum gyi sems
370a4(mdo sde): can rang skye zhing rang 'gog par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang /chos dang dge 'dun ma mthong bas mya ngan las 'das te 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do//
370a5(mdo sde): bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis khams gsum du bgrod cing so so'i skye bo'i rje su snyegs te/mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bla dgas su brjod pa leg so//
370a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/bdag cag rnams kyis theg pa brgyad khris sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su chud par skyes bu chen po'i
370a7(mdo sde): chos kyi sku thob par bgyi'o//chos kyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la mdo sde 'di spel bar bgyi'o//gzung zhing 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kha ton du
370b1(mdo sde): 'don par bgyi'o//ji ltar bshad pa bzhin bsgoms te/dus gcig tu sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyi'o//mi gtong bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang /rigs/
370b2(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du snyigs ma can gyi dus su mdo sde 'di gzungasu bzung zhing klog gum/kha ton du bgyid dam/glegs bam
370b3(mdo sde): du yi ger 'bri 'am/yi ger 'brir 'jug na bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi
370b4(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rin po ches yongasu bkang ste sbyin pa byin pas/mdo sde 'di'i ming tsam thos pas bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o//gang la las
370b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcur/nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas mdo sde 'di'i glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu
370b6(mdo sde): med par che'o//gang la las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu nor bu rini po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas thog pa chen po phyogasu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di'i nang
370b7(mdo sde): na yi ge 'bru gcig gam/tshigs bcad gcig gam/sh+lo ka gcig 'bri 'am/'brir 'jug na de bso kyang bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o//'jig rten grangs med
371a1(mdo sde): pa'i khams su rin po ches yongasu bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di la sh+lo ka gcig klog gam kha ton byas na bsod nams
371a2(mdo sde): de bas kyang dpag tu med pa che'o//stong khams yongs su gang ba'i sems can gyi srog gi skyabs byin pa bas kyang gang gis sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i don tshig gcig/
371a3(mdo sde): shes te/gzhan la tshig gcig gam/sho lo ka gcig gi don bstan na bsod nams de bos kyang dpag tu med par che'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/zang zing gi sbyin pa ni nyan
371a4(mdo sde): thos kyi sbyin pa yin te/tshe dang longs spyod bskyed par zad kyi 'khor ba las mi thar ro//theg pa chen po chos kyi sbyin pa ni sems can rnams kyi byang chub rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /theg
371a5(mdo sde): pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi srog sdud par byed po'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni sngon sdig con ma rungs pa yin na'ang dge ba dang ldan pa'o//sngon sdug bsngal
371a6(mdo sde): can yin na'ang da longs spyod dang ldan pa'o//sngon 'ching ba can yin na'ang nga grol thar pa dang ldan par 'gyu ro//sngon ma rgal ba yin na'ang dargal ba can yin no//sngon blun
371a7(mdo sde): pa zhig yin na'ang da ni slob dpon du chud pa'o//sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na'ang da ni zag pa med pa'o//sngon so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa can zhig yin na'ang da ni 'phags
371b1(mdo sde): ba'i spyod ba dang ldan pa'o//sngon chos lam dang 'gal ba zhig yin na'ang du ni 'phags pa'i lam la chud pa'o//lus skye bo'i lus can yin na'ang mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir blo ni 'phaDa
371b2(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes dang 'dra'o//sngon nyon mongs pa can zhig yin na'ang dam sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no zhes bka' stsal
371b3(mdo sde): nas/byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ltar na/sngon so so'i skye bo lags kyang da ni 'phags pa'i spyod
371b4(mdo sde): ba dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba dang //sngon nyon mongs pa can lags na'ang da ni mdo sde 'di klog pa dang /'chang bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no//zhes
371b5(mdo sde): byung na tshul khrims zhig pa dang /mtshams ma mchis par spyad pa dang /dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa'ang ci mdo sde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ste/mya ngan las 'da' ba dang
371b6(mdo sde): mthun pa zhig lags sam/don de rig par dka' bzhin mchis na bcom ldan 'das bye brag phyed par bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
371b7(mdo sde): legs so leg so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang legs par zhus pas ngas kyang legs par bshad par bya'o//rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ma mthong ba'i phyir log par
372a1(mdo sde): lta ba dang /tshul khrims nyams pa dang /dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yin no//sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bzhugs pa na tshul khrims nyams pa dang /dam
372a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yong med do//de ji ltar zhe na/dper na dra ma mi gcig la bu gcig pu zhig yod pa de shin tu'ang phangs shing sdug na pha yod pa'i tshe na ni nyin mtshan
372a3(mdo sde): du bstan cing bslabs pas byas so cog la 'gal ba med du'ang pha la sri zhu che ste/pha'i ngag nyan cing nyes pa yod ma byung //re zhig dus gcig na pha la ma rI por 'dron du song ba
372a4(mdo sde): las ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i bar du bu de pha'i bstan ngag brjed nas nyes pa'ang mang du byung ngo //pha ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i phyir pha shi ba skad du brjod dud mo dag byed
372a5(mdo sde): cing khad kyis 'chal du byed do//mya ngan gyis non te sems stor nas pa'i bstan pa'ang brjed de chos la skur pa dang 'dra bar 'gal ba sha stag byed do//pha de yun ring mo
372a6(mdo sde): zhig lon nas dus gcig na slar khyim du log pa'i tshe bu'ang shin tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes nas sngon pa'i bstan ngag kyang dran te gzungasu bzung nas nyes pa'ang ma byung ngo //
372a7(mdo sde): pha mthong ba'i phyir pha ma shi bar yang yid ches nas log par ltung ba can zhes kyang mi bya'o//pho'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gal bar spyad pas skur pa can zhes kyang mi bya ste/rigs kyi
372b1(mdo sde): bu dra ma zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//bu gcig pu zhes pa ni sems can thams cad do//phas bstan cing bslabs zhes bya ba ni tshul khrim so//lam ring por song zhes bya ba
372b2(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gshegs pa'o//pha ma mthong zhes bya ba ni tshe 'daso zhes brjod pa'o//mya ngan gyis non pa ni sgrib pas
372b3(mdo sde): bsgribs pa'o//gzungasu mi 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims zhig pa'o//shi ba skad brjod pa'i phyir sdig spyod pa'o//don 'khrul ba'i phyir sbyar ba btab pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pas
372b4(mdo sde): khams gzhan nas sbyar gshegs te/sems can gyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid chos pa'o//sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan nas sems kyi rang bzhin
372b5(mdo sde): sgraslar rnyed pas tshul khrims mi nyams pa'o//mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa ni ltung ba med pa'o//bstan pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod cing don shes pa ni chos la mi sgyur ba yino//
372b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni 'khor ba glang med pa'i nyon mongs pa sdig lci ba kun 'byung bar 'gyuraro//gang mdo sde 'di thos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa'o//
372b7(mdo sde): gang mdo sde 'di mthong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba'o//gang mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o//gang mdo sde 'di spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzadapa spyod pa'o//
373a1(mdo sde): gang mdo sde 'di bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad pa'o//gang mdo sde 'di'i don shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi don shes pa'o//gang sangs rgyas kyi
373a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi don legs par khrol ba de ni nyon mongs pa gtan med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mdo sde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa
373a3(mdo sde): yongasu spang bar 'gyur ba'o//rigs kyi bu bskal pa brgyad khri la nyin zhag gcig tu rtsi ba/zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskal pa brgya
373a4(mdo sde): stong bye ba khrag khrig 'das pa la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phra do//yang bskal pa grangs de dang 'dra ba 'das nas sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad pa bas kyang mdo sde 'di
373a5(mdo sde): dang phrad pa ni shin tu dkon no//mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad pa dang 'dra'o//de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di blang
373a6(mdo sde): ba dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /khe ston du 'don pa dang /yi ger 'dri ba dang /'drir 'jug pa dang /gzhan la yang bstan na log par lta ba dang /ma rig pa'i nyon mongs
373a7(mdo sde): pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa'i sdig pa yongasu 'byang bar 'gyur/bsod nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur/'jig rten gyi mchod yon dpag tu med pa'ang 'ju bar 'gyur ro///
373b1(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal pa dang /na mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rang spangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon 'ju ba skad mi gda' na so so'i skye bo lta zhig yon 'ju bar 'gyur/
373b2(mdo sde): ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rang sangs rgyas yon mi 'ju mi srid do//sems can la chos bshad cing bsgral mi nus na'ang bsam gtan dang ting 'dzin lo
373b3(mdo sde): 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul cing sems can rnams sbrel bar byed pas mchod yin 'ju bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
373b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mdo sde kha gcig las byung ba lta ba log pa dang /tshul khrims zhig pa rnams khams gcig tu
373b5(mdo sde): lhan cig gnas su'ang mi rung ba dang /chu klung gcig la chab 'tshal du'ang mi rungango zhes byung la gso sbyong gi tshe gang zag de 'phags pa'i lam stor ba lags te/dge 'dun gyi nang
373b6(mdo sde): du'ang mi chud ces 'byung na ci'i slad du deng 'dir tshul khrims zhig pa rnams kyang mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur zhing gsungs/gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur na ni de
373b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dang yang tha mi dad la/'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang 'dra na bcom ldan 'das de tsam zhig bye brag phyed par bshad par smon/bdag kyang
374a1(mdo sde): thamamasas mnyams mtha a naHthathas mtha tha.a na tham yas ma ma tha ma mtham mtham mnyan amamatham
374a2(mdo sde): de thos nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan par bgyi'o//rnam par dgrol bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam pa'i
374a3(mdo sde): snying po la bka' stsal pa/legaso leg so//rigs kyi bu khyed la sogs pa deng 'dir byams pa dang /snying rje phun sum tshogs par ldan pas sems can rnams la skyeng
374a4(mdo sde): brtse bar bsams te/don de zhu ba ni rab tu'ang legs te ngas kyang bye brag phyed par bshad kyis legs par sems la nyon cig/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i spyod yul ni nyan
374a5(mdo sde): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig par yang mi 'gyur la/bdud dang /mu stegs dang /so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa'i gnas kyang ma yin te/de ni sangs rgyas
374a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa dang khyod kyi khong du chud par zad do//rigs kyi bu ngas rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan pa/sems can bzang ngan rnam pa mi rtog par sbyin pa
374a7(mdo sde): byas na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongasu 'grub po zhes bshad de/byol song la sbyin pa byin pas ni bsod nams kyi yon tan brgya thob par 'gyuraro//log spyod la sbyin pa byin pas
374a8(mdo sde): ni bsod nams kyi yon tan lan stong thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa ni 'chi 'phos nas log spyod kyi rgyun du 'gro'o//drin mi gzo ba dang khrel mod pa ni 'chi
374b1(mdo sde): 'phos na byol song gi rgyud du 'gro'o//log spyod kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang bsod nams can gyi yon 'jun mdo sde 'di klog pa dang /'chang ba'i gang zag lta zhing ci smos/de bas na
374b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab bo//tshul khrims 'jig pa dang /mtshams med par 'gro ba dang /dam pa
374b3(mdo sde): chos la skur pa dang /log par lta ba dang /nyon mongs pa can gyi sdig pa yongasu 'byung bar byed pas na mchod yon yang 'ju bar nuso//bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam
374b4(mdo sde): mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab/thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byin yang bsam gyis mi khyag mdo sde 'di
374b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang /klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan yang bsam gyis mi khya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de de bzhin no//rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/khyod kyis bshad pa bzhin te/yon
374b6(mdo sde): tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//ngas
374b7(mdo sde): dran pa sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te/bsnyen bkur byas na'ang nyan thos kyi tshul du spyod pas
375a1(mdo sde): nyos skyon mang du byung ba dang /tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu med pa dag byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang ngal lung bstan par ma gyur to//zlang /
375a2(mdo sde): pade 'das nas bskal pa mthong bar mos pa zhes bya ba nas ngas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phyag bzhi bcu lo mchod pa phul te/bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gi nga la lung
375a3(mdo sde): bstan to//bskal pa de 'das nas kyang bskul pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba na de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa dul te/bsnyen bkur byas ni'ang sangs
375a4(mdo sde): rgyas de dag gis dalung ma bstan to//bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sems dga' zhes bya ba na 'di'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong la mchod pa phul te/bsnyen bkur byas
375a5(mdo sde): na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis lung ma bstan to//bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sdug bsngal skyabs zhes bya ba dang /'jig rten rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin ga sha
375a6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegaso ga/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes du 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyor ba bla na med pa/lha dang
375a7(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sbyin chon po zhes bya ba byung ste/'di'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu lo mched po phul te/bsnyen bkur byis nas gdod mdo sde 'dzim
375b1(mdo sde): mi thos te/nyon mongs pa yongasu spangs kyis kyang mdo sde 'dod dung ma mthong ste/nga de'i tshe de'i dus na mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis ma khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsags te/mchod pa phul
375b2(mdo sde): na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to//rigs kyi bu snron bskal pa de snyed du sangs rgyas de la mchod pa de snyed cig phul ba dang /bsnyen bkur dang /
375b3(mdo sde): bstod pa byas nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te/nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang /tshul phun sum tshogs pa tshangs par spyad cing sbyin pa byin pa dang /tshul khrims bslab pa dang /nga rgyal dang /
375b4(mdo sde): blo sdang dang /gti mug spangs te/sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa dang /bzod pa dang /byams pa'i sems dang /ji ltar thos pa bzhin brtson 'grus su bshad pa dang /thos cog thams cad
375b5(mdo sde): mi brjed pa dang /'du 'dzi spangs te dben pa la gnas pa dang /bsam gtan dang ting 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /bsam gtan las byung ba chos nyan pa dang /klog pa dang /kha ton du 'don pa
375b6(mdo sde): dang /bsam pa la sogs pa byas kyang rgyal ba de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sdom pa mnos so cog 'jig pa dang /nyams pa mang du byung ba'i phyir ro//nyan thos dang /
375b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la chags pa'i phyiraro//theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar 'a chen po phyogs rgyas pa 'di ma thos pa'i phyiraro//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
376a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam spang bar bya/theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogasu rgyas par bsgom par byas na lung bstan pa
376a2(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro//gal te ngas bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad na'ang rdzogs par mi nus te/rigs kyi bu nga bskal pa de dag 'das
376a3(mdo sde): ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis tshegs chen po dpag tu med pa la theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogasu rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa
376a4(mdo sde): der mthong nas nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gdod thos pa dang mthong bar gyur to//rgyal ba de las blangs te 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /kha ton du bya ba dang /don bsam pa la sogs pa byas
376a5(mdo sde): nas de ma thag tu chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis nga la lung bstan pa/khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
376a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyu ro zhes bya bar lung bstan to//de bas na rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs te/'chang ba dang /klog pa la sa
376a7(mdo sde): ba byas na sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang myur du thob par 'gyur na/'jig rten na lha dang mir bcas pa'i mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ngas theg pa chen po
376b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu stobs rin pa che'i snying po dang 'dra bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshul khrims 'jig pa dang /dbul phongs pa rnams kyi tshul dang rin po che'i nor bu sbyin par
376b2(mdo sde): byed pa la bstod pa'i tshigasu bcad pa brjod par bya'o//theg chen dpe chad rgya mtsho bzhin//theg pa chung ngu ba rjes chu//theg chen dpe tshad ri rab lhan//theg pa chung ngu gro ga ma'i
376b3(mdo sde): mkhar//theg chen dpe tshad nyi zla bzhin//theg pa chung ngu me stag can//theg pa 'di ni theg chen yin//bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'o//dper na na mkha' dang 'dra ba//sems can
376b4(mdo sde): thams cad go 'byed do//theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang //theg pa 'di las 'da' ba med//theg pa chen po 'di nang nas//theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung /dpag pa'i grangs shig
376b5(mdo sde): yod na ni//thams cad bsgral bar mi nuso//theg pa bla na med pa 'di//sems can yongasu bsgral nus pa//na mkha' 'dra ba'i theg chen la//gang gis dpag med 'di spyad pa//nam
376b6(mdo sde): mkha' dpag tu med pa bzhin//gzugs dang dbyibs kyang yod med do//theg pa chen po'ang de bzhin te//thogs pa med cing dpag tu med//sems can thas cad de dag kun//theg pa
376b7(mdo sde): chen po 'di zhon la//theg pa'i mtshan ma rnam rtog na//gtos rgya che zhing mang du shong //gal te theg chen yon tan dang //theg pa gcig tu spyod pa ni//bskal pa dpag med rab bshad
377a1(mdo sde): kyang//man+ta du rdzogs par yang minus//zag pa thams cad kun gyi nang//theg pa chen po dam pa'i mchog/sems thag thog chen 'di blangs na//byang chub
377a2(mdo sde): shing drung mngon par 'gro/'ching ba med cing thogs med pa//bla na med pa'i theg pa 'di//theg pa dman pa'i mchog 'gyur bas//byang chub dkyil du 'jug par 'ang /
377a3(mdo sde): rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam rtag ste//sems can rnams la snying brtse phyir//phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la//theg chen mdo sde bshad par bya//glang zhig theg
377a4(mdo sde): chen theg pa ni//'phel ba'am 'grob pa yod med de//na mkha' bzhin du kun shong bas//theg pa chen po bsnam mi khyab//de phyir sems can thams cad kyis//brtson 'grus
377a5(mdo sde): su ni bsgom bya ste//mngon par shes pa rnams dang ni//ye shes chen po thob par bya//lha yi tshigs dang lha yi bdud//mu stegs nyon mongs sel 'dod na//theg pa chen po'i
377a6(mdo sde): skyab song la//mngon shes drug dang ldan par byes//rig pa gsum dang rnam thar gsum//des ni bdud dang mu stegs 'joms//log par lta ba'ang 'jil bas na//theg pa
377a7(mdo sde): chen po mchog tu dgos//nyon mongs thams cad 'jig pa dang //dge rtsa phun sum tshogs 'gyur bas//theg chen mthu ni bsam mi khyab//de bas dpag parang rab tu dka
377b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa yi chos rnams dang //'jig rten 'das pa'i chos thams cad//skyo ba dang mi slob de dag kun//zag pa chen por kun 'duso//sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror spyod pa ni//ldog par ltung
377b2(mdo sde): dang ni sdig grogs bsten//gang zhig theg pa chen por ma dad pa//des ni nyon mongs bdud rnams 'joms mi nus//de rnams spangs te theg chen skyabs song ba//grol thar 'dod pas theg pa
377b3(mdo sde): chen po slob//skyes bu gang zhig don 'di shes 'dod pa//theg chen bshad pa thos na dga' ba skye//de ni theg chen mi ni yin par mngon//zhi gnas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan//de
377b4(mdo sde): yang theg chen dbang gis rnam par brgyan//gang zhig theg pa chen por spyad nus pa//de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chad//gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la phyogs pa ni//de ni
377b5(mdo sde): bsod nams dpag med thob pa'o//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khamasu phyin pa dang //phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag med mchod pa dang //de bzhin thag chen phyogasu rgyas pa'i mdo//mchod na
377b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten theg pas thub pa med//dpal dang gzi brjid ldan zhing 'khor ba 'joms//de phyir theg pa chen po bsam khyab dka'//byad gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur//phun sum
377b7(mdo sde): tshogs ldan chos sku mngon par 'grub//gang zhig theg chen 'di la zhon pa ni//bla na med pa'i dga' ba myong ba yin//lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms na//de phyir theg pa bla med thob
378a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur//tshul khrims brtson 'grus tshangs par spyod pa ni//rdzu 'phrul mngon du nyi zla sgrib kyang nus//de yang theg chen spyod pa'i dbang giso//rang gi sems
378a2(mdo sde): kyis brtson 'grus rgyun spyod pa//des ni theg pa chen po thob pa'o//sdug bsngal non pa'i sgrib pa yod na yang //theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kun kyang 'byang //gang zhig theg chen chos
378a3(mdo sde): la bde gnas pa//de ni tshe dang longs spyod sangs rgyas bzhin//yang dag dran pa brtson par ldan pa ni//rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi stobs kyang rnyed//dam chos yang dag don la brten pa
378a4(mdo sde): yang //theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gi so//mi 'jigs dang ni stobs bcu ldan pa dang /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa dang //rdo rje ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad
378a5(mdo sde): kyang //theg pa chen po bsgom pa'i dbang giso//rigs kyi bu gang la las theg pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/'bru gcig gam/tshig gcig gam/tshigs bcad gcig
378a6(mdo sde): 'chang ngam klog na bsod nams 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyu ro//gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gang gis mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa//sdug bsngal kun dang yong bra'o//nam du'ang ngan 'gror mi
378a7(mdo sde): ltung ste//bde ba'i gnas su phyin par 'gyur//gang bri mdo sde 'di thos pa//phyi ma ma 'ongs dus ngan tshe//mtha' ru sangs rgyas 'grub par yang //ngas ni lung du bstan par bya//gang gis
378b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba rtag gzhol ba//rgyal ba'adra rtag tu de la gzhol//gang gis rgyal ba'i chos bsrungs na//rgyal ba'ang de la bsrung bar 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa dang //chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
378b2(mdo sde): bar nus//'khor gyi rgyud las bsgrol ba dang //bdud kyi dpung bcas 'jil yang nus//rgyal po 'od mi 'gyur de las//ngas ni mdo sde 'di thos nas//bzod par gnas te lung bstan pa//
378b3(mdo sde): shAkya thub ces bya ba 'grub//nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og na//gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar//ngas kyang lung du bstan par bya//gang gis ma 'ongs dus
378b4(mdo sde): kyi tshe/mdo sde 'di yi don shes te//blun po rnams la rab bshad pa//dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad//sangs rgyas 'jig rten mi bzhugs kyang //mdo 'di 'jig rten gang na bar///
378b5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i mchod gnas de dag du//sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs pa bzhin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ngas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa las mdo sde 'di mnos te 'chang/
378b6(mdo sde): ba dang /bskal pa 'jig pa'i tshe gzhan la rgya cher bshad pas na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang de ltar thob bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos
378b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad/deng 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
379a1(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad na/las kyi rgyu gang dang gang gi dbang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bstan
379a2(mdo sde): du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrubs pas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
379a3(mdo sde): 'grub pa yin te/gal te ngas rgya cher bshad du bskal pa'i bar du'ang bshad pas mi rdzogs pas deng mdo tsam zhig khyod la bshad do//de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems
379a4(mdo sde): thag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrung ba dang /yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /bla ma la bsu skyal dang /chos nyan pa
379a5(mdo sde): dang /gtsug lag khang dang /mchod rten bsgrub pa phu dud du byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan rtsibs stong dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad la
379a6(mdo sde): ma brnyas pas rti ba yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /dam pa'i chos yongasu bsrung bas sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /sdu ba rnam bzhi
379a7(mdo sde): goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar sor mo bar 'brel pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /gos bzang po sbyin pa byin pa bas/phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam
379b1(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /zhim po dang /gtsang ma dang /nyam su bde ba byin pas/bdun shin tu mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
379b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ches la thos par dga' bas ri dgas a na ya'i byin pa lta bu mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /gzhan gyi g.yo dang mtshang sbed cing bcabs pas gsang
379b3(mdo sde): ba'i gnas sgrub su nub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /dge ba bcu sgoms pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i chos yang dag par
379b4(mdo sde): blangs te sems can la rtag tu ston pas phreg so shin tu rgyus pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs byas pas phyag pa'i lhun mdzas
379b5(mdo sde): bar grub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang ngam/mchod rten bsgrub pa'i grogs byed par mos pa dang /slong ba rnams la bdag pa med ces ma
379b6(mdo sde): byas pas phyag brla drang por pus mo'i lha nga sleb pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /rtag tu dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang /srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing
379b7(mdo sde): drang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /na ba rnams kyi rtsi sman dang /rim gro dang /nyam su phan pa'i zas byin pas ro gro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba
380a1(mdo sde): dang /yun ring po nas tshig khyal pa spangs shing dus su smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad
380a2(mdo sde): la sems mnyam par snyoms pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /rtsod pa rnams sdum pa la dga' bas tshems thags bzang
380a3(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /rin po che'i sbyin pa byas pas tshems mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /lus dang ngag yongasu dag pas choms shin
380a4(mdo sde): tu dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /ngag gi nyes pa bsdams pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams
380a5(mdo sde): la rtag tu tshig 'jam po smre bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /byams pa'i sems bsgoms te rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta bas spyan dkar
380a6(mdo sde): nag 'byes pas mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /sems thag pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sgrub pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /gzhan
380a7(mdo sde): la bsod nams dang yon tan yod pa rjesu yi rang zhing bsngags pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /pha dang /ma dang /mkhan po dang /slob dpon
380b1(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i bla ma rnams la tshul bzhin du rim gro dang /btsun par byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /theg pa chen po'i chos bstan pa la
380b2(mdo sde): mos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur pa dang /stan dang /gos dang /khang pa dang /gnas bzang po byin phra gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
380b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi gtam sna tshogs de smra ba spangs pas ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /mkhan po dang /
380b4(mdo sde): bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa'i tshig yang dag par blangs pa dang /bzung ba mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /yon
380b5(mdo sde): tan dpag tu med par bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bskul bas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng
380b6(mdo sde): gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan bsgrubs na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis de
380b7(mdo sde): lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis
381a1(mdo sde): brtags na gang yang dngos po dang mtshan mar ma grub pa ste ma mchis la/de bzhin gshegs pa la brtags na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam de
381a2(mdo sde): ma lags na ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher grub ces gsungs/dkon mchog gsum dang /bden pa bzhi dang /phung po dang /skye mched dang /khams dang /rten 'brel bcu gnyis
381a3(mdo sde): dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na'ang phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras kun stong pa nyid de/mtshan ma ma mchis/smon pa ma mchis/skye zhing 'byung ba'ang ma mthong /'gag
381a4(mdo sde): cing nub pa'ang mo mthong /sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/sprul pa dang 'dra ba/'bar ba dang 'dra ge brag cha dang 'dra ba/tshab kyi zla ba dang 'dra ba/rus sbal gyi spu dang 'dro bag ri bong gi rwa dang 'dra ba/na mkha'i
381a5(mdo sde): me tog dang 'dra ga mo bsham gyi bu dang 'dra ba/gzugs brnyan gyi gos gyon zhing sgyu ma'i glang po che la 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba/mchis pa'ang 'dra/ma mchis pa'ang 'dra/de dag mchis pa
381a6(mdo sde): dang ma mchis pa/mchis pa'ang ma lags/ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/rtag pa ma lags/chud pa ma lags/skye ba ma lags/'gag pa ma lags/nang du ma lags/slad rol ma lags /
381a7(mdo sde): mthong ba ma lags/shes pa ma lags/dper na na mkha' dang 'dra ba la bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ngas ni spyod lam de dag spyad ces gsungs/de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis
381b1(mdo sde): brtags na bdag ma lags/sems can ma lags/srog ma lags/gsob ma lags/skyes bu ma lags/gang zag ma lags/shed can ma lags/shed bdag ma lags/byed pa po la
381b2(mdo sde): sogs pa ma lags/mig ma lags/gzugs ma lags/mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/rna ba ma lags/sgra ma lags/rna ba dang sgra'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma
381b3(mdo sde): lags/sna ma lags/dri ma lags/sna dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/lce ma lags/ro ma lags/lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/lus ma lags/reg bya ma
381b4(mdo sde): lags/lus dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/yid ma lags/chos ma lags/yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/rnam par shes pa ma lags//
381b5(mdo sde): gzugs ma lags/rnam par shes pa dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/gzugs ma lags/sdug bsngal ma lags/gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi
381b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/bdag ma lags/bdag gi ma lags/'gro ba ma lags/gzugs can ma lags/phung po ma lags/bden pa ma lags/brdzun pa ma
381b7(mdo sde): yags/bsdus pa ma lags/gtong ba ma lags/'byung ba ma lags/'jug pa ma lags te/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhi no//
382a1(mdo sde): phar bzhud pa ma lags/tshur byon pa ma la Da/bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang mi mnga'/sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'ang mi mnga'/lus dang ngag dang
382a2(mdo sde): yid kyi las mi mnga'/gcig pa'ang ma lags/tha dad pa'ang ma lags/'das pa'ang ma lags/ma byon pa'ang ma lags/da ltar byung ba'ang ma lags/dri ma can ma lags//
382a3(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa ma lags/bdag ma lags/sems can ma lags/srog dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag la sogs pa'ang ma lags/rtag pa ma lags/chad pa ma lags//
382a4(mdo sde): skye ba mi mchis/'gag pa ma mchis/sgom du ma mchis/spyod du ma mchis/dor du ma mchis/blang du ma mchis/mtha' las 'das pa/yun du bzhugs pa la gang gi slad du
382a5(mdo sde): spyod lam rgya cher bsgrubs zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la legaso zhes
382a6(mdo sde): bye ba byin nas leg so so leg so//rigs kyi bu khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/yun ring
382a7(mdo sde): po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don chub par chud de/cho so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du mngon par shes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das te/
382b1(mdo sde): yun du gnas par yang shes pas rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na/nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya shin tu dang ba gsal ba/'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo stong gi bar du bzhag kyang /rang bzhin yong
382b2(mdo sde): gis dag pas phyir phyung na'ang snga mkho bzhin te/khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs la/rang bzhin rnam par dag pas/khyed rnams da ltar khams
382b3(mdo sde): gsum na snyigs ma can rnam lnga'i 'dab rdzab tu gnas te/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /sems can gyi don byas kyis kyang 'dam rdzab kyis ma gos pas na don 'di lta bu dag
382b4(mdo sde): 'dri nus pa yino//rigs kyi bu khyod yang nyon cig/'di lta ste/chos so cog thams cad yang dag par na dngos po med de/yi ge yod pa'i phyir tshwa yod pa de bshad/chos kyi nang du
382b5(mdo sde): yi ge med la mi ge'i nang du 'dra tshos med do//kun tu spel ba'i phyir yi ge bstan to//yi ge'i nang du ni byang chub kyang med/byang chub kyi nang du ni yi ge'ang med mod kyi/dron dam pa
382b6(mdo sde): ni yi ge med kyang kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ge las gud na mi rnyed do//rigs kyi bu khyod zer
382b7(mdo sde): ba'ang bden te/de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med/skye ba med/mi bsgom mi spyod/bsgom spyod rnams dang bral ba/yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug/de las ldog cing 'gyur ba'ang
383a1(mdo sde): ma yin te/skye ba gcig gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su'ang ma skyes/de las babs te yum gyi lhum su'ang ma gnas/chos thams cad sems myi gnas pas
383a2(mdo sde): nga ni skye rga na 'chi las 'daso zhes kyang ma byas/phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma bor/nga ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa'i btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod/grong khyer mchog
383a3(mdo sde): rten bcung bzang po dang yang ma rtsen/'jig rten gyi bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa'ang ma bslabs/stobs dang 'phong rtsal yang ma bskrun/sems can yongasu mya ngan las bzla
383a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir rgan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni lus la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o//nad pa mngon sum du bstan pa ni tshe la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o//shi ba'i mtshan ma
383a5(mdo sde): mngon sum du bstan pa ni 'dod chags dang nga dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag pa'o//dge slong mngon sum du bstan pa ni sems can rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon
383a6(mdo sde): bar 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i chos brtson la bar bsgrub par bya ba'o//grong khyer mchog nas byung ste gshegs pa ni khams gsum gyi btson ra nas thar pa dang 'bras
383a7(mdo sde): bu ma yin pa rnams bstan pa'o//slar gzigs pa ni byams sdang mi mnga' bar bstan pa'o//de'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam par brgyan cing sems can gyi bsod
383b1(mdo sde): nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o//dbu skra breg pa dang /rgyan rnams spangs pa dang /rta tsan ta ka zhabs ring dad pa can la slar bskur ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang dpral bar bstan pa'o//kha
383b2(mdo sde): spu bregs pa ni chos thams cad le mi chags par bstan pa'o//ka sha dur smismrig gyon pa ni sems can 'dul bar bstan pa'o//drang srong u ta ka dang /a ran+ta la chos 'dri tog bya ba ni
383b3(mdo sde): rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'joms par bstan pa'o//lo drug gi bar dka' thub spyad pa ni mu stegs 'dul ba'o//zhal zas blangs pa 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba'o//rtswa sa sti
383b4(mdo sde): ka bslangs pa ni cho ga shes par bstan pa'o//rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni nyam rangs dang g.yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o//lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa
383b5(mdo sde): dang bsnyen bkur byas pa ni yon tan gyi 'bras bu la bkod par bstan pa'o//bdud rnams brtul ba ni dpa' ba'i mthu bstan pa'o//phyag g.yas pa sa la bstan pa ni bsod nams kyi
383b6(mdo sde): mthu bstan pa'o//sa chen po kun tu g.yo ba ni drin gyi lan ldon par bstan pa'o//de ltar mtshan ma med par bsgoms pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yino//'di
383b7(mdo sde): ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mngon sum du mkhyen nas/chas kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa thub pa med de/chos bsdan
384a1(mdo sde): to cog la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i don bstan pas na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o//dus gsum gyi bya ba dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos mngon du gsal bar/
384a2(mdo sde): gzigs shing mkhyen pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//bden pa dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir lha dang mi'i mkhan po zhes bya'o//gang zhig de ltar bslab cing rtog pa
384a3(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//de la log par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/sangs rgyas thams cad la bslu ba can zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams
384a4(mdo sde): cad ni mi 'byung mi 'jug mi skyo mi 'god ste/sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung zhes brjod pa dang /sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da'o zhes brjod pa yin no//
384a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la bang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yang dag par na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong
384a6(mdo sde): ba nyid du rtogs te/de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba 'am nub pa mi mnga' bas rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang ma bltam/byang chub kyi shing drung du'ang mya ngan las ma'adas/mtha'
384a7(mdo sde): las 'das te yun du gnas ga sems can yongasu bsgral bar mdzad pa'i slad du dka' thub spyad cing mya ngani las 'da' bar bstan kyang yang dag par na 'gyur ba 'am spros
384b1(mdo sde): ba mi mnga' zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul kun du gnas te/khams gsum na sru 'byung ba'ang chos kyi sku rnam pa lnga 'byung //lnga pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid
384b2(mdo sde): dang /sku yon tan dang /sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid los skyes pa dang //sku sprul cing 'byung ba dang /sku ni mkha' lta bu dang lnga ste/de la sku yang dge ba'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba ni yang dag pa'i 'bras bu/
384b3(mdo sde): mchog mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa rang gi dbyings la yun du gnas pas na sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o//sgyusku ston can zhes bgyi ba ni sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du
384b4(mdo sde): spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pas na sku yon tan can zhes bgyi'o//sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi ba ni chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad
384b5(mdo sde): thug su chud de mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/spyod yul de la yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te/yang dag par rdzogs pas na sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi'o//sku sprul cing
384b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba zhes dgyi ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par bstan cing skyabasu mi mdzad pa ma mchis te/sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan du
384b7(mdo sde): 'gyur dran su sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o//sku na mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni na mkha' mtha' yas pas na ches kyi sku yang mtha' yas so//na mkha' la dpag po dang gzhal du ma mchis pas
385a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi sgra yang dpag tsacang gzhal du ma mchisate/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra rang nam/kha' tshan pa dang 'dra bas sems can yongasasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skad dusgra
385a2(mdo sde): rnaM ba lngar ston pas na de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'//'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon//chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te sems can yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du
385a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mngon du sprul cing chos rnam par spel ba leg so zhes gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka'
385a4(mdo sde): stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pas spyod yul thams cad la rab tu chod pa'am thogs pa med de/rigs kyi bu
385a5(mdo sde): khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang /'jig rten longs spyod can zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha dag theg pa
385a6(mdo sde): tshon po 'ba' zhig spyod de/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na ngan song lta ci zhig smos/khyod bskal pa de dang 'jig rten der de bzhin
385a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bo tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing theg pa
385b1(mdo sde): na po thar ba phyogs rgyas pa'i mdo sa mnyan pa dang /blangs pa dang /bcangs par 'gyuraro//de bas na sems can gang la las byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i skyong bar meng thos te phyag 'tsha
385b2(mdo sde): zhing mchod pa byas ni 'jig rten longs spyod can gyi khams der skye bar 'gyuraro//sems can gang la las theg pa chen po chos sgrub na'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/
385b3(mdo sde): gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang zhing banangs pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba btsu ma 'das par lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyuraro//de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bya
385b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir zhus nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /mdo sde
385b5(mdo sde): rgyu gnyis kyi mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs te/seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o//des
385b6(mdo sde): ba'i tshig bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing bzhes te/mya ngan las mI 'da' bar rig pa'o//yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes
385b7(mdo sde): bstan pa dang /sgra'i bdud mu stegs la sogs pa sra skong ste/skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o//de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong
386a1(mdo sde): chen po'i khams kun khebs par g.yog nas/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.ya so//rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs mthon
386a2(mdo sde): nub phyogs dma' nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'//byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'//dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/mtha' mtho na
386a3(mdo sde): dbus dma' ba ni sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya'o//ljags kyi drung nas 'od zer chen po btang ste phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byaso//snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni rtag par
386a4(mdo sde): byas/ma dag pa ni dag par byas/sdug bsngal can ni bde bar byas/ma rig pa ni rig par byas//de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang /nags tshal dang //
386a5(mdo sde): yul sa dang /chu bo'i klung dang /rgya mtsho dang /lcags kyi ri khor yug dang /dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dma' med par mnyam par gyur cing nyal nyil dang /ldan
386a6(mdo sde): ljin med/kun kyang yongasu dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste/dper na shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o//de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das
386a7(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni na mkha' nas bab pa'i me tog gi char bab po dang 'dra'o//sa 'og nas byung ba ni sprin dang /na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar na mkha' yongasu gang ste nam mkha'
386b1(mdo sde): stong pa cung zad kyang med do//sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da'o//sems can thams cad la
386b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes gsungs/yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid do zhes gsungaso//spyod lam de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis
386b3(mdo sde): theg pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas de ma thag tu kun mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tshe snang ste/de'i tshe tshogs mang po thams cad kyis sku sprul
386b4(mdo sde): pa de dag mthong bas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mthu ste/shAkya thub pa yang byams pas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe
386b5(mdo sde): tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thobo//nyen thos brgyad khri zhig ni theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do//dge
386b6(mdo sde): slong stong phrag bcu zhig ni dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo//dge slong ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam thob bo//dge bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus ni lan cig phyir 'ong
386b7(mdo sde): ba'i lam tho bo//dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcu zhig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam thob//lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni chos kyi mig rdul med pa dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob
387a1(mdo sde): ste/rang gi tshe snga phyi shes pa dang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong ngo //de nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
387a2(mdo sde): chen po seng ge'i sgras stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
387a3(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gong du bstan pa bzhin na ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang /chos kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang /dge 'dun gyi mtshan
387a4(mdo sde): thos na'ang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro//zhes 'byung na sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/chos kyi mthu lags sam/dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sem/sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na
387a5(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/chos kyi mthu lags na ni chos la gsol ba bgyi/dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni dge 'dun la gsol ba bgyi lags na gsum char la
387a6(mdo sde): gsol ba bgyi ci 'tshal/gong na gsungs pa theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong ngo zhes byung na/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bshad na
387a7(mdo sde): sems can lta ci zhig smes zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//legaso
387b1(mdo sde): legs so//rigs kyi bu/sems can la phan pa dang /badre ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu legs par nyon cig ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bsha do//sangs rgyas kyi mazung ba'
387b2(mdo sde): zhig kyang ma yin/chos kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te/kun tshegs pa'i mthus sangs rgyas ni sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma//
387b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yi no//sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba smrar rnyed 'khor ba la skyo nas dran pa'i mthu mang pos khams gsum na
387b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na phyogasu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po bye'o//de bas na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyang tshe so//chos kyang dge 'dun no//
387b5(mdo sde): dge 'du ni 'dus ma byas pa'o//'dus ma byas pa ni stong pa nyid/'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas kyi stong pa nyid dang /nang gi stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /chen po
387b6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang /chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du 'dra ste/de las gzhon medo//rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba lta na/rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa gsum du bsgrub ci
387b7(mdo sde): dgos zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na mi gcig na mkha' stong pas skrag ste/gar phyin dgur gab kyang na mkha' dang yong ma bral lo//rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshe
388a1(mdo sde): bas bshad pa dang /ngas pa shang cog dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu rkyen dang /dkon mchog gsum dang /theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'o//byang chub sems
388a2(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge sgras gsol pa/leg so leg so//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pas bstan pa ltar na bdag snga nas 'tshal te sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags so//
388a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo//thar pa chen po phyogasu rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni yum/byang chub
388a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi ni shul chen po//rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mig ste/lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang /sems ster ba rnams skyong ba dang //ngan song gsum gyi sgro gcod pa dang /
388a5(mdo sde): bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chu ba sgo 'byed pa dang /nyan thos rnams bzlog pa ste/theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du bdag gis gzungs chen mo'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bskyab par
388a6(mdo sde): bgyi'o//sdom pa ma nyams pa dang /mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa dri la'ang srung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o//gal te gang zag gang le las mdo sde 'di la bsnyen bkur
388a7(mdo sde): bgyid cing dgung bdun gyi bar du spyad pa spyod pa la bdud sdig can gyis 'khrug cing 'tsho ba'i glags lta ba mchis na/bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par bgyig
388b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te/yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba'ang byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
388b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o//ston pa la'ang rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge
388b3(mdo sde): sgras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smra so//na mo bud+hA ya/na mo d+hur+m+ma yaM/na maHsag+hA ya/a dan+ti da ra ni/tad+ya thA/ta A kA sha ni ba ni/sarba d+har+m+ma ni ba nI/i sha ma da/
388b4(mdo sde): pi ba sha na/bi ma la su pa ri/d+harma ni kha na/ba ra ru ni tsa ya ta ma le/tsa le/hu lu hu lu/shi bi te/man+ta man+ta/man+taHswA hA/sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing mchod rten la
388b5(mdo sde): lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogasu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bgyi
388b6(mdo sde): ste sems gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste/deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lag so//gal
388b7(mdo sde): te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smod pa mchis na sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro//gzungs 'di la smod pa ni tshe rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub tu bsgrub kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/
389a1(mdo sde): masas mamasama.amathasama.a nathamam yas ma yas yam mamam mtsham ma mamam
389a2(mdo sde): srid pa gsum las kyang mi 'da'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/sngags 'di ni sems dran pa nyams pa rnams slar rnyed pa dang /gzungs 'di lan cig tsam rna bar thos sam/
389a3(mdo sde): thos nas yi ger bris te/sha dang chang mi 'tshal bar sdom pa la gnas shing bdag nyid rtsed 'jo la sogs pa spangs te/'du 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug la/rgyun du byams pa chen po spyod cing
389a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan la gces par 'dzin na gang zag de dang ga tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sems thag pa nas blong ba dang //
389a5(mdo sde): bcang ba dang /nyin re zhing klog pa dang /kha ton tu bgyid pa dang /yi dam du mi bskyang bar bgyid na gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur
389a6(mdo sde): zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgra lo bka' stsal pa/leg so leg so//rigs kyi bu khyed dkon mchog gsum gyi ri mi gro bya ba dang /byams
389a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams srid pa gsum las 'don pa dang /bslab pa mang po grangs med pa la phan pa dang /bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir ston pa'i sgo 'byed cing log par lta
389a8(mdo sde): pa rnams bzlog ste yang dag par lta ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni shin tu yang leg so//rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad khyod kyi ming dang sngags kyi sgra
389b1(mdo sde): thos nas dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de mi smod na gang zag de tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde la/'chi 'phos na'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing nga'ang mthong la/khyod la sogs pa byang
389b2(mdo sde): chub sems dbang thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste the tshom med do//kun nas nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang /dge ba kun gyi lam
389b3(mdo sde): bsgrubs te//sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang //rnam dag dad pa'i dbang giso//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nga mya ngan las 'das bI 'og tu r-i kyi bu 'am/riT kyi
389b4(mdo sde): bu mo gang la las nyin gcig gam/dus gcig gam/mtshan gcig gam/skad cig ma gcig la phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /mdo sde bcu gnyis
389b5(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /don dam pa'i bden pa la bsam na gang zag de ni skad
389b6(mdo sde): cig ma se gal gtogs pa tsam gyis mi dge ba bcu dang /mtshams med pa lnga dang /mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad yongasu ma lus par 'bar
389b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro//gal te dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/dge sbyong ngam/dge sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas rtsa ba bzhi dang /sdom pa brgyad nyams
390a1(mdo sde): pa dang /mi dge ba bcu dang /mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang /mnyam pa nyid la skur pa rnams phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan
390a2(mdo sde): la dad pa bskyed phyag 'tshal na 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu sngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na rgyal bu
390a3(mdo sde): dge mthong zhes bya ba de'i tshe mi sum stong dang lhan cig tu skad cig ma der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas tshig mthun
390a4(mdo sde): par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag bskul pa grang ma mchis pa nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi rdzogs te/mi dge ba
390a5(mdo sde): bcu dang /mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig pa'i grangs ma mchis par bgyis pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten nas byang
390a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol te/'gyod tshangasu gsol zhing mchis na skabs dbye zhing ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
390a7(mdo sde): pa/legaso leg so//rigs kyi bu 'jigaso pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang dka' la/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang dka' ste/mi dge ba bcu dang /mtshas med pa lnga 'thol zhing 'chags
390b1(mdo sde): bar 'dod pa ni log spyod la sogs pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mthong du nye bas yid la dran pa bzhin du mthol zhing shogs shig/de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum
390b2(mdo sde): stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams pa'i gsung thos nas gos tshags bcos te thal mo sbyar cing phyag btsal nas bla gos phrag pa g.yasu gzar te/
390b3(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas le skyabasu mchi'o//phyogs
390b4(mdo sde): bcu'i cho so la skyabasu mchi'o//phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabasu 'chi'o//yang 'di lta ste/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'khrug mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu mchi'o//
390b5(mdo sde): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gso'o//nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gso'o//byang phyogs
390b6(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo//bla mo phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol//'og mo phyogs kyis sangs rgyas
390b7(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gso'o//yang shar phyogason skyes bu chen po kun tu bzang po phyog 'tshal zhing skyobasu gsolo//lho phyogs na skyes bu chen po 'jig
391a1(mdo sde): rten 'dzin la phyug 'tshal zhing sgrubasu gsol//nur phyogs na kun tu spyan rAs gzigs dpyang phyug la phyug 'tshal zhing skyabs gso'o//byang phyogs na zla
391a2(mdo sde): gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo//bla ma phyogs na na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol//'og mo phyogs na skyes bu chen po brtan dpal la phyag
391a3(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo//yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyu ro ba la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo//ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag
391a4(mdo sde): nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing skyab su gsol//phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo//da ltar bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom
391a5(mdo sde): ldan 'dis shAkya thub pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo//skyes bu chen po dri ma med par grags pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs//
391a6(mdo sde): su gsolo//'phags pa dga' bo dang 'od srung la 'od phyag 'tshal zhong skyabasu gsolo//'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam bzhi mngon par 'byung ba rnams la'ang phyag 'tshalo
391a7(mdo sde): zhing skyabasu gsol lo//byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo//sde snod chen po gsung rang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang mnyam pa
