391b1(mdo sde): nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs 'tshal la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol//cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung dang ring bsgyel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la'ang byan
391b2(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol//da lta na sku gzugs bzhugs pa thams cad la 'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsolo//phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /tshangs pa
391b3(mdo sde): dang /brgya byin dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang phyug dang /bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dang /so'i lha dang /ri dang /nags tshal dang /shing drung gi lha dang /drang srong dang //
391b4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams dang /lha'i spyan mnga' ba rnams dang /lha'i snyan mnga' ba thams cad kyis snyan gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig/kun dbang du gsol te//
391b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags po zhig mchis na'ang sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig/yang de skad ces smras pa dang /bdag cag thog ma ma mchis pa nas
391b6(mdo sde): da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du nor cing 'khrul pa'i sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i las/bgyis pa brjod kyis
391b7(mdo sde): mi lang ste/sdig pa'i tshogs bgyiso//'tshal rang gis ma tshor ma rig pas ngan sems rab tu rgyas te/tshe phyi ma ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong bas nyon mongs pa'i bag
392a1(mdo sde): chags la mos te/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing lngas ngan pas bar du chod nas sdig pa'i grogs po dang bsten cing dge slong dang /dge slong ma la ma
392a2(mdo sde): rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang /pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang /yang bdeg rang nyams kyi dbang gis dge 'dun gyi dkor ner thugs thub tu
392a3(mdo sde): spyad pa dang /dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang /'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa'am/byang chub
392a4(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can bkum pa'am/chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/chos la chos ma lags zhes skur pa/chos ma lags pa ni chos lags zhes
392a5(mdo sde): brjod/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi rtag ces bgyis/dam pa'i chos la yang mi rti go zhes bgyis/dge 'dun dkon mtshig kyang mi rtago zhes bgyis/sbyin pa dang shes
392a6(mdo sde): rab la ni ma mos/log pa'i chos la dad cing 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/khrel zhing ngo tsha ba yid dpag tu ma mchis te/dkon
392a7(mdo sde): mchog gsum la skyabasu gsolo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/phyogasu snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
392b1(mdo sde): ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing
392b2(mdo sde): slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to//yang 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang /sangs rgyas dus gsum
392b3(mdo sde): du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig bgyis pa dang /log spyod kyi spyad spyod pa dang /ngag rtsub mo gtong ba dang /dam pa'i chos la bkur pa 'debs pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing mthol ma myong
392b4(mdo sde): ste/sems la gnod pa 'am/ngo che ba ma mchis par mi dge ba bcu dang /mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci bang+ge bar bgyis par rang gis 'tshal kyang nongs pa
392b5(mdo sde): bcab nas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'i sems thog ma nas ma mchis par dad pa can gyi mchod pa blangs nas mthol zhing bshags pa ma myong ste/dam pa'i chos
392b6(mdo sde): yun du btsugs te rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smos shing brnyas pa dang /ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang /chod na dkon mchog
392b7(mdo sde): gsum yang med do//zhes brjod pa dang /mi dge ba bcu dang /mtshams ma mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag cu ma mchis/gnong zhing khrel ba
393a1(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis te dkon mchog gsum la skyab su gsaso//ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mA da skye phyogs zloms pa'i ya sum byug //
393a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags ni bdag cag gi sdig bskul pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mo 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing
393a3(mdo sde): bshags par 'tshal na/gzung ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol//slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon yang 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa tshun chad phyin
393a4(mdo sde): ci log tu lta lta ste/rtsa ba bzhi ni sbom por bshad//sbom po ni rtsa ba bzhir bshad/zhig pa rnams ni ma zhig lnga bshad me zhig pa rnams ni zhig par bshad/lci ba rnams ni yang
393a5(mdo sde): bshad/yang baM rnams ni lci bar bshad/dag pa rnams ni ma dag par bshad/ma dag pa rnams ni dag par bshad dang yang log par lta bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod
393a6(mdo sde): cing bsngags nas chos dang mdo sde lnga ni ma gus te sme dran gyi gtam rtag tu gleng shing brjod pa dang /me brtags pa'i rnam pa brgyad po 'chang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'
393a7(mdo sde): yang dag ba ni/bdud kyi tshi go zhes be byis pa dang /bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkar zhes bgyis pa dang /mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la yid ches par 'dzin
393b1(mdo sde): bdang da shin gshegs pa mthar mya ngan las 'das te med pas dkon mchog gsum yang mi rtag zhes bgyis nas lus dang sems 'khrul cid sbyin cu log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mtshas
393b2(mdo sde): pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/gnod zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/dkan mchog gsum la skyobasu gsa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni
393b3(mdo sde): byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' spro//phyog su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i yeshes gnyen lags ni bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs mu
393b4(mdo sde): mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon
393b5(mdo sde): to//yang 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas tshe lus 'di la thug gi bar du dge 'dun spyi'i nor ram/phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/da
393b6(mdo sde): sngar bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram/dge slong gang zag gi nor ram/yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rjes la brkus pa'am/rang nyam du spyod pa dang /yang
393b7(mdo sde): rang smos te/bdag dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi 'am/'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo zhes smras pa la sogs pa rkyen de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur te khyim nas
394a1(mdo sde): rgyum song bar rab yang bya ba ban dang /snam pa brgyud dang /drug dang /dge 'dun gyi skyugs bcu kAsum dang / des btsun ga nyis drug nga
394a2(mdo sde): ji ltung ba sum nu dang /snang ba dgu 'ad+hi dang /sa sor bshugs bre bani dang /basmra ba'i mang po dang /bdun shin tu lci ba'i rgyus rnams te/tshul khrims de dag re re la nyis
394a3(mdo sde): byas nas dam pa la thug bar du ny+tsa mas byA dang /mtshams ma mchis pa lta bgyis pa dang /dam pa'i chos dang /med sde zab mo la sgyur ba dang /ldog spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa
394a4(mdo sde): no na ngan 'a bcabs te mgyid cing mnam me myong bas nyin mtshan du 'phes zhing skye sbyin rgyal ba dag pa shad pe las thos pa ni dum pa chos la sbyor ba 'di
394a5(mdo sde): mimamachis pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/rtsa ba bzhi 'am par gyur pa rnams ma bshags ma mtha lda na sems can dmyal bar nges par snang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /bya
394a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpe' rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyu sa kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi 'gyur/dge 'dun dang ba ma dang /sgyu rnams dang /mi rnams kyis kyang sgrubs dang
394a7(mdo sde): rab bgyid mi nus so zhes byung bas na de'i slad du deng 'dzegs shing sgrog pa dpag tu ma mchis//gnong zhingo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis te/de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum
394b1(mdo sde): su du na tu tshun du smra ma sa nga du sun du dus smra na na
394b2(mdo sde): na rkye seM sa nyas pa'i kyi kyi ba dang shes na pa
395a1(mdo sde): sems 'khrugs pa dang /'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chog ma 'tshal to//mi dge ba'i lngas rnams bgyis pa dang /'gro ba bzang mos bsdus te 'dod chagasA da /zhe
395a2(mdo sde): sdang dang /gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing sems 'khrugs te/spros pa dang /lus dang /ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas bsogs pa'i las mi dge ba bdag rang gi bgyis
395a3(mdo sde): ba dang /gzhan bgyid du stsal pa dang /bgyid pa la rje su yi rang ba de dgu thams cad dang so sor 'chag so//mtho lo//mi 'cha'o//sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /'phags pa'i dge 'dun
395a4(mdo sde): la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa'ang dang so sor 'chagaso mtho lo//mi 'cha bo//byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs rgyas la'ang bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa deng
395a5(mdo sde): so sor 'chag so//mthol lo mi 'cha'o//ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos la bskor pa btab pa dang /pha ma dang //mkhan po dang /slob dpon gyi drin glo bar ma chud pa'i slad
395a6(mdo sde): du bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang der so sor 'chag so//mthol/mi 'tshab go blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te/nyam rangs dang rgyags pas mi dge ba sna
395a7(mdo sde): tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dge kyang deng so sor 'chag so//mtho lo//mi 'chago slan chad kyang mi bgyidado//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gi yon phul zhing
395b1(mdo sde): mchod pas ni ma lus pa'i sems can de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod de/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu
395b2(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//legaso skyes bu chen po rang gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te//
395b3(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa dang skrag pa skyes nas nyes pa rnams mngon par methol ba'i steng du sems can gyi sdig pa mang po'ang khyod kyis mthol zhing 'chags pa'i
395b4(mdo sde): phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o//rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i steng du sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ring du dpral bar byas pas de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu
395b5(mdo sde): dam pa yang dog pa zhes bya ba yin te/rang gi don du smon pa ma yin te/thog mar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
395b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o//de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyod tshangs
395b7(mdo sde): bgyis pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de 'di skad ces bstod do////bcom ldan nyag cig gtso bo khyod//khams gsum pha ma thams cad mkhyen//thams cad mi mnyam
396a1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid/bcom ldan dkon la phyag 'tshalo//skye bo sbyin gtong rang gi phyir//nor rdzas byin cing lan yang re//byams chen rgyal ba de min to//dgra gnyen byam
396a2(mdo sde): dang phan snyoms mdzad//rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun//shes rab sbyin gyis mkhyen gzigaso la//brtson 'grus cha bdag skyabasu mchi//lha gzhan shes rab de ma 'tshal//'das
396a3(mdo sde): dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs//rgyal ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal//de bzhin rgyal po skyabs gsol ba'ang //dus gsum rgyal po mchod pa bzhin//de na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
396a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis rgyal bu dag mthong dang mi sum stong la tshig su bcad de bstod pa//gang ni go sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa'ang //mang du thos la 'byung bar byos//slob dpon dge la bskur
396a5(mdo sde): byas nA//sangs rgyas 'grub la yun mi ring //gang zhig tshul khrims rnam dag spyad//de ni dge slong yang dag yin//gang zhig stong par bsgom nus pa//de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya//
396a6(mdo sde): gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa//de ni byang chub spyad pa'o//gang zhig mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ba//de ni dga' ba yang dag pa'o//tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang //rnam dag
396a7(mdo sde): khrims 'dzin dge slong mo//zla ba phyed cing gis phying byos//chos gos rnam pa lus gyon te/lhung bzed gseg gshang thogs nasu//rnam dge bsod snyoms 'gro byas na//lha rnams kun
396b1(mdo sde): kyang dga' 'gyur bas//thal mo sbyar cing gus phyag 'tshal//ngas kyang lha dang mi rnams kun//de yi bya ba byed du bzhug/dper na lha bran thams cad kyis//lha yi dbang po brgya byin la//rim
396b2(mdo sde): gro gus par byed pa bzhin//da ltar 'phral du'ang lan thob ste//phyi ma'i dus su'ang dpag tu med//rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa//sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya//rgyal bu dge
396b3(mdo sde): mthong 'di lta ste//nga dang sems dpa' ma gtogs par//'jig rten pa'i mi kun kyang //rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun//mya ngan mi 'da'
396b4(mdo sde): rtag tu bzhugs//chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te//de ltar mngon par shes pa ni//sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya//rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste//'jig rten pa yi mi dag kun///
396b5(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing //theg pa gcig lam mngon par shes//'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa//phyogs bcu dang ni da lta'i rnams//sangs rgyas theg chen gcig pu la/
396b6(mdo sde): gnyis sam gsum zhes bya med par//de ltar yid la bskyes nas//sems kyis rnam par mi rtog na//de lta bu yi mi rnams ni//rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya//rgyal bu dge mthong 'di
396b7(mdo sde): lta ste/gang zag la la 'ga'o zhig gis//sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin//rtag tu dad pa'i sems bskyed//sangs rgyas kun la sangs rgyas kyi//bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni//de lta bu
397a1(mdo sde): yi gang zag rnams//rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya//gang zhig skad cig dge spyod cing //lha yi 'bras bu mi re ste//cig car bla med lam bsgrubs na//rgyal ba'i
397a2(mdo sde): drin lan lon zhes bya//rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste//sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin//gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis//yud tsam mdo sde 'di bklags te//dkon mchog
397a3(mdo sde): gsum la gus byas shing //mkhan la srid zhu mchod byas na//de lta bu yi gang zag rnams//rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya//gang zhig nor rdzas sna 'ga' 'am//kha zas dang ni
397a4(mdo sde): gos kyi rnams//kun la khyab par sbyin byas na//rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya//rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste//nga yi chos rnams 'jigs pa na//gang zhig 'ga' la blo brtan nas//
397a5(mdo sde): yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na//byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la//mchod pa phul bas de lha go//theg tshen mdo sde 'di dag kyang //sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum//sangs
397a6(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //mdo sde 'di la dran byas te//snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis med na//rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya//rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste//gang zhig
397a7(mdo sde): chos 'di 'jigs pa'i tshe//rgyal ba'i drin lan bla na 'dod pas//skad cig yud tsam bsgom byed pa//stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi//srog gi sbyin pa byin pa bas//bsam
397b1(mdo sde): gtan bsgom pa yon tan che//gang zhig bsgom la skur ba dang //dge 'dun la khrugs par byed pa ni//stong khams gsum po gang ba yi//mi rnams kyi ni srog bcad dang //srog chags
397b2(mdo sde): thams cad bsad dang 'dra//de sdig yang ni de bzhin no//gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la//skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa//dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs bcod pas//de ni rgyal ba'i
397b3(mdo sde): lan mi ljon//de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba dga' bas tshim nas bstan pa nyid spyi bo nas blangs te/tshigasu bcad pa
397b4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la//gang med lags shing gang mi med//mad dang mi med gnyi ga yang //dngos po da mi gosu yod ma mchis//yang dag mtshan
397b5(mdo sde): nyid de lta bu//chos rnams kun dang mi 'galo//sems can kun la byam sna dra//thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas//de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de nas
397b6(mdo sde): byon//yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu//de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no//'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar//de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad//de yi slad du rgyal
397b7(mdo sde): bo'i mtshan//de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags//bzod pa'i go cha brten pa'i sems//sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che//rno ba'i mda' ni shes rab mgyogs//li lo'i dgra
398a1(mdo sde): rnams 'joms mdzad cing //'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi//mchod yon phul ba bzhes byas na//de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan//dgra bcom zhes ni bgyi ba lags//
398a2(mdo sde): rab tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen//sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen//sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid la//zhi nga'i tshul yang rab tu mkhyen//'phags pa'i bden pazhi
398a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pas na//'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges//de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang //mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs zhes bgyi//rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas//spyod
398a4(mdo sde): lam rnam dag dang yang ldan//de slad mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das//mkhyen dang zhab su ldan zhes bgyi//chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing //dam pa'i chos nyid rab brnyes
398a5(mdo sde): bas//thams cad kun la byams slad du//dus skabs sbyar zhing thabs kyis bshad//skye rgan 'chi rab bsal cing //bde ba'i gnasu phyin par mdzad//de yi slad du rgyal
398a6(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan//bde bar gshugs shes bgyi ba lags//'jig rten gang nas mchis pa dang //'jig rten byas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen//de yi srad du rgyal ba'i mtshon//
398a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen zhes bgyi ba lags//thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral//gnyen des dge ba bstan cing btul//de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan//skyes bu 'dul ba'i
398b1(mdo sde): ba'i kha la sgyur//tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyad//thub cong b+hUn+d+ha 'dur bamed//day-i slad du rgyal ba mtshan//bla na med nas bgyi bu lags//nyon mongs mi mnga' shes/
398b2(mdo sde): rab ldan//rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas//de mi skad du rgyal ba'i mtshan//lha dang mi yi ston+do zhes bgyi//dus gsum g.yo 'am myi g.yo ba//bas sam ma pas chos kun
398b3(mdo sde): yang //byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas//de yi skad du mtshan sangs rgyas//de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams rdzu 'phrul chen po ting 'dzin du zhugs nas spu na mkha'
398b4(mdo sde): lalbubagos te zhal smo sa nas chog mthun par 'dra skad ces bka' stsal to//kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum snying po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi ri bzhin na na kyi mganas
398b5(mdo sde): m-i smin/phywa sa TI gan so//sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu'ang brtan to//rnam par grol ba'i phyir sdi ga~M gi rang bzhin yang rnam par gro'o//shes rab stong pa nyid kyi
398b6(mdo sde): byir sdig gi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid//dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi mthu'ang che'o//de bzhin du me thol bshags te 'gyeng tshangs nus pa ni ngang rnams mthong
398b7(mdo sde): po'i steng du sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang /sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyu ro//'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas rgyun tu ngab mthong la/deng byang chub sems
399a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ni dadung sprul pa'i sku rnams dang /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin nan mngal
399a2(mdo sde): sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyuraro//phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /mchod pa byas par 'gyu ro//de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/theg
399a3(mdo sde): bachen po mdo sde 'di'i rje su byang chub tu chub par 'gyuro//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor zhabs ring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par
399a4(mdo sde): 'dod na/rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la/re re nas dmigs te phyag 'tshal bang
399a5(mdo sde): dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba'am/mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed/sangs rgyas gcig gam/sangs rgyas gnyis sam/sangs rgyas bcu 'am/sangs rgyas brgya 'am/sangs rgyas stong
399a6(mdo sde): ngam/sangs rgyas khri 'am/sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i 'du shesu bskyed//mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs lo//de bzhin du re re nas dmigs te sems kyis phyag/'tshal na de dag gis
399a7(mdo sde): bsod nams dpag tu med pa'ang thob par 'gyur la/'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do//bsgral pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan song gsum du byung bar mi 'gyur/
399b1(mdo sde): ma cam bamamasasas mamasamatha.a mthas mtha thas nathamams yas thas bams al bcas ya mthabamam mtshan ma mas tsamatsham mas
399b2(mdo sde): ngas rgyas kyi chos la ba bar gnas par 'gyur bya'ang /dus te the tshon med do//de'i phyir sdig pa rnams mthal zhing bshags par byas la sems zag pa nas dad pa bskyed na gdon mi za bar /
399b3(mdo sde): sdig 'byang bar 'gyu ro//de nas rgyal bu dag mthong dang mi sum stong gis cig car du skad bskyed/bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcade bstod pa 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan byams
399b4(mdo sde): shing thugs rje che//shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje//tshogs kyi nang na seng ge'i sgras//khyab par sems can besdus pa ni//ba la gzigs pa du gcig bzhin//rnam par 'byed pa yong ma
399b5(mdo sde): mchis//de lta du si zla med pa//mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dag mthong drung mi sum stong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu
399b6(mdo sde): dag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'byod tshangs byas te/mi'i chab pa'i sems kyis mthol ning bshegs pasdud ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni gdon mo 'i
399b7(mdo sde): bar songs rgyas su 'byub do//rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang nig sems zag pa nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /mdo sde
399b8(mdo sde): gnyis dang /byang chub sems de'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni dkog gsum gyi drin gyilan lon zhes bya ba b+h+yo/de ma thag tu mi dge ba bcu dang /mtshams med pa ldi dang /
400a1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid la bkur ba'i sdig byung bar gyur nas rgyun du zhugs par 'os pa ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no//lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'os pa ni lan cig
400a2(mdo sde): phyir ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no//phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin//dgra bcom par 'os pa ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin//rang sangs rgyasu 'os pa ni rang sangs
400a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no//byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin//da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
400a4(mdo sde): skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'ang phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin//byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyis chos kyi
400a5(mdo sde): dbyings thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yi no//byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi
400a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin//byang chub sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i
400a7(mdo sde): yin no//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang ldan par yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no//byang chub sems dpa'
400b1(mdo sde): namakha'i ting 'dzin dang /ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yino//byang chub sems dpa' la las phyir mi ldog par
400b2(mdo sde): bzod pa dang /chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang /chos bzhin gyi dbyings dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yino//byang chub sems dpa' le las
400b3(mdo sde): gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang /rlung gis rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin//byang chub sems dpa' la las
400b4(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra'i ting 'dzin dang /rdo rje'i ting 'dzin dang /ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i
400b5(mdo sde): yin no//byang chub sems dpa' la las mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod
400b6(mdo sde): lam dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pas sangs rgyas rnams pa phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal
400b7(mdo sde): gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nor cing 'khrul pa'i sems 'khrugs te/mi dge ba dang mtshams ma mchis
401a1(mdo sde): ba bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/gong du bstan pa yin te/gang la
401a2(mdo sde): las phyogasu rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan thos
401a3(mdo sde): nas dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba bskyed la dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam/'chang ngam/klog gam/'don tamAM/yi ger bris sam/kun chub par byas te/
401a4(mdo sde): dben pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gis nong du dkyil 'khor byas la de chus chag chag btab ste/'phan gdugs bzang bas brgyan cing pog spos zhim po bsregs nas rgyal ba
401a5(mdo sde): rnams spyan drang zhing gshegasu gsol ba mang snga rung /nyung yang rung spyan drangs nas bdag khrus dag par byas la/gos gtsang ma gyon cing lan cig phyi rol tshe chung ngu 'gro na
401a6(mdo sde): khrus lan gcig byas te seng ge'i khri btsugs te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du bsgoms la/chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang /gang zag dang /sems can la sogs
401a7(mdo sde): ba'i lta ba med par mngon pa rtong pa bya ste/dang po pas bye brag phyed cing gsol bar brjod par bya'o//de nas dri spos zhim po bsregs la 'khrul sems bsal cing dran pa yang
401b1(mdo sde): dag pa dang bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshog pa la sems rtse gcig tu bas mo//de lhar spyod pa rnams mthun zhing 'drom pa ni mchog ste/de la mi mthun zhing rtsod pa ni
401b2(mdo sde): mthol tshangasu mi 'gyu ro//khro ba des kun 'jig par byed de spyong lam dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur//theg pa chen po dran zhing don dam pa bsams la nyin mtshan bdun gyi
401b3(mdo sde): bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rungango //nyin gcig kyang dus gsum mdo sde 'di kha ton nam/klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug tu byas la dri bsrung gi mchod cing phyag btsal nas
401b4(mdo sde): mthol tshangasu byas te/mdo sde 'di nyan na sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod tsong sems thag pa nas mi 'khrugs pa dang /sems
401b5(mdo sde): thag pa nas mo nor ba dang /sems thag pa nas mi g.yang ba dang /sems thag pa nas dus gyis 'grus pa dang /sems thag pa nas nyin gcig pas nyin gcig 'grus pa dang /sems
401b6(mdo sde): zag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang /sems thag pa nas dga' ba bskyed pa dang /sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang /sems thag pa nas rgyun mi bcad pa dang /sems
401b7(mdo sde): thag pa nas gzab pa dang /sems thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang /sems thag pa nas sdig mi bsams pa dang /sems thag pa nas sangs rgyas dran pa dang /sems thag pa
402a1(mdo sde): nas chos dran pa dang /sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang /sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang /sems thag pa nas gtong ba
402a2(mdo sde): dran pa dang /sems thag pa nas dron dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang /de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang /de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor
402a3(mdo sde): 'chags shing mthol ba thog ma'i nyin bar nas zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang bar dri chus yang chag chag btab ste/lus la'ang spos chus bkru bar bya'o//bog spos
402a4(mdo sde): bzang po bsreg cing sems thag pas mchod par byas pa de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor mthol zhing bshags pas phyogs bcur bskul bar gyur te/
402a5(mdo sde): da de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gI bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te sgra dbyangs
402a6(mdo sde): kyi rjesu khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du grub pa'i dbang bya'o//de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na gdon mi za bar sdig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ji ltar sdig
402a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar shes zhe na/so so'i skye bo rnams kyi don dam par da dung ma grub pas rmi ltas kyi mtshon ma la brtag tu byas te/rmi lam rnam gcig rmis na mtshams med
402b1(mdo sde): brnam gcig 'byung ngo //rmi lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byung ste/des nub mo'i rmi lam na chu klung chen po brgal bar 'dod de zam pa chen po'i steng du 'dra
402b2(mdo sde): bar mis na do nI nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin//gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus bya ba dang /lus la char bab par rnaMs na de ni nges par rnam par
402b3(mdo sde): dag pa thob pa yin//gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te/gral du 'dug por rmos na de ni nges par sangs rgyas kyi slod ma yang dag par gyur to//
402b4(mdo sde): gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag mchod rten ni/gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmis na de ni chos kyi sgo mo dam par
402b5(mdo sde): zhugs par gyur to//gal te rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na de'i tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
402b6(mdo sde): dpal lha bka' sprul pa/gal te dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge sbyong ngam/dge sbyong ma 'am/byang chub sem shrI dad pa can gang la las dran pa nyams te/nor cing 'khru
402b7(mdo sde): pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig pa'am/nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing mthol na sdig mi 'byung mi srid de/sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma gtogs//
403a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus//bcom ldan 'das cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe mi mang na rung ngam mi rung /bcom ldan
403a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rungango //cho ga 'di spyod pa'i tshe mdo sde gzhan mi bsam mo//de ltar mthol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin
403a3(mdo sde): chad nyes pa mi byed na de ni mthol tshangs zhes bya'o//de ltar dran par gyis shig/bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bar de ni bdag tshul khrims
403a4(mdo sde): bsrung ngo //da ni bdag brtson 'grus su spyod do//da ni bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang /kha ton bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis shig/bdag
403a5(mdo sde): deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba ro sran thub par smon to//des de ltar dran pa'i tshe skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa
403a6(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greng ste dbang du byed//'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang 'gyod tshungs kyi mkhan po byed//'phags pa 'od srungs kyang zhu gnas kyi rten byed//
403a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di ni sdig pa sbyangs pa zhes bya'o//'di ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o//'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//'di ni gnas thob pa zhes bya'o//bcom
403b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang /sdom pa brgyad dang /sdom pa
403b2(mdo sde): phyed can dang /khrims bcu dang /gsum la skyabasu song ba dang /khrims lnga dang /dge ba bcu dang /tshul khrims dang 'dul ba re re nas zhig pa'am/nyams pa 'am/mtshams
403b3(mdo sde): med pa lnga byas pa 'am/mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par so sor ma bshegs ma mthol na mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za
403b4(mdo sde): bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi/de bzhin gshegs
403b5(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang /dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang /rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas
403b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal shin tu'ang mkhaso//shin tu'ang mkhaso//de ni 'di lta bu 'dri ba'ang /
403b7(mdo sde): shin tu mkhas te/legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig/ngas bye brag phyed par bshad//ji ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya
404a1(mdo sde): nam+ba/ cig mun nang bsgyu zad par byung man pyod pa 'od myu ba nas d+h+ya//gcig rten dgog tu'am/'o bar byaba'ang med/'gyur byung
404a2(mdo sde): med de/tsha ba ni rab tu ma/sdug bsngal ni shin tu 'ang mi bzad pa skad cig kyang ming la/skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar sgrubs med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o//
404a3(mdo sde): yang rnam pa gcig tu na/mchen po 'bar ba/rab tu che gA kun tu 'bar/rab tu 'bar zhing /mched pakheng du zhugs pa'i phyir mnor med pa'i dmyal bzhis bya'o//bcom
404a4(mdo sde): sman 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dbyam pa chen po mnar med pa'i dbyings ni gri bzhi lham po dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/lcags kyurab
404a5(mdo sde): drim pa bdun gyis bskor rnying sted du'ang lcags kyi dra nga rim pa bdun gyis gsugs te/'og tu bar chad bcwa brgyud yod do//de'i khor khor yul t+tA ral gri tshil rim pa bdun
404a6(mdo sde): gyis bskor to//lcags kyir t+ni ri ma~M pa bdun min de log su nags tshol ral gri mtshan med do//lcags kyi khang ba bar ched bco brgyad po bai rje ga mar 'dug ste/rim pa
404a7(mdo sde): brgyad khro ba ni stong yod do//de'i grwa bzhir mongs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa lus kyi tshong tshad ni 'bang du dpa' tshong bani bcu la/mig ni klog gi 'od bzhin/mche ba ni ral

404b2(mdo sde): dri gre re re nas 'bar ba'i mi shin tu mched cing kun tu ba san+ta shA byung ste/de'i dud pa mnam pa ni 'jig rten gyi rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang basbyin du med//dmyal ba der
404b3(mdo sde): de'i sbyor ren dmyal ba'i sbyangs mi bco brgyad 'dug go//mgo ni sbyin pa 'gro//kha ni srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste/mgo la na bco brgyad yod pa/lag ni lcags kyi gsal shing thogs
404b4(mdo sde): rab rim pa bdun gyi nang log su lcags kyi rgyal mtshan srungs med pa zhig yod de/rgyal mtshan gyi mgor me byung ba ni rgyu mig dang 'dra bar 'byung //lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'thas
404b5(mdo sde): ni kun khyab pa 'bab ste/domyal ba'i hU~M banir n-i ma'i steng na 'angs pa rgya bco rgyud yod pa nang na lags khol ba'i ub khang+ga lud cing ni ni bab / myal ba'i na
404b6(mdo sde): du gang bar 'bab bo//khang po bar chad re re'i nang na'ang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad khro bzhi stong yod pas khar bdug pa'i mi skyug cing ri ba kun tu gang bar gtong ngo //
404b7(mdo sde): gyi sgra sgrogs pa ni 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhi no//lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i char bab pa'ang mnar med pa kun tu gdo//der sdug bsngal mi bzad pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad
405a1(mdo sde): khri'i sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i nang na mi bzad pa kun kyang der 'dus te dpe zla medado//mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir sgo re re
405a2(mdo sde): phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i mi shin tu mched cing 'bar ba lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyad par rgyu'o//'bar ba'ang lcags kyi ra ba kho ra khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas
405a3(mdo sde): steng lcags kyi dra ba la thug gi bar du yar thal mar thal zhing bla za 'og dang /phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar/rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/sdug bsngal cig car ldang ba ni gong
405a4(mdo sde): du smyos pa bzhin no//rtsa ba bzhi dang /sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa dang /mtshams med pa lnga dang /mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'debs pa rnams mdo sde 'di las 'byung ba bzhin
405a5(mdo sde): mthol tshangs ma byas na gnod bskur ba 'am/khrel ba med na mi de tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu stobs chen po che'i dpung pa brkyang zhing bskums pa tsam gyis mnur med pa'i

406a1(mdo sde): na'ang tshul khrims bshig pa dang /yon bdag dad pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/de la dmyal//
406a2(mdo sde): ba grang sgribs pa dang /dmyal ba mun nag pa dang /dmyal ba rab tu che ba dang /dmyal ba spu gri so gtams pa dang /dmyal ba ral gri 'khor lo dang /dmyal ba me'i

406a6(mdo sde): bar du nyon mongs nas gzod thar te/'on kyang rtag tu me rab su skyes la/tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos//brgyu la dge ba'i bshes
406a7(mdo sde): gnyen dang phrad na ni byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang srid/dge ba'i bo shes gnyen dang phrad na ni slar yang dmyal bar ltung //nyes byas pa'i sdig pa rnams ma mthol ma
406b1(mdo sde): shags na dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba'ang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i lo grangs lta bur lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyam su myong bar 'gyuro//de la ltung ba rnams kyi sdig pa na/
406b2(mdo sde): de las nyis gyur du bskyed do//dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'ang de las gnyis gyur du bskyed do//sdig can de dag gi sdug bsngal nyam su myong ba'i tshe tshig gzhan mi byin te/A be pa/
406b3(mdo sde): U ta ta/A la la/oM ba ba 'ba' zhig zer zhing 'dug/de bas na sdig can rnams rings par so sor mthol zhing bshegs la/dkon mchog gsum gyi skyobasu song bar
406b4(mdo sde): gyis shig/'jam dpal yang 'di lta ste/sdig pa myur du bsal cing 'bye ba 'dod ni mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du so sor mthol bshags te 'gyod tshang so byos shig/
406b5(mdo sde): cho ga nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig za gcig tu byas la/yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyasu 'grub pa'i tshe mi chen par
406b6(mdo sde): mtshan dang /mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang /mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang /rnam par grol ba'i mtshan dang /'od zer can gyi mtshan dang /ye shes yongasu rgyas pa'i mtshan dang //
406b7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting 'dzin rgya mtsho mtshan rnams bsam par bya'o//yang gcig tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems
407a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pa'i yi dam ting nge 'dzin las langs te/yid 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o//yid 'gog par ting 'dzin las langs te
407a2(mdo sde): slar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o//dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin las langs te shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/shes rab sgron ma las langs
407a3(mdo sde): te chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ti nge 'dzin la 'jug/chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las langs te mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/mtshan ma 'od zer can las
407a4(mdo sde): langs te seng ge'i nga ro'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/seng ge nga ro'i ting 'dzin las langs te seng ge sdug pa'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/seng ge sprug pa las langs te rgya mtsho yid kyi ting
407a5(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug/rgya mtsho yid las langs te kun tu ye shes kyi ti 'dzin la 'jug/kun tu ye shes kyi las langs te gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/bzung
407a6(mdo sde): kyi phyag rgya las langs te kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs te chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting nge
407a7(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug/chos kyi dbyings nyid las langs te seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/seng ge'i rgyal po las langs te chos kyi rgyal po'i ti nge 'dzin la 'jug
407b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal po las langs te bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting 'dzin la
407b2(mdo sde): 'jug/stong pa nyid kyi shes rab las langs te stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te chen po stong pa nyid
407b3(mdo sde): kyi ye shes kyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs te gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can gyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/gnas thams cad du
407b4(mdo sde): khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te byang chub
407b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting 'dzin las langs te rdo rje'i gtsug
407b6(mdo sde): tor gyi ting 'dzin la 'jug/rdo rje gtsug tor las langs te rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/rgya mtsho thams cad lus langs te gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge
407b7(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug/gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting 'dzin las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting 'dzin la 'jug/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod
408a1(mdo sde): yul rgya mtsho las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting 'dzin la 'jug
408a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs te gdod thabs kyi ting 'dzin mtha' mod mu med pa'i rgyu
408a3(mdo sde): mtsho'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya mchi'i sgo nas langs te yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba'i ting 'dzin la 'jug yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te rdo rje
408a4(mdo sde): gdon mi za ba'i rnam par grol bu chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o//'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la las
408a5(mdo sde): da pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed/mdo 'di yi ger 'dri ba 'am/klog pa'am/kha ton du skad cig mar dAn te/bsam pa'i 'du shes dang /dran pa'i 'du shes dang /rtogs
408a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes dad pa'i sems grub na skad cig mar bsgral pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phyag dgu bcu'i gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir bskyil bar 'gyuraro//ma rig pa'i
408a7(mdo sde): sgrib pa yang gtan dral bar 'gyuraro//de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'tsho skyong zhing gi zhes te mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mngon no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
408b1(mdo sde): 'khor mang po rnams la tshigasasu bcad bka' stsal pa/yi dwags mthu chen thams cad dang //dud 'gro glang po ma rungs dang //bud med g.yem dang ma rungs klu//dpag tu med pa'i
408b2(mdo sde): ma rungs rnams//ba su dang ni ma skyes dgra/lho sbyin dang ni sor mo phreng //lus dang sems kyis sdig spyad pas//dmyal ba mnar med ltung 'os kyang //phyogs bcu dus gsum
408b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba la//dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir//thub pa mya ngan 'da' ba'i khAr+ya//bskal pa grangs med phyir bsho lo//ma ga d+ha yi skye bo dag/kun kyang byang chub sems bskyed
408b4(mdo sde): po/phyogs bcu dus go sum rgyal ba la//gus par phyag bya'i dbang gi so//kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa dang //nyan thos lnga brgya rnam dag gis//ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ba' //
408b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la//gus par phyag bya'i dbang giso//mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang //sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu//da ltar dgra bcom grub pa yang /
408b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi//rgyal po rnams la phyag bya'i yon//dam pa'i don la chud pa dang //phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams la//byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
408b7(mdo sde): thams cad//tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang //phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la//gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis//rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste//sngon nga rgyal por byed pa'i
409a1(mdo sde): tshe//drang srong chen po sbyin zhes bya//de ni sangs rgyas ma byung ste//bram ze lnga brgya rnams zhig la//kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang //khang khyim dang ni mal
409a2(mdo sde): cha'i bar//lo grangs nyi shu tshang bar du//rab tu byung ba'i mchod pa phul//nges ni de tshe bskos pa la//khyed rnams byang chub sems bskyed cing //bram ze lnga brgya de dag gis//
409a3(mdo sde): mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang //dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pas//med bzhin du la skar smras pa//'jig rten nang na byang chub dang //rnam par grol ba med do zhes//de
409a4(mdo sde): skad smras par ngas thos nas//mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrung ba'i phyir//bram ze lnga brgya'i srog bcad do//bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas//dmyal ba mnar med ltung bar 'gyur//
409a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar lhung nasu//dran pa rnam gsum g.yos nas kyang //dus gsum rgyal la phyag byaso//mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde dang //byang chub dge 'dun dang bskyed de//
409a6(mdo sde): dran pa rnam gsum byas na su//mod la dmyal nas byung ste dong //'jig rten zil mngar lho ru skyes//tshe ni bskal pa chung bcu thob//de yang gus pa'i sems kyi su//phyogs
409a7(mdo sde): bcu'i rgyal la phyag bya'i yon//bram ze de dag thams cad kyis//thog ma skur bas dmyal lhung yang //phyis ni dad pas mod la thar//byang chub sems dpa' khyod rnams
409b1(mdo sde): no//khrel dang ldan pa smos ci dgos//sdig gi rang bzhin thog ma nas//med pas sems can rnams kyi phyir//rtsa ba bzhi po sdom pa dang //mtshams med lnga po'i sdig rnams dang //
409b2(mdo sde): log spyod bar du mthol bshagaso//so so'i skye bo la la zhig/de lta bu yi sdig byas pas//de bzhin pha rolnga tshangs byed nus na//rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga//log spyod
409b3(mdo sde): bar du sdig 'byung sngo//sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang gdon mi za//ma dad pa ni der ma gtogs//gang zhig ded pa'i sems shes te//rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas na//chos
409b4(mdo sde): lam mi 'grub mi srid//de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang //sum stong po yi mi rnams kyis//bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par//'di skad gsol te bdag cag rnams//
409b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas grub na skye shI las//'khor ba'i rnam dag bsgral bar smon//lha mi'i nang na btsun bzhugs pas//bye brag phyed par bshad du gsol//de la gzungasu bzung ba
409b6(mdo sde): drang //yi ge ra bris shing klog 'chang ba//de yi bsod nams ji tsam mchis//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//bye brag phyed par ngas bshud kyis//rgyal bu dge mthong
409b7(mdo sde): legs par nyon//gang zhig rin chen sna bdun gyis//stong khams gang ba'i sems can la//sbyin pa byas shing yon phul naso//de yi steng du chos bshad cing //dgra bcom
410a1(mdo sde): /'bras bu thob byas pas//la la zhig gis rdul pa'i mtshan//thos nas dad pa'i sems bskyed//skad cig dus phyug byas nas//de yi bsod nams de bas
410a2(mdo sde): 'da'//yi ger bris shing klog 'chang ba//dad pas phyag 'tshal smos ci dgos//de yis bsod nams dpag tu med//gang gis yi ger bris pa dang //klog pa dang ni 'don pa dang /
410a3(mdo sde): dus phyag 'tshal sems bskyed na//mchod rten stong khams chub par du//brtsigs pa'i bsod nams pas ni tshe//de nas 'od srungs chen po dang //shA ri'i bu dang kun dga' gro/
410a4(mdo sde): mchod rten bsrung ba mthu bo che//tshangs lha rnams dang lha dbang po//'khor los sbyor dang rgyal chen bzhis//bcom ldan zhabs la mgos btud naste//tshig mthun par ni 'di skad
410a5(mdo sde): gsol//bcom ldan mya ngan 'das smad na//bdag cag rnams kyi sems can la/go khyab por sbrel zhing bstan par bgyi//lus sems rtag tu byede ba'i phyir//phyag 'tshal rnams la
410a6(mdo sde): bsrung bar bgyi//gang zhig sdom pa zhig pa dang //mtshams med lnga'i sdig pa dang //mnyam pa nyid la skur paM rnams//sangs rgyas de dag mtshan thos pas//rnam dgas ru bde bar
410a7(mdo sde): gnas//dper na rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin//da dung ma 'ongs phyi dus la//sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong b.ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas tshogs chen po rnams la
410b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyed rnams legs par nyon cig/khyed rnams la sngon byung ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen bshad par bya'o//nga sngon bskal la dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i sngon rol na de
410b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos nas shin tu dga' ba'i
410b3(mdo sde): sems skyes te//thal mo sbyar cing spyi bos blangaso//blangs nas kyang sems can gang nas gang du gnas po de dang der dpag tu med pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams la rgya cher spel
410b4(mdo sde): zhing bston te sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos par bya'o//de'i tshe de'i dus na tshegs rnams kyi nang du mi sum stong nyi tshe zhig de'i chos kyi don dang mthun te dad pa'i sems dpag tu med pa skyes
410b5(mdo sde): nas nga'i thad du sangs rgyas de rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag byas pas/ ltar phyogs bcur snang zhing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yin//rigs kyi bu dag rtsa ba bzhi dang /mtshams med pa'i
410b6(mdo sde): sdig lci ba dang /mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang /log spyod kyi bar du sdig 'byang bar 'dod na dad pa'i sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/gang la las
410b7(mdo sde): ma dad cing ma gus pas mdo sde bcu gnyis la bskur cing dbang bzas pa dang /rdo rje'i sku dang /skyes bu dam pa 'jam dpal dang /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams la skur cing dbang
411a1(mdo sde): bza' ba rnams gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/brdzun pa ma yin no de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ma dad pa'i phyiraro//dam pa'i chos la skur ba'i
411a2(mdo sde): phyir ro//bla ma rnams la brnyas pa'i phyiraro//phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la smad pa'i phyir te/nges par dmyal bar ltung ngo //sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag
411a3(mdo sde): l-i dad cing sems thag pa nas phyag 'tshal na mi dge ba bcu dang /mtshams med pa lnga dang /mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig lta zhig mi 'byang mi srid//ma dad pa
411a4(mdo sde): dang /ma gus pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa dang /log spyod rnams ni der ma gtog so//rigs kyi bu dag shAkya thub pa'i sku 'dum phrag brgyar sprul pa'ang 'jig
411a5(mdo sde): rten re re na ston pa mdzad cing bzhugs te tha ma'i sku ni nga yin//de'i tshe nga dang 'grogs pa'i mi sum stong po kun da ltar sangs rgyasu grub ste/stong dang po'i gtso bo ni sangs
411a6(mdo sde): rgyas pad+ma'i 'od ces bya/stong par ma'i gtso bo ni sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku zhes bya/stong tha ma'i gtso bo ni sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya'o//de bas na khyed rnams kyang de bzhin
411a7(mdo sde): du phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba'i rigaso//khyod rnams ma 'ongs po'i dus na tshogs mang po rnams la chos ston pa rgya cher byed
411b1(mdo sde): cing mtha' med pa'i sems can rnam la phan gdags te/khams gsum nas bzlas shing zhi ba dang dben pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor gyis la nga dang 'dra bar byos shig/de nas byung
411b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
411b3(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar rnying phyag btsal nus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/
411b4(mdo sde): ji ltar bsgom zhing spyod par bgyi/de skad ces gsol po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ni sdom pa lci ba rnams la
411b5(mdo sde): phan gdags pa'o zhes bya bar gzung zhig/rdo rje rin po che'i snying po zhes bya bar gzung zhig/sde snod kyi sgo dpag tu med pa'o zhes bya bar gzung zhig/thams cad kun tu bsdus
411b6(mdo sde): pa'o zhes bya bar gzung zhig rgya chen po dpe zla med pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/mi sum stong sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/'gyod tshangs kyis
411b7(mdo sde): sdig sbyangs te bsod nams thob bo zhes bya bar gzung shog/thar pa chen po phyogasu rgyas pa zhes bya bar ga zung zhig/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs
412a1(mdo sde): 'dzin gyis 'di skad ces gas //com ldan 'dab de bzhin pa shegs ngas bstun blta na/ kyi rnam grangs 'dun sems can dpag
412a2(mdo sde): tu ma mchis pa rnams la sman pa dang /bde ba chen po mdzad pa'i slad du sdig sbyangs pa dang /sangs rgyas su 'grub par mdzad pa'i mdo sde 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
412a3(mdo sde): kyi ni yu mo//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni lam mo//nyan thos rnams kyi ni mig go//lha dong mi rnams kyi ni khang khyim lags te/de lta bu'i bsam gyis mi
412a4(mdo sde): khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa bdag gis gzungasu gzung bar 'gyi'o//ltu dadu mi gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der rgya cher sbrel bar bgyi'o//rgyun mi 'tshed cing yun du
412a5(mdo sde): gonas par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/legs legs so//khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yin te/sde snod chen po dpag tu med pa thams nAd gi zungs
412a6(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa lags te/khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus nang 'gro ba'i gnas su khyod 'gro sho/nge 'dug pa'i gnas khyod 'dug cig bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
412a7(mdo sde): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa zhig phyim mi ldog pa dang mi 'gyur ba'i sar gnas//nyin thos brgyad khri zhig theg pa chen po'i sems bskyod/
412b1(mdo sde): dge slong stong phrag bcu zhog dgra bcom pa'i 'bras du boT+Tab+ho//sgra dang mu brgyad khro ba ni stong zhog sa kyi mig rnam par dag pa zlab bo//sems can stod phragalargya zhig na blun rjod/
412b2(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'dri ba shad zin nas/shing sA la g+ha la byA de log sa gshegs//ga sheg
412b3(mdo sde): nas gser gyi me tig rin po che rdzing bu dang bcas por mi snang bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyang bsdus nas/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtho dmang dang /
412b4(mdo sde): gtsang sme yang sngon bzhin//mi rnams nyes byas pa'i phyir dmyal ba yang sngon bzhin//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
412b5(mdo sde): thams cad dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mya ngon par bstod do//'phags pa
412b6(mdo sde): thar pa chen po phyog su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyi sdig spyang ba ste sangs rgyas yongasu grub pa bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho///rgyu nag gi 'gyur
412b7(mdo sde): ka bdun brgya rtsa bcu gnyis te bam po gnyis dang shu log brgya bcu gnyis//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'bogs pa rtogs pa
413a1(mdo sde): chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo//bam po dang po//phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang /mtshan nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi gleng gzhi dang /dus gsum gyi
413a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang /mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /bshags pa'i le'u
413a3(mdo sde): rnams 'byung ba nyi tshe bcos shing bsgyur ba/de nas phyogs bcu nas lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol
413a4(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang byin gyi brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
413a5(mdo sde): mthong la/theg pa chen po'i chos thos nas bdag cag dang /lha dang mis mdo sde gsung rab 'di lan cig 'dzin pa dang /'chang bar gsol te/gnang bar 'tshal na
413a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na yul khams 'di dang /phyogs gzhan du ri dang /tshal dang /shing drung gi rig sngags 'chang ba'i gnas dang /grong
413a7(mdo sde): dang /grong khyer dang gnas dang /khyim dang /dgon pa'i gnas dang /dur khrod dang /shing drung dang /bla gab med pa dang /mchod rten dang /gtsug lag khang dang /dge
413b1(mdo sde): thamamams sa mthabasamams mthas thas ma mas natham yas masam ya mamamam sa ma
413b2(mdo sde): 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang /mi mang po 'du ba'i chos bshad pa'i gnas dang /mi phal gyi gnas dang /mir gyur pa thams cad la rgya cher khyab par bstan te rgyun mi 'chad
413b3(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na ngan 'gro rnams gtan du bkag pa'i slad du'o//ji lta zhe na/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pas sems
413b4(mdo sde): can dmyal ba'i sgo bkum zhes thos te/chos kyi gzhung 'di las tshig 'bru gcig tsam kha ton du bton na lha rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ste/rtag tu bsnyen zhing mchis nas
413b5(mdo sde): rang yang dge ba spyod par bgyid lagaso//mi la la dag kyang rtog pa chen pos yongasu rgyas po'i chos kyi gzhung 'di thos nas dga' zhing mgu la mos shing gus te yi ger 'dri
413b6(mdo sde): la 'don cing klog pa dang /'dzin cing 'chang la phyag 'tshal te chos kyi gzhung 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga'i mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'ga'i
413b7(mdo sde): ming nas brjod na'ang mi des tshe 'di la bde zhing bskyed pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba mi 'byung la/nam 'bum pa'i tshe na'ang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' dang /lha rnams
413b8(mdo sde): kyis de'i mngon du shul 'dren cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dge pa dag mthong la/dad nas gnas gcig tu skye bar 'gyuraro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos kyi gzhung 'di len
414a1(mdo sde): cing yongasu bzung ba'i slad dru'o//mdo sde 'di len cing yong su 'dzin pa sangs rgyas kyi sgra yongs 'dzin pA lcagaso//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
414a2(mdo sde): yongasu 'dzin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' lags te/de bas ni bdag cag drang slob pa gcig ste/rgyu de'i slad du chos kyi gzhung 'di yongasu bzung dus gan gcig tu skye zhing
414a3(mdo sde): gcig gis gcig mi slong zhing mi 'brul pas smon lam gcig pa leg so//de nas yang lha ma srin rnams kyi rgyal po dang tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal po dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
414a4(mdo sde): lha dang /'jig rten skyong 'phyogs bzhi'i rgyal pa chen po bzhi dang /phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje dag dang sde dpon chen po la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang bsnyen dga'
414a5(mdo sde): bibo dang /lha ma yin gyi rgyal po dang na mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dang /bu dgu ma'i lha dang ri'i lha dang shing gi lha dang 'bab chu'i lha dang mtsho'i lha dang
414a6(mdo sde): lha dang chu'i lha dang mi'i lha dang /rlung gi lha la sogs po'i rgyal po dang de dag la sogs patshad me de grangs med pa dag dang /lha chen po rnams dang 'khod pa las langs te/gad
414a7(mdo sde): dang spyi bos phyag btsal nas thal mo sbyar te rjes dang gus par bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas slan chad rtag tu bcom
414b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rtogs pa chen pos yongasu rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di yongasu gzung ste/mdo sde 'di gang na gnas par bdag cag lha'i rgyal po rnams rtag tu de'i mdun du//
414b2(mdo sde): mchis te/gtsang zhing dag par bgyis la/mchod rten gyi nang ngam/mi phal gyi gnas sam/dben pa'i phyogs na gnas sam/yang na mdo sde 'di la gtsang sbra ma phyed pa'i yan lag
414b3(mdo sde): gis 'dzin kyang rung /bdag cag gis mi de la mi rigs pa'i gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o//de mchis pa'i gnas khyim gyi rim gro'ang bgyi'o//bdag cag lha'i rgyal po la sogs
414b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis de phan tshun mchi na'ang de'i mdun du 'dren cing shul sel ba dang /ci 'tshal ba bsgrub par bgyi'o//de phyogs bzhi dag du mchis na'ang sgrib cing chags pa ma
414b5(mdo sde): mchis la/rtag tu dga' ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe brjes ni lha'i nang du skye ba dang /de'i bsod nams kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mjal zhing theg pa chen po las mi nyams phyag bgyid/
414b6(mdo sde): do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /lha ma srin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa dag la dka' stsal pa/de de bzhi no//de de bzhin te/khyod
414b7(mdo sde): kyis smras pa de bzhin te/chos kyi gzhung 'di lta bu 'di thos par yang dka' na rtogs par lta smos kyang ci dgos/chos kyi gzhung 'di len cing 'dzin la/'don cing klog par byed na
415a1(mdo sde): gtsang sbra dang /khrus kyis dag cing dad par byas la/gos gtsang ma bgos te/gnas gtsang mar byas la//dar gyi bla bre dang ba dan la sogs pas gnas
415a2(mdo sde): kyi nang bzang por brgyan la/spos mchog tu dri zhim pa tsan+dan dang /phye ma dag gi byug pa dang /sros rnam pa mang po bsregs nas phyag 'tshal te/nyin zhag gcig la nyin
415a3(mdo sde): lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du de lta bur nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du chos kyi gzhung 'di klog cing 'don te sems dang yid mi g.yeng ba dang /dran pa mi g.yel zhing
415a4(mdo sde): gcig tu brtan pa dang /bsam pa drang ba dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'gro ba dang len cing 'dzin pa ma 'khrul pa dang /spyod lam brtan pa dang 'don cing zlos pa phyin
415a5(mdo sde): ci ma log pa de lta bu'i tshul du mdo sde 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod
415a6(mdo sde): cing klags la/mos shing gus pas de ltar phyag 'tshal zhing 'chang ba ni mdo sde 'di las bshad pa bzhin du sngag lci ba thams cad yang dag par bsal bar 'gyur ro//de
415a7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/rtogs pa chen po yongasu rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang spyad cing sbyangs la/byin gyis brlabs nas yongasu//
415b1(mdo sde): bzung ba ste/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni yu mo//mdo sde rnams kyi ni rgyal po'o//mchog gi gzhung gi ni mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi na lam//rtogs pa chen pos
415b2(mdo sde): yongasu rgyas pa 'di mchog tu zab pa'i chos kyi gzhung gi snying po'o//gcig tu dper na 'jig rten na chen po bzhi la sogs pa rnam pa drug dang mtshungs shing bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
415b3(mdo sde): drug gang zhe na/sa chen po dang /chu chen po dang /me chen po dang rlung chen po skye chen po bzhi dang /nyi ma dang stong pa ste drug go//de la mdo sde 'di ni dper na sa chen po dang 'dra ste gtsang
415b4(mdo sde): sme dang /bzang ngan che chung thams cad theg pa yino//yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na chu chen po dang 'dra bar mi gtsang ba'i ldan ljin dang /dri ma thams cad yang dag par 'khru ba yin//
415b5(mdo sde): yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na me chen po dang 'dra bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i slar sbur thams cad sreg pa yin//yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na rlung chen po dang 'dra
415b6(mdo sde): bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i phyag dar thams cad 'thor zhing 'jud pa yin//yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra ste/ma rig pa'i mun nag thams cad
415b7(mdo sde): kun tu snang bar byed pa yin//yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na nam mkha' stong pa dang 'dra bar dngos po ma lus pa thams cad go 'byed cing shong bar byed do//theg pa chen po'i mdo sde
416a1(mdo sde): rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo 'di rgyu rgyu ba ni zla med pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa' man chad nyan thos dang /'dod pa dang gzugs dang /
416a2(mdo sde): gzugs med pa la thug pa thams cad shong bar byed//de bas na khyod kyis mdo sde 'di long la yongasu bzung ba dang /rgya cher sbrel zhing khyab par gyis shig/mdo sde 'di la mos
416a3(mdo sde): shing gus par gyis te/khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rtag par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud la/de bzhin gshegs
416a4(mdo sde): pa'i ngo bo nyid mthong bar gyis shig/khyed lha'i rgyal po dag mdo sde 'di len cing yongasu 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtag tu nga dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs
416a5(mdo sde): par byang chub ste/chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba mthong bar gyis shig/de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan zhes bya ba stan
416a6(mdo sde): las langs te/gos legs par bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
416a7(mdo sde): bdag cag la sogs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du gsol zhing zhu na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
416b1(mdo sde): tham pham caHsas mthasamama.a mthatha tha.a maHthaH thas na thamamatham tham mtham tham mam thas ma mam thamakham/mamamam tham ya' tham bas
416b2(mdo sde): mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/mos pa'i mtshan khyod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhu ba zhus pa legs so leg so//khyod kyis ci dang ci zhus pa nyon cig dang
416b3(mdo sde): ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//khyod kyis zhus pa'ang dpag tu med pa'i skye bo la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i
416b4(mdo sde): mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dran pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na/bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan
416b5(mdo sde): gcig thos pa tsam gyis kyang lhur skye ba thob bo//slad kyis yun mi ring ba zhig na/rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba'i yul khams dgon pa'i nang zhig la lu ma chen po zhig
416b6(mdo sde): mchis pa'i chab skams te de'i nang na chab nya stong phrag bcu zhig gdugs kyi gdungs nas 'gum du nye ba zhig mchis pa la/tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bgyi ba zhig chab nya de dag
416b7(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /snying rje ba'i sems skyes te/chab dang zas kyi sbyin pa stsal nas dgung mang po mi thub cing 'tsho ba yun mi ring bar 'tshal te/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis bcom
416b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pas nya de rnams kyis thos pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skyes//de lta bas na bcom ldan
417a1(mdo sde): 'das 'khor 'di dag dang /ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la sman pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bsgrag par gsol/bcom
417a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan kyang thos na dpag tu ma mchis shing /brjod du ma mchis pa'i skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /bde ba thob cing rtag tu longs spyod phun gsum
417a3(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi gter rnyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyuraro ba'i slad du
417a4(mdo sde): gsol pa dang /tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams shing nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar par 'gyur ba'i slad du bstan par gsol//de nas
417a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan rdzogs par bstan na bskul
417a6(mdo sde): ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du bstan kyang rdzogs pa'i mtha' med//chu thams cad kyi thigs pa'i grangs ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni
417a7(mdo sde): bgrang zhing shes par mi nuso//ri rab lhun po rnams kyang srang la gzhal zhing bgrang bar rung gi/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni bgrang zhing shes par mi/
417b1(mdo sde): nus so//'jig rten thams cad kyi rdul thams cad ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshani bgrang zhing shes par mi nus//nam mkha'i khams
417b2(mdo sde): dang mtha' ni shes par rung gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus//de lta bas na ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
417b3(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan te/de gang zag la la'i rna bar lan cig thos na mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu lha'i gnasu skye'o//thos nas mos pa dang /gus pa byas
417b4(mdo sde): la yi ger bris sam/mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal na/'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i sdig lci ba 'byang ste/bsod nams tshad med pa thob pas gang zag de dus zad na'ang phyogs bcu'o
417b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yid la smon pa bzhin du skye ste/nga'ang mthong la ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
417b6(mdo sde): mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/khyed la sogs pa rnams chos tho bA 'dod na tshul bzhin du gos legs par bgos pa/lus bsrang ste sems me g.yeng zhing /dran pa mi g.yel bar shin tu
417b7(mdo sde): yid la byos te/sems rtse gcig tu bsdus la phyag 'tshal cig/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tsha lo//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la
418a1(mdo sde): bus par phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas la gus par phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin
418a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la gus par phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngal gus par phyag 'tsha lo//de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gus par

418a4(mdo sde): med pa la gus par phyag 'tsha lo//chos mu med pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo//bsam dpag dka' ba la gus par phyag 'tsha lo//stobs bkye stobs la gnas pa'i stobs la gus

418a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo//nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcod par mkhas pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo//pha rol gyi mthar phyin pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo//'jig rten rnams las
418a7(mdo sde): zer cing grol ba la gus par phyag 'tsha lo//'chi 'pho ba'i lam dang yongasu bral ba la gus par phyag 'tshalo//ting 'dzin kyi rnam par grol ba mngon du brnyes pa la gus par phyag
418b1(mdo sde): 'tshalo//nam mkha' ltar ci la'ang mi gnas pa la gus par phyag 'tsha lo//mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po chen pol gus par phyag 'tsha lo//bdud bzhi'i tsho gas bcom pa la gus par phyag

418b4(mdo sde): nas 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/sems rtse gcig tu gus pararo mchod cing /legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig/ngas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgya/
418b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi mtshan brjod pas/mtshams med lnga po'i sdig las kyang /rnam par grol bar sems bskyed cig/dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa yi//mi de'i phyir yang ngas bshad//de yis rtogs par
418b6(mdo sde): mi nus kyang //sa don tshig par rang 'byung //yang dag bden pa 'ba' zhig yod//theg pa chung ngu'i mtshan stsal na//theg pa chen po de nyid yod//theg pa rnam gnyis bsal bas na//
418b7(mdo sde): theg pa gcig pu kho na yod//dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa'i mis//tshig 'di thos par mi 'gyur te/sangs rgyas grangs med sngon mchod pas//da ltar bcom ldan 'das mtshan thos/
419a1(mdo sde): lan cing 'dzin pa'i gang zag ni//phyogs tsam las ni rnam grol te//rnam dag sa la'ang 'dra bar gnas//da ltar nga yi mchos 'di la//lan 'an
419a2(mdo sde): klog cing 'don pa dang //bcom ldan mtshan la phyag byas shing //sangs rgyas mdzad la bsgrubs pa yis//bdud tshogs las dang bral bar 'gyur//phas pham bzhi dang
419a3(mdo sde): mtshams med lnga//'dod chen po yang byang gyur nas//ma 'ongs dus na mi de dag/byang chub 'tshang rgyu gdon mi za//gang zhig mos par mi byed na//ngan song gsum du

419a6(mdo sde): bar lus kyi yan lag lnga sa la btugs nas sems rtse gcig gis shin tu legs bor nyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nas brjod de bka' stsal ga snga mi 'das
419a7(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa rnams la gus par phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mA me snang stong phras
419b1(mdo sde): nyi shu la gus par phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa mar mo mdzad stong phrag sum cu la gus par phyag 'tsha lo//de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtogs chen ye shes rgyal ba la gus par phyug

419b3(mdo sde): gus par phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbyangs kyi rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin dbang mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin
419b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgongs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od grangs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i sku thams
419b5(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan nyi zla ltar dang zhing snang ba la phyag 'tsha'o//de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo rnam dag yongasu mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
419b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang mas brgyan pa'i rgyal po li hUM ga 'tshamo//de bzhin gshegs bklu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra sbyin
419b7(mdo sde): rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo//de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgro sprin dbyangs sngon gyi rgyal po ye shes pad+ma la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tsholo//
420a1(mdo sde): de bzhin ga/shugs pasmra ma nal/ du/gas pag da ma n+dan sa pas rgyun//dnganan
